415603.name: Encapsulated Destiny
415603.description: Encapsulated DestinyInstantGuarantees that the next Time Rift you complete will grant you a reward.

468672.name: Pinch
468672.description: Pinch100 yd range1 sec castThe caster pinches their target, inflicting 26491 Physical damage and slowing them by 10% for 10 sec. This effect stacks.

1265406.name: Bloodborne
1265406.description: BloodborneInstantRequires WarriorBloodthirst causes your Bleeds to deal 20% additional damage for 8 sec.

1219439.name: Obliteration Arcanocannon
1219439.description: Obliteration Arcanocannon300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel marks its current target, then fires an arcane charge that inflicts 143645 Arcane damage to players within 10 yards, and 136085 Arcane damage to all other players. Players farther from the target receive less damage. This explosion leaves behind Potent Mana Residue.The impact causes the primary target to take 1000% damage from Obliteration Arcanocannon for 45 sec.

334713.name: Pursuit
334713.description: Pursuit8 - 40 yd rangeInstant7 sec cooldownRequires level 54

1237272.name: Lair Weaving
1237272.description: Lair WeavingChanneled (5 sec cast)Loom'ithar weaves a collapsing ring of Infused Tangles that inflict 108679 Nature damage to players in their path and root them for 8 sec.Destroying an Infused Tangle removes its connecting threads.

386730.name: Divine Resonance
386730.description: Divine Resonance30 yd rangeInstantRequires Paladin ProtectionAfter casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec. RetributionAfter casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Judgment every 5 sec for 15 sec. HolyAfter casting Holy Prism, Holy Armament, or Divine Toll, you instantly cast Holy Shock every 5 sec for 15 sec.

1217316.name: Devour
1217316.description: Devour150 yd rangeInstantUpon reaching 100 energy, Azhiccar inhales and attempts to consume all players and creatures in the arena for 18 sec, inflicting 2649 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec.Each time Azhiccar successfully consumes a living creature or player, it Feasts.

1220835.name: Checked Ego
1220835.description: Checked EgoUnlimited rangeInstantTargets struck by Gallywix's Ego Check continually suffer the unmitigated damage as Physical damage every 3 sec for 22 sec. This effect stacks, adding to the effects of previous Checked Ego.

1219700.name: Arcane Blitz
1219700.description: Arcane Blitz4 sec castUpon reaching 100 energy, A'wazj vanishes and unleashes Warp Strike at players while Taah'bat gains Incorporeal and goes into Arcane Overload.

1215591.name: Faulty Wiring
1215591.description: Faulty WiringInstantUpon reaching 80% health the flyer malfunctions, becoming stunned and taking 100% increased damage for 15 sec.

196447.name: Channel Demonfire
196447.description: Launches 15 bolts of felfire over 2.7 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals 146 Fire damage to the target and 73 Fire damage to nearby enemies.

1223008.name: Burrowing Eruption
1223008.description: Burrowing Eruption50 yd rangeInstantThe caster burrows and then bursts from the ground, inflicting 37087 Nature damage to players within 7 yards of the impact and knocking them back.

400734.name: After the Wildfire
400734.description: After the WildfireInstantEvery 300 Rage you spend causes a burst of restorative energy, healing up to 5 allies within 20 yds for (600% of Attack Power).

327093.name: Pestilence
327093.description: Pestilence100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightDeals (112.5% of Attack Power) shadow damage over 6 sec and slows the target by 5%.

190925.name: Harpoon
190925.description: Hurls a harpoon at an enemy, rooting them in place for 3 sec and pulling you to them.

204301.name: Blessed Hammer
204301.description: Blessed Hammer100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinThrows a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing (25% of Attack Power) Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by (Attack Power * 30 / 100).Generates 1 Holy Power.

432472.name: Sacred Weapon
432472.description: Sacred Weapon40 yd rangeInstant1 min recharge2 ChargesRequires PaladinWill the Light to coalesce and become manifest as a Holy Armament, wielded by your target. Sacred Weapon: While wielding a Sacred Weapon, your spells and abilities have a chance to deal (104% of Attack Power) additional Holy damage or healing to nearby targets. Effect is increased when Sacred Weapon strikes a single target, and reduced above 5. Lasts 20 sec.Becomes Holy Bulwark after use.

2139.name: Counterspell
2139.description: Counters the enemy's spellcast, preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 7 sec.

1258344.name: Stampede
1258344.description: Stampede40 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterSummon a herd of stampeding animals from the wilds around you that deal [(150% of Attack Power) * 3] Physical damage to your enemies over 4 sec.

73685.name: Unleash Life
73685.description:
Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 2,300.

Increases the healing of your next Riptide, Chain Heal, or Healing Wave by 25% and reduces its cast time by 30%.

462737.name: Black Blood Wound
462737.description: Black Blood WoundUnlimited rangeInstantMelee attacks have a chance to apply Black Blood Wound, inflicting 1060 Shadow damage every 2 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.

404840.name: Stinky Bright Potion
404840.description: Stinky Bright PotionItem EffectInstantBrightens the world around you.

1247045.name: Hyper Infusion
1247045.description: Hyper InfusionUnlimited rangeInstantExposure to Infusion Pylons causes the target to take 100% increased damage from Infusion Pylons for 45 sec. This effect stacks.

459683.name: Oil Slick
459683.description: Oil Slick300 yd rangeInstantThe Geargrinder creates a pool of noxious oil that lasts for up to 5 min. Players within the pool suffer 5862 Nature damage every 1 sec and have their movement speed reduced by 30%. Additionally, players within the effect slip and slide along the ground.Geargrinder Bikes passing over the Oil Slick spin out, stunning the rider for 5 sec.

1262863.name: Pyroblast
1262863.description: Pyroblast1.5% of base mana40 yd range4 sec castRequires MageRequires level 12[ Fire: Casting Pyroblast has a 20% chance to also cast a Glacial Spike, dealing (366.24% of Spell Power) Frost damage / FrostCasting Glacial Spike also casts a Pyroblast, dealing (705% of Spell Power) Fire damage]

1217760.name: The Big G
1217760.description: The Big G1.5 sec castSummons and dismisses Gallytron."Doesn't actually seem like anything too special under the hood, but just wait until those goblins next door see you pull up for the next pool party."Drop: Chrome King GallywixZone: Liberation of Undermine (Mythic)

1217526.name: Digestive Spittle
1217526.description: Digestive Spittle150 yd rangeInstantAzhiccar spews digestive acid at targeted players, inflicting 5298 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 6 sec to enemies within 10 yards of impact and leaving a pool of Digestive Spittle at their location.

444828.name: Chains of Ice
444828.description: Chains of Ice100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightEnemies hit by Chains of Ice are afflicted by Deep Frost increasing the damage you deal to them by 2% for 20 sec.

1232986.name: Supernova
1232986.description: Supernova1000 yd rangeInstantDimensius initiates the death of a Voidstar, causing it to explode after 7 sec inflicting 90723 Cosmic damage to all players, reduced based on distance.A Black Hole appears in place of the Voidstar and continues to orbit Dimensius.

44949.name: Whirlwind Off-Hand
44949.description: Unleashes a whirlwind of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 56 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

1223579.name: Dark Strike
1223579.description: Dark StrikeUnlimited rangeInstantThe caster inflicts 45362 Physical damage and 22681 Shadow damage to their current target.

428524.name: Demonic Art: Overlord
428524.description: Demonic Art: OverlordInstantRequires WarlockYour next Soul Shard spent summons an Overlord that unleashes a devastating attack.Modifies Damage/Healing Done 0%: Chaos Bolt, ShadowburnModifies Cast Time 0%: Chaos Bolt, Hand of Gul'dan

186270.name: Raptor Strike
186270.description: A vicious slash dealing 125 Physical damage.

1249077.name: Oblivion
1249077.description: OblivionUnlimited rangeInstantDimensius instantly devours any player who enters his body for any reason, killing them horribly.

470411.name: Flame Shock
470411.description:
Sears the target with fire, causing 85 Volcanic damage and then an additional 511 Volcanic damage over 18 sec.

Flame Shock can be applied to a maximum of 6 targets.

If Flame Shock is dispelled, a volcanic eruption wells up beneath the dispeller, exploding for 1,723 Volcanic damage and knocking them into the air.

390148.name: Flow State
390148.description: Flow StateInstantRequires EvokerEmpower spells cause time to flow 10% faster for you, increasing movement speed, cooldown recharge rate, and cast speed. Lasts 10 sec.

1243577.name: Reverse Gravity
1243577.description: Reverse Gravity300 yd rangeInstantDimensius targets random players then reverses their gravity after 5 sec, inflicting 18145 Shadow damage to players within 6 yards and sending them Airborne.Players hit by this effect who are already Airborne are immediately launched into Dimensius.

450421.name: Greater Pyroblast
450421.description: Greater Pyroblast40 yd rangeInstantRequires MageRequires level 10Hurls an immense fiery boulder that deals up to (780% of Spell Power) Fire damage.

1459.name: Arcane Intellect
1459.description:
Infuses the target with brilliance, increasing their Intellect by 3% for 1 hour.  

If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

464655.name: Snipe
464655.description: Snipe60 yd range2.5 sec cast0.5 sec cooldownInflicts 9537 Physical damage.

83381.name: Kill Command
83381.description: Kill Command100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Give the command to kill, causing your pet to charge your target and savagely deal (206% of Attack Power) Physical damage to the enemy.

459627.name: Tank Buster
459627.description: Tank Buster100 yd range1.5 sec castThe Geargrinder slams into its current target, inflicting 73275 Physical damage, knocking them back and causing them to bleed for 3908 Physical damage every 1.5 sec for 25 sec. In addition, the target suffers 200% increased damage taken by Tank Buster for 25 sec. This effect stacks.The exertion causes the Geargrinder to expel a cloud of Exhaust Fumes and leak an Oil Slick that lasts for 5 min.

260249.name: Bloodseeker
260249.description: BloodseekerInstantRequires HunterYou and your pet gain 10% attack speed for every bleeding enemy within 12 yds.

78675.name: Solar Beam
78675.description: Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.

1244235.name: Rolling Torment
1244235.description: Rolling Torment40 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterWhen Void Metamorphosis expires, for each unused Soul you harvested, gain 5 Fury and increase your damage by 0.50% for 12 sec.

1214595.name: Void Ray
1214595.description: Void RayUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires 100 FuryUnleash a beam of concentrated void energy, dealing (20.25% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage and consuming 5 Fury every 0.2 sec.Effect ends after 3 sec or upon reaching 0 Fury.

391054.name: Intercession
391054.description: Petition the Light on the behalf of a fallen ally, restoring spirit to body and allowing them to reenter battle with 60% health and at least 20% mana.

1223614.name: Ethereal Barricade
1223614.description: Ethereal Barricade100 yd rangeInstantYour spells and abilities have a high chance to coalesce the energy around you, granting you a shield that reduces damage taken by 20% up to 20844 total damage.Upon falling below 40% health, gain this effect at 500% effectiveness. This effect may only occur once every 6 min.

1238960.name: Bonemelt
1238960.description: BonemeltUnlimited rangeInstantThe caster ejects a volley of acid globs at players, causing them to inflict 11340 Nature damage to players within 4 yards every 1 sec for 10 sec.

1258338.name: Stampede!
1258338.description: Stampede!InstantRequires HunterCasting [ Beast Mastery: Bestial Wrath / SurvivalTakedown] grants Howl of the Pack Leader and causes your next Kill Command to rouse the nearby wildlife into a Stampede, charging your target and dealing [(150% of Attack Power) * 9] Physical damage over 7 sec.

466751.name: Venting Heat
466751.description: Venting HeatUnlimited range1 sec castGallywix's machines dump excessive heat over 4 sec inflicting 9673 Fire damage to all players plus an additional 1451 Fire damage every 1 sec.

118323.name: Primal Earth Elemental
118323.description: Primal Earth ElementalInstantRequires ShamanEarth Elemental summoned recently.

435615.name: Thunder Blast
435615.description: Thunder BlastInstantRequires WarriorShield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.Thunder BlastYour next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals (152.139% of Attack Power) Stormstrike damage and generates 2 Rage.

355936.name: Dream Breath
355936.description:
Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 40 yd cone in front of you for 1,517.

I:   Heals 583 instantly and 934 over 16 sec.

II:  Heals 817 instantly and 700 over 12 sec.

III: Heals 1,050 instantly and 467 over 8 sec.

1227470.name: Besiege
1227470.description: BesiegeUnlimited rangeInstantThe Voidwing sweeps across the sky, exhaling a breath that inflicts 45 Cosmic damage every 0.3 sec to any player within the effect.

1490.name: Chaos Brand
1490.description: Chaos Brand100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterYour damage brands the target, increasing magic damage taken by 3%.

204018.name: Blessing of Spellwarding
204018.description:
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.

1249433.name: Mass Destruction
1249433.description: Mass Destruction1000 yd rangeInstantArtoshion ejects superheated mass at random players after 5 sec, inflicting 45362 Cosmic damage to all players in its path, knocking them back, and leaving behind a Debris Field.

429951.name: Blade Flurry
429951.description: Blade Flurry20 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1Requires One-Handed Melee WeaponStrikes up to 5 nearby targets for (153% of Attack Power) Physical damage, and causes your single target attacks to also strike up to 4 additional nearby enemies for 30% of normal damage for 10 sec.

1219731.name: Destabilized
1219731.description: Destabilized100 yd rangeChanneled (15 sec cast)The collision knocks both Taah'bat and A'wazj out of the ether, stunning them for 15 sec and bringing the Arcane Blitz to a halt.

449887.name: Voidheart
449887.description: VoidheartInstantRequires PriestWhile Entropic Rift is active, your [ Shadow: Shadow damage is increased by 5% / DisciplineAtonement healing is increased by 20%]

83242.name: Call Pet 2
83242.description: Summons your second pet to you.

1242326.name: Cursed Stone Idol
1242326.description: Cursed Stone IdolLevel 80Item Effect1 sec cast1.5 min cooldownChannel for 1 sec to invoke the wrath of the idol, increasing your Critical Strike by 333 for 15 sec. The force slams the earth, dealing 11738 Nature damage to all nearby enemies and increasing Critical Strike by 17 per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 416.

1235510.name: Cleanse the Chamber
1235510.description: Cleanse the Chamber300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel sends an Arcanomatrix Atomizer through The Influx.

427914.name: Immolation Aura
427914.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires level 14 Havoc, DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec. (500ms cooldown)

248280.name: Force of Nature
248280.description: Force of Nature40 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 1Summons a stand of 1 Treants for 10 sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area.

1235973.name: Vengeful Void Barrier
1235973.description: Vengeful Void BarrierItem EffectInstantTaking damage infuriates you, causing you to absorb 1060 damage and deal 2424 Shadow damage per infuriation split between nearby enemies. Damage increased by 30% per additional enemy, up to 150%.You may be further infuriated every 15 sec, stacking up to 15 times, but calm quickly upon leaving combat. Valid only for tank specializations.

432502.name: Sacred Weapon
432502.description: Sacred Weapon100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinApproximately 8 procs per minuteWhile wielding a Sacred Weapon, your spells and abilities have a chance to deal (104% of Attack Power) additional Holy damage or healing to nearby targets. Effect is increased when Sacred Weapon strikes a single target, and reduced above 5. Lasts 20 sec.

1214909.name: Roll the Bones
1214909.description:
Roll the dice of fate, providing a combat enhancement of random power for 30 sec.

1 set or better: Add 20% increased chance to gain Opportunity.

2 sets or better: Add increased combo point generation.

3 sets or better: Add 30% bonus to Restless Blades' effect.

Jackpot: Add 10% increased critical strike chance.

450552.name: Jade Walk
450552.description: Jade WalkInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

1271712.name: Frequent Traveler
1271712.description: Frequent TravelerInstantRequires WarlockReduces the cast time of Demonic Gateway by 0.5 sec and you can now use Demonic Gateways twice before triggering a cooldown.

46585.name: Raise Dead
46585.description: Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.

1264485.name: Shadow Thrash
1264485.description: Shadow Thrash50 yd rangeInstant6 sec cooldownRequires Hunter[ Beast Mastery: Kill Command causes your Dark Hound to Shadow Thrash, dealing (210% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to up to 8 nearby enemies / MarksmanshipAimed Shot causes your Dark Minion to fire a Blighted Arrow, dealing (500% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to up to 8 nearby enemies]

1238834.name: Echo Barrage
1238834.description: Echo BarrageChanneled (6 sec cast)3 sec cooldownThe caster summons echoes that strike the ground beneath them, inflicting 60482 Shadow damage to players within 4.5 yards and an additional 6048 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 8 sec. This effect stacks.

444763.name: Apocalyptic Conquest
444763.description: Apocalyptic ConquestUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Death KnightWhile Nazgrim is active, gain Apocalyptic Conquest, increasing your Strength by 5%.

81141.name: Crimson Scourge
81141.description: Crimson ScourgeInstantRequires Death KnightYour auto attacks on targets infected with your Blood Plague have a chance to make your next Death and Decay cost no runes and reset its cooldown.

444487.name: Controlled Instincts
444487.description: Controlled Instincts100 yd rangeInstantRequires Mage Frost60% of the direct damage dealt by a Frost Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets. Arcane60% of the direct damage dealt by an Arcane Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

26573.name: Consecration
26573.description: Consecrates the land beneath you, causing 26 Holy damage over 12 sec to enemies who enter the area. Limit 1.

1214991.name: Surging Arc
1214991.description: Surging Arc300 yd range3 sec castRequires Ranged WeaponThe MK II Electro Shocker fires an arc of electricity at a random player, inflicting 7738 Nature damage and then jumping to up to 3 targets. This damage increases by 10% each time it jumps.

1233076.name: Dark Singularity
1233076.description: Dark SingularityUnlimited rangeInstantA singularity erupts within the forge, inflicting 10587 Shadow damage every 1 sec to players and pulling them into its Crushing Darkness. Over time, the strength of this movement force increases.

365362.name: Arcane Surge
365362.description: Arcane SurgeInstantRequires MageExpend all of your current mana to annihilate your enemy target and nearby enemies for up to [(372% of Spell Power) * 2] Arcane damage based on Mana spent. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.For the next 15 sec, your Mana regeneration is increased by 425% and spell damage is increased by 35%.Generates Clearcasting.

387847.name: Fel Armor
387847.description: Fel ArmorInstantRequires WarlockWhen Soul Leech absorbs damage, 5% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.Reduces damage taken by 1.5%.

55095.name: Frost Fever
55095.description: A disease that deals 59 Frost damage over 24 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 4 Runic Power each time it deals damage.

1227811.name: The Hunt
1227811.description: The HuntInstantVelaryn marks a player as her prey, charging towards them and inflicting 340212 Chaos damage. This effect is reduced for each player standing within the path of The Hunt.Velaryn additionally strikes players along the path, inflicting 51032 Chaos damage to players within 3 yards of each player struck.

1216611.name: Battery Discharge
1216611.description: Battery DischargeInstantThe hobgoblin's batteries discharge every 5 sec, inflicting 31789 Nature damage to players within 4 yards of each impact.The discharge also inflicts 5722 Nature damage to all players within 60 yards.

448787.name: Purification
448787.description: Purification45 yd range2 sec castInflicts 6358 Holy damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.

1241306.name: Blade Dance
1241306.description: Blade DanceUnlimited rangeInstantVelaryn rapidly slashes at nearby locations, inflicting 94503 Chaos damage to players caught in the effect.

196448.name: Channel Demonfire
196448.description: Channel Demonfire100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockLaunches 15 bolts of felfire over 3 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals (39.355% of Spell Power) Fire damage to the target and (19.5657% of Spell Power) Fire damage to nearby enemies.

1279656.name: Bloody Reflection
1279656.description: Bloody Reflection100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightRequires level 1While Blood Shield is active, taking direct damage reflects (110% of Attack Power) Shadow damage back to the attacker. Blood Shield can now absorb up to 65% of your maximum health.

1246145.name: Touch of Oblivion
1246145.description: Touch of Oblivion100 yd rangeInstantThe Voidlord's successful melee attacks apply Touch of Oblivion, inflicting 7560 Shadow damage every 2 sec for 14 sec. This effect stacks.Upon reaching 10 applications, the target is consigned to Oblivion.

444741.name: Anti-Magic Shell
444741.description: Anti-Magic Shell40 yd rangeInstant1 min cooldownRequires Death KnightSurrounds your target in an Anti-Magic Shell for 5 sec, absorbing up to [Total Health * 30 / 100 * (1 + Versatility) * 1 * 1] magic damage and preventing application of harmful magical effects. Damage absorbed generates Runic Power.

225919.name: Fracture
225919.description: Fracture20 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterRapidly slash your target for [(103.5% of Attack Power)% + (207% of Attack Power)%] Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.Generates 25 Fury.

1228113.name: Netherbreaker
1228113.description: NetherbreakerUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar hurls his mace which ricochets between several targets, inflicting 130037 Shadow damage within 30 yards of each impact.

393515.name: Pretense of Instability
393515.description: Pretense of InstabilityInstantRequires MonkIncreases Dodge by 10%.

247455.name: Spirit Bomb
247455.description: Spirit Bomb100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterConsume up to 5 Soul Fragments then explode, dealing (200% of Attack Power) Fire damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% per fragment consumed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

450360.name: Touch the Cosmos
450360.description: Touch the CosmosInstantRequires DruidCasting Wrath has a 15% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.Casting Starfire has a 20% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.

688.name: Summon Imp
688.description: Summons an Imp under your command that casts ranged Firebolts.

1223235.name: Arcane Sludge
1223235.description: Arcane SludgeUnlimited rangeInstantArcane energy spills outward, inflicting 13608 Arcane damage to players within it and slowing them by 25%.

1264783.name: Lethal Barbs
1264783.description: Lethal BarbsInstantRequires Hunter SurvivalYour auto attacks grant 2 Focus to you and your pet.Auto attack damage increased by 15%. Beast MasteryYour auto shot grants 2 Focus to you and your pet.Auto shot damage increased by 25%.

1234902.name: Cosmic Maw
1234902.description: Cosmic MawUnlimited rangeInstantThe Voidwing shreds its current target between stellar jaws, inflicting 604821 Physical damage. The target's essence is devoured, inflicting an additional 22681 Cosmic damage every 0.3 sec and increasing damage taken from Dimension Breath by 200% for 10 sec.

1218513.name: Giga Blast Residue
1218513.description: Giga Blast ResidueUnlimited rangeInstantCharged ions remain after a Giga Blast for 21 sec. Upon contact charges a Discharged Giga Bomb, or inflicts 9770 Nature damage and stuns for 8 sec when one is not present. This consumes the residue.

259277.name: Kill Command
259277.description: Kill Command100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal (300% of Attack Power) Physical damage to the enemy.Generates 15 Focus.SurvivalIncreases the damage of your next non-Kill Command ability by 0%.

469479.name: Sludge Claws
469479.description: Sludge ClawsUnlimited rangeInstantSwampface ravages the target with gruesome claws, inflicting 74175 Physical damage and 21193 Nature damage. The muddy gashes absorb 74175 healing.

432021.name: Flask of Alchemical Chaos
432021.description: Flask of Alchemical ChaosLevel 80Item EffectInstantDrink to increase a random secondary stat by 213 at the cost of 18 of two other secondary stats. These effects are randomized again every 30 sec.Lasts 1 hour and through death. Consuming an identical flask will add another 1 hour.

2983.name: Sprint
2983.description: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 8 sec. Usable while stealthed.

433843.name: Erupting Webs
433843.description: Erupting Webs300 yd rangeInstantThe caster causes several spiderweb eruptions to occur, inflicting 31789 Nature damage and stunning players struck for 3 sec.

469327.name: Giga Blast
469327.description: Giga BlastUnlimited range3 sec castGallywix blasts lightning in a direction inflicting 87930 Nature damage plus an additional 1468 Nature damage every 1 sec for 10 sec. This effect stacks.

67826.name: Jeeves
67826.description: JeevesItem EffectInstantRequests the presence of Jeeves, the perfect gentleman robot butler, who will attend to your needs for 10 min.Jeeves can grant bank access to very skilled engineers and perform mundane tasks such as buying, selling, and repairing for anyone.

375229.name: Time Spiral
375229.description: Time Spiral100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterBend time, allowing you and your allies within 40 yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next 10 sec, even if it is on cooldown.

473114.name: Mudslide
473114.description: MudslideUnlimited range3.5 sec castSwampface upheaves massive amounts of mud in front of him, inflicting 47684 Nature damage to any player hit.

77443.name: Steady Shot
77443.description: Steady ShotUnlimited rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Focus gained through use of Steady Shot.

390787.name: Weal and Woe
390787.description: Weal and WoeInstantRequires PriestYour Penance bolts increase the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 3%.Stacks up to 10 times.

1228238.name: Fel Inferno
1228238.description: Fel InfernoUnlimited range4 sec castVelaryn wreathes the arena in flame, inflicting 4536 Fire damage to all players and an additional 983 Fire damage every 0.5 sec for 15 sec when each pillar of the inferno is created. This effect stacks.The flame inflicts 45381 Fire damage every 1 sec to any players who step into the firestorm.

1224094.name: Burrow
1224094.description: Burrow1.333 sec castThe caster burrows into the ground, traveling towards a player to unleash a Toxic Eruption. While burrowed, the caster takes 50% reduced damage.

210824.name: Touch of the Magi
210824.description: Touch of the Magi100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageArcane Blast has a 10% chance to apply Touch of the Magi, accumulating 15% of the damage you deal to the target for 12 sec, and then exploding for that amount of Arcane damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

443575.name: Tiger Stance
443575.description: Tiger StanceInstantRequires MonkYou switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.Crane Stance:HasteTiger Stance:Critical StrikeOx Stance:VersatilitySerpent Stance: Mastery

1238502.name: Woven Ward
1238502.description: Woven WardUnlimited rangeInstantEach Infused Tangle is protected by a barrier of silk that prevents all damage. This barrier is broken when struck by Piercing Strand.

86392.name: Main Gauche
86392.description: Your main-hand attacks have a 30% chance to trigger an attack with your off-hand that deals 0 Physical damage.

1220784.name: Auto-Locking Cuff Bomb
1220784.description: Auto-Locking Cuff BombUnlimited rangeInstant0.5 sec after picking up a Giga Bomb the silver bracelets click, preventing Fling Giga Bomb and picking up additional Giga Bombs.If for any reason this aura removes the shackles detonate inflicting 73275 Fire damage to all players.

1220398.name: Double Whammy Shot
1220398.description: Double Whammy Shot300 yd rangeInstantZee fires an explosive high caliber round towards a random player, inflicting 156320 Physical damage to the closest player and applying Perforating Wound. All other targets take up to 156320 Physical damage, reduced by the closest player's total damage mitigation.Unstable Crawler Mines hit are detonated and all players hit are stunned for 2 sec. In addition, an Explosive Payload is lodged in the original target.

184362.name: Enrage
184362.description: EnrageInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 1Becoming Enraged increases your damage done by 11% [Frenzied Enrage: Haste by 15%, and movement speed by 10% for 4 sec] [Powerful Enrage: Mastery by 15% and Leech by 3% for 4 sec / for 4 sec.] Bloodthirst has a 30% chance to Enrage you. Rampage always Enrages you.

377101.name: Bonegrinder
377101.description: BonegrinderInstantRequires Death KnightConsuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 10% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

432120.name: Wicked Cleave
432120.description: Wicked CleaveUnlimited range1 sec cast1 sec cooldownRequires Warlock DestructionCasting Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. If Diabolic Ritual is already active, its duration is reduced by 1 sec instead.When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies. DemonologySpending a Soul Shard on a damaging spell grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. While Diabolic Ritual is active, each Soul Shard spent on a damaging spell reduces its duration by 1 sec.When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Hand of Gul'dan to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.

1214611.name: Bigger Badder Bomb Blast
1214611.description: Bigger Badder Bomb BlastUnlimited rangeInstantGallywix shells his primary target with many explosives inflicting 73275 Physical damage and increases Bigger Badder Bomb Blast damage taken by 200% for 1.2 min. This effect stacks and cannot be dodged or parried.Additionally inflicts 73275 Fire damage to players within 30 yards of the primary target, applying Blast Burns. These munitions (mostly) detonate on impact.However, some of the fuze within the bunch scatters about the arena.

1249759.name: Combo Strikes: Slicing Winds
1249759.description: Combo Strikes: Slicing WindsInstantRequires MonkYour last ability to trigger Mastery: Combo Strikes was Slicing Winds.

1226401.name: Mass Binding
1226401.description: Mass Binding2.5 sec castThe caster yanks players within 60 yards, inflicting 4536 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 12 sec. Upon expiration, players are Bound.The wrappings break when their victims move far enough away from the caster.

1258235.name: Ruthlessness
1258235.description: RuthlessnessInstantRequires RogueYour finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point spent to grant a combo point.

1220618.name: Protocol: Purge
1220618.description: Protocol: Purge100 EnergyChanneled (5 min cast)The Plexus Sentinel relocates, pushing players away and activating the Arcanomatrix Atomizer. The Atomizer slowly passes over the chamber, Atomizing any players and Volatile Manifestation it contacts.After relocating, The Plexus Sentinel begins channelling Protocol: Purge and gains a shield that absorbs damage. Breaking this shield interrupts Protocol: Purge.

556.name: Astral Recall
556.description: Yanks you through the twisting nether back to your inn. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

1261176.name: Unstable Affliction
1261176.description: Unstable Affliction100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockAfflicts the target with (251.967% of Spell Power) Shadow damage over 8 sec. Multiple uses of this ability may overlap.If dispelled, deals [(62.9917% of Spell Power) * 4136 / 100] damage to the dispeller and silences them for 4 sec.Generates 1 Soul Shard if the target dies while afflicted.

34026.name: Kill Command
34026.description: Give the command to kill, causing your pet to charge your target and savagely deal 72 Physical damage to the enemy.

1216788.name: Carrying Oil
1216788.description: Carrying Oil300 yd rangeInstantCarrying an oil canister for 30 sec.Coming within 7 yards of a bike with an Empty Tank fuels the bike.

468655.name: Frostfire Bolt
468655.description: Frostfire Bolt100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageLaunches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing (247% of Spell Power) Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 50%, and causing an additional (20.6% of Spell Power) Frostfire damage over 8 sec.FrostApplies 1 stack of Freezing.

374585.name: Rune Mastery
374585.description: Rune MasteryInstantRequires Death KnightConsuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 3% for 8 sec.

425011.name: Embrace the Light
425011.description: Embrace the Light100 yd rangeChanneled (7 days cast)Murrpray channels the power of the Sacred Flame, inflicting 2 Holy damage to all players every 1 sec. This effect grows in intensity over time.

227723.name: Mana Divining Stone
227723.description: Mana Divining StoneItem EffectInstant1.5 sec cooldownTrack Ancient Mana nodes on the minimap.

445606.name: Imminent Demise
445606.description: Imminent DemiseInstantRequires WarriorEvery 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.Sudden Death has a 100% chance to trigger Reap the Storm.

5215.name: Prowl
5215.description: Shift into Cat Form and enter stealth.

393054.name: Death Sweep
393054.description: Death Sweep100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterStrike 5 nearby enemies for [3 * (27.5614% of Attack Power)% + (82.8% of Attack Power)%] Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

192109.name: Lightning Shield
192109.description: Lightning Shield10 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 1 ElementalSurround yourself with a shield of lightning for 1 hour.Melee attackers have a 100% chance to suffer (21.75% of Spell Power) Nature damage and have a 0% chance to generate 5 Maelstrom.Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at a time. EnhancementSurround yourself with a shield of lightning for 1 hour.Melee attackers have a 100% chance to suffer (21.75% of Spell Power) Nature damage and have a 50% chance to generate a stack of Maelstrom Weapon.Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at a time. RestorationSurround yourself with a shield of lightning for 1 hour.Melee attackers have a 100% chance to suffer (21.75% of Spell Power) Nature damage.Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at a time.

30146.name: Summon Felguard
30146.description: Summons a Felguard under your command as a powerful melee combatant.

275430.name: Lesser Ghoul
275430.description: Lesser GhoulInstantRequires Death KnightA mindless servant of the Scourge, raised to obey its master's commands for 6 sec.

472487.name: Silvermoon Sweeper
472487.description: Silvermoon Sweeper1.5 sec castSummons and dismisses a rideable magical broom! This mount changes depending on your Riding skill and location."The Silvermoon color scheme for the "Motion By Emotion" has been a success all across Azeroth."Trading Post

466545.name: Spray and Pray
466545.description: Spray and Pray300 yd range3.5 sec castZee unleashes a cone of bullets at a player, inflicting 7327 Physical damage every 0.3 for 3 sec to players standing within the effect and detonating any hit Unstable Crawler Mines.

359077.name: Eternity Surge
359077.description: Eternity Surge100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerFocus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing [(1088.47% of Spell Power)] Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within 25 yds when empowered.I: Damages [Eternity's Span: 2 enemies enemy].II: Damages [Eternity's Span: 4 enemies / 2 enemies].III: Damages [Eternity's Span: 6 enemies / 3 enemies].

121253.name: Keg Smash
121253.description: Smash a keg of brew, dealing 100 Physical damage to your primary target and 65 Physical damage to all other enemies within 8 yds, and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

465128.name: Wind Up
465128.description: Wind UpInstantWinds up and fixates a player, inflicting 1589 Physical damage every 0.3 sec to players within 3.5 yards for 6 sec.

1222271.name: Wyvern's Cry
1222271.description: Wyvern's CryInstantRequires HunterWhile in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast. WyvernA Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 12 sec. BoarA Boar charges through your target 1 time, dealing (1200% of Attack Power) physical damage to the primary target and (1440% of Attack Power) damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. BearA Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing (400% of Attack Power) damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

210042.name: Consume Soul
210042.description: Consume Soul100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterConsume a Soul Fragment, healing you for (435.094% of Attack Power) health.

215479.name: Shuffle
215479.description: ShuffleInstantRequires MonkRequires level 16A swig of strong brew allows you to Stagger substantially more damage for 5 sec. Shares charges with Purifying Brew.

1219333.name: Gallybux Finale Blast
1219333.description: Gallybux Finale BlastUnlimited range1.5 sec castGallywix finishes this Suppression with pizzaz firing a massive shock at a targeted location inflicting 146811 Nature damage to all players, decreasing in damage as distance increases.

321686.name: Mirror Image
321686.description: Mirror Image100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageCreates 3 copies of you nearby for 15 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies. While active, you generate significantly reduced threat.Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate

155722.name: Rake
155722.description: Rake100 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 6Requires Cat FormRake the target for (29.1% of Attack Power) Bleed damage and an additional (147% of Attack Power) Bleed damage over 15 sec. [Infected Wounds: Reduces the target's movement speed by 20% for 12 sec]Awards 1 combo point.

1264304.name: Lifeblood
1264304.description: LifebloodInstantRequires Death KnightDeath Strike heals for an additional 20% of its healing over 5 sec.

431483.name: Chrono Flame
431483.description: Chrono Flame100 yd rangeInstantRequires Evoker PreservationLiving Flame is enhanced with Bronze magic, repeating 15% of the damage or healing you dealt to the target in the last 5 sec as Arcane, up to [(Spell Power * 2.5) * (1 + Versatility)]. Devastation, AugmentationLiving Flame is enhanced with Bronze magic, repeating 25% of the damage or healing you dealt to the target in the last 5 sec as Arcane, up to [(Spell Power * 2.5) * (1 + Versatility)].

426586.name: Blade Flurry
426586.description: Blade Flurry100 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1Grants 1 combo point.

196819.name: Eviscerate
196819.description:
Finishing move that disembowels the target, causing damage per combo point.
   1 point  : 12 damage
   2 points: 24 damage
   3 points: 35 damage
   4 points: 48 damage
   5 points: 60 damage

1224767.name: King's Thrall
1224767.description: King's ThrallUnlimited rangeInstantA player succumbs to their oath, becoming mind-controlled for 12 sec. The void invigorates the player, healing them to full health.Upon expiration, the player explodes inflicting 27217 Shadow damage to all players.

424430.name: Consecration
424430.description: Consecration100 yd rangeInstantConsecrates the ground inflicting 10596 Holy damage every 1 sec to enemies within the area.

433781.name: Ceaseless Swarm
433781.description: Ceaseless SwarmUnlimited rangeInstantThe Ceaseless Swarm prowls the arena, seeking players to devour. When they come into contact with a player, they leave festering wounds inflicting 4239 Nature damage every 0.5 sec and reducing movement speed by 3% for 2 sec. This effect stacks.

1219263.name: Obliteration Arcanocannon
1219263.description: Obliteration Arcanocannon300 yd range6 sec castThe Plexus Sentinel marks its current target, then fires an arcane charge that inflicts 143645 Arcane damage to players within 10 yards, and 136085 Arcane damage to all other players. Players farther from the target receive less damage. This explosion leaves behind Potent Mana Residue.The impact causes the primary target to take 1000% damage from Obliteration Arcanocannon for 45 sec.

1281559.name: Hellbent Commander
1281559.description: Hellbent Commander100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockYour demons deal 1.0% increased damage for each demon you control.

57841.name: Killing Spree
57841.description: Killing Spree10 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1Requires Melee WeaponFinishing move that unleashes a barrage of gunfire, striking random enemies within 8 yards for Physical damage. Number of strikes increased per combo point.Restores 1 combo point every 0.50 sec. 1 point : [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 2] over 0.50 sec 2 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 3] over 1.00 sec 3 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 4] over 1.50 sec 4 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 5] over 2.00 sec 5 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 6] over 2.50 sec[ 6 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 7] over 3.00 sec][ 7 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 8] over 3.50 sec]

1228506.name: Overwhelming Power
1228506.description: Overwhelming PowerUnlimited rangeInstantThe Forgeweaver blasts his current target, inflicting 10210 Arcane damage every 2 sec for 46 sec. This effect stacks.

432119.name: Faded
432119.description: Faded300 yd rangeInstantPlayers struck by Cosmic Singularity have their essences partially dissolved, reducing damage done by 75% and increasing damage taken by 75% for 12 sec.

120696.name: Halo
120696.description: Halo100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestCreates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 40 yd radius, healing allies for (161% of Spell Power) and dealing [(144.2% of Spell Power) * 1] Holy damage to enemies.Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

433002.name: Extraction Strike
433002.description: Extraction Strike40 yd range2 sec castThe caster stabs deep into their current target, inflicting 31789 Physical damage and healing equal to the damage inflicted.

449569.name: Meteorite
449569.description: Meteorite100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageCalls down a meteorite which lands at the target location after 3 sec, dealing (102% of Spell Power) Fire damage to all enemies hit, reduced beyond 8 targets.

1266301.name: Consume Soul
1266301.description: Consume Soul100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon Hunter

386196.name: Berserker Stance
386196.description:
An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

1242000.name: Echoes of Fate
1242000.description: Echoes of Fate150 yd rangeInstantSoul-Scribe's energy radiates 2119 Arcane damage every 2 sec to all players.

431974.name: Flask of Tempered Mastery
431974.description: Flask of Tempered MasteryLevel 80Item EffectInstantDrink to increase your Mastery by 173.Lasts 1 hour and through death. Consuming an identical flask will add another 1 hour.

471491.name: Ursol's Warding
471491.description: Ursol's WardingInstantRequires DruidGain magical damage reduction equal to 10% of your damage reduction from Armor.

113344.name: Bloodbath
113344.description:
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 176 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Bloodbath wounds the target to suffer 21 Bleed damage over 6 sec. Using Bloodbath on a target that is affected by Bloodbath extends the bleed by 6 sec.

Generates 8 Rage and has a 30% chance to Enrage you.

121557.name: Angelic Feather
121557.description: Angelic FeatherUnlimited rangeInstantRequires PriestPlaces a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.

433740.name: Infestation
433740.description: InfestationUnlimited rangeInstantAnub'zekt calls a swarm to feast upon a random player, inflicting 2384 Nature damage every 0.5 sec for 5 sec.Upon removal, they will form into a Ceaseless Swarm and hunt for more prey.

389787.name: Sigil of Flame
389787.description: Sigil of FlameInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires level 1Place a Sigil of Flame at the target location that activates after 2 sec.Deals (80% of Attack Power) Fire damage, and an additional (200% of Attack Power) Fire damage over 8 sec, to all enemies affected by the sigil.Generates 25 Fury.

381931.name: Mana Spring
381931.description: Mana SpringLevel 80100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 10 RestorationYour Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 38 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers. ElementalYour Lava Burst casts restore 25 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers. EnhancementYour Lava BurstStormstrike casts restore 38 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.

1250103.name: Infusion Pylons
1250103.description: Infusion PylonsUnlimited rangeInstantThe chamber's arcane pylons pump energy into Loom'ithar through arcane beams, triggering an Excess Nova on contact.Players standing within the beam block its path, suffering 3260 Arcane damage and gaining an application of Hyper Infusion every 1 sec. This effect stacks.

427356.name: Greater Heal
427356.description: Greater Heal40 yd range3.5 sec castHeals a nearby injured ally for 50% health.

462384.name: Spouting Spirits
462384.description: Spouting Spirits100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanSpirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores (1146.6% of Spell Power) health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

1225174.name: Ceremonial Dagger
1225174.description: Ceremonial Dagger5 sec castSoul-Scribe flings daggers in the direction of Fates and Fatebound players, inflicting 12716 Arcane damage to players struck and inflicting an additional 4239 Arcane damage every 1.5 sec for 6 sec.Fates struck afflict their bound player with Wounded Fate.

1234244.name: Inverse Gravity
1234244.description: Inverse GravityUnlimited rangeInstantAfter 5 sec intense gravity pushes outward from the target, inflicting 9072 Cosmic damage and violently knocking away players within 6 yards.Hitting players who have Crushing Gravity removes it from them instead of knocking them away.

469808.name: Giga Bomb Detonation
469808.description: Giga Bomb DetonationUnlimited rangeInstantCarrying a Giga Bomb in front of Giga Controls automatically detonates the Giga Bomb inflicting 4885 Nature damage to players within 8 yards, and sabotages nearby Giga Controls based on the health of the bomb.Additionally this jolt grants 30% increased movement speed for 10 sec.

27827.name: Spirit of Redemption
27827.description: Spirit of RedemptionInstantRequires PriestUpon death, the Priest becomes the Spirit of Redemption for 15 sec. The Spirit of Redemption cannot move, attack, be attacked or targeted by any spells or effects. While in this form the Priest can cast any healing spell free of cost. When the effect ends, the Priest dies.

342601.name: Ritual of Doom
342601.description: Begins a ritual that sacrifices a random participant to summon a doomguard. Requires the caster and 4 additional party members to complete the ritual.

258922.name: Immolation Aura
258922.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon Hunter HavocEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec.

212800.name: Blur
212800.description: BlurInstant1 min cooldownRequires Demon HunterReduces all damage taken by 25% for 10 sec.

155166.name: Breath of Sindragosa
155166.description: Breath of SindragosaInstantRequires Death KnightContinuously deal [(139.788% of Attack Power) * [(Attack Power * 0.98)][((Attack Power + Offhand Attack Power) * 2 / 3)] -- 2H, DW / Attack Power] Frost damage every 1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.Generates 1 Rune at the start and end.

97463.name: Rallying Cry
97463.description: Rallying Cry100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 1Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.Health granted increased by 50% when not in a raid.

280715.name: Whirlwind
280715.description: WhirlwindInstantRequires WarriorRequires Melee WeaponUnleashes a whirlwind of steel, striking all nearby enemies for [(50.3989% of Attack Power) + (50.3989% of Attack Power) + (2 * ((50.3989% of Attack Power) + (50.3989% of Attack Power)))] Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. [Improved Whirlwind: Causes your next 4 single-target melee attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 65% damage] [Generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit.]

442983.name: Vizier's Savvy
442983.description: Vizier's SavvyInstantAmount of Kej currency received is increased by 10%.

199486.name: Psychic Link
199486.description: Psychic Link100 yd rangeInstantYour direct damage spells inflict 60% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 40 yards.Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

440837.name: Fury of Xuen
440837.description: Fury of XuenItem EffectInstant10 sec cooldownOccasionally don the wings of Xuen over the next 8 hrs.

451764.name: Radiant Flame
451764.description: Radiant Flame300 yd rangeInstantSir Braunpyke radiates with the power of the Sacred Flame, inflicting 1325 Holy damage to all players within 45 yards every 0.5 sec.

427908.name: Immolation Aura
427908.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon Hunter HavocEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec.

85384.name: Raging Blow
85384.description:
A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 64 Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.

446368.name: Sacrificial Pyre
446368.description: Sacrificial Pyre100 yd range3 sec castBraunpyke creates a burning pyre containing 3 charges that last for 30 sec. Each time a player comes into contact with the pyre, a charge is consumed, the player is affected by Sacrificial Flame and causing the pyre to erupt in holy energy, inflicting 5298 damage to all players.While empowered by Vindictive Wrath, Sacrificial Pyre has 5 charges.

363916.name: Obsidian Scales
363916.description: Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.

1257052.name: Dark Harvest
1257052.description:
Consume the life force of each target afflicted by your damaging periodic effects, dealing 12,764 Shadowflame damage over 2.7 sec.

Damage dealt by Dark Harvest heals you for 50% of damage done.

273947.name: Hemostasis
273947.description: HemostasisInstantRequires Death KnightEach enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.

207407.name: Soul Carver
207407.description: Carve into the soul of your target, dealing 114 Fire damage and an additional 71 Fire damage over 3 sec.  Immediately shatters 3 Soul Fragments from the target and 1 additional Soul Fragment every 1 sec.

1241901.name: Mass Binding
1241901.description: Mass BindingUnlimited rangeInstantThe caster yanks players within 60 yards, inflicting 4536 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 12 sec. Upon expiration, players are Bound.The wrappings break when their victims move far enough away from the caster.

258883.name: Trail of Ruin
258883.description: Trail of Ruin8 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterThe final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional (72% of Attack Power) Chaos damage over 4 sec.

1237205.name: Voidstep
1237205.description: VoidstepUnlimited rangeInstantAdarus tears open a path through the void and teleports to a new location, inflicting 60482 Cosmic damage to players within 4 yards along the path to his destination.During this movement, Adarus manifests images of himself which cast Hungering Slash.

1219283.name: Experimental Plating
1219283.description: Experimental PlatingInstantThe crawler mine is covered in experimental plating, granting immunity to all damage.Upon reaching 100 energy, the mine becomes immune to crowd control effects and gains 200% movement speed.

1228070.name: Unbound Rage
1228070.description: Unbound RageInstantUpon reaching 50% health, Loom'ithar rips itself free of its bindings, incurring a great wound that increases its damage taken by 33%. As it crashes down, Loom'ithar inflicts 26083 Physical damage to all players and knocking them away.Arcane Ichor pours endlessly from its severed half above.

164815.name: Sunfire
164815.description: A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 80 Nature damage and then an additional 705 Nature damage over 18 sec.

1221477.name: Eye Beam
1221477.description: Eye BeamUnlimited rangeInstantVelaryn channels a torrent of Fel energy towards her current target for 4 sec, inflicting 30241 Chaos damage and applying Fel-Singed every (1 / 2) sec to players within the beam and blasting them away.After the blast concludes, Velaryn will Felblade towards her current target.

1241693.name: Locust Swarm
1241693.description: Locust Swarm100 Energy2 sec castHulking Bloodguard unleashes a vicious Locust Swarm inflicting 2384 Nature damage every 0.5 sec to all players for 8 sec.

210126.name: Arcane Familiar
210126.description: Arcane Familiar100 yd rangeInstantCasting Arcane Intellect summons a Familiar that attacks your enemies and increases your maximum mana by 10% for 1 hour.

1246160.name: Voidsurge
1246160.description: VoidsurgeInstantRequires Demon Hunter HavocMetamorphosis now also causes Demon Blades to generate 3 additional Fury.While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing (280% of Attack Power) Chaos damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. DevourerVoid Metamorphosis now also greatly empowers Voidblade and Hungering Slash.While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Voidsurge, causing you to explode with Void energy, dealing (625% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

433766.name: Eye of the Swarm
433766.description: Eye of the Swarm100 EnergyUnlimited range7 sec castUpon reaching 100 energy, Anubzekt calls forth a massive swarm surrounding the arena. While within the biting insect swarm, players rapidly gain applications of Ceaseless Swarm.

2908.name: Soothe
2908.description: Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

351338.name: Quell
351338.description: Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.

1219457.name: Incorporeal
1219457.description: IncorporealInstantTaah'bat disperses into pure energy, reducing all damage taken by 99% until shattered out of the ether.Upon being struck with Warp Strike, Taah'bat loses an application of Incorporeal. Upon losing all applications of Incorporeal, both A'wazj and Taah'bat become Destabilized.

364342.name: Blessing of the Bronze
364342.description: Weave the threads of time, reducing the cooldown of a major movement ability for all party and raid members by 15% for 1 hour.

377066.name: Mental Fortitude
377066.description: Mental Fortitude100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestHealing from Vampiric Touch when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. Shield cannot exceed (Total Health * 4 / 100) damage absorbed.

1227226.name: Writhing Wave
1227226.description: Writhing WaveUnlimited range4 sec castLoom'ithar unleashes a surge of silk towards its current target, inflicting 521658 Nature damage and an additional 73945 Nature damage every 1 sec for 25 sec. The damage is split evenly among players in a frontal cone.

1283246.name: Summon Webmage
1283246.description: Summon WebmageInstantSummons a Bloodstained Webmage into battle.

432448.name: Stygian Seed
432448.description: Stygian Seed100 yd range3.5 sec castIncubates a dark word upon the target inflicting 12716 Shadow damage and an additional 4239 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.Upon removal this mark explodes inflicting 15895 Shadow damage to targets within 8 yards, knocking additional targets away.

980.name: Agony
980.description:
Inflicts increasing agony on the target, causing up to 2,162 Shadow damage over 18 sec. Damage starts low and increases over the duration. Refreshing Agony maintains its current damage level.

Agony damage sometimes generates 1 Soul Shard.

2008.name: Ancestral Spirit
2008.description: Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with 35% of maximum health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.

390993.name: Lightweaver
390993.description: LightweaverInstantRequires PriestFlash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Prayer of Healing within 20 sec by 30% and increases its healing done by 18%.Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

441224.name: Fazed
441224.description: Fazed100 yd rangeInstantRequires Rogue Subtlety and Shadowstrike now also strike with an Unseen Blade dealing (280% of Attack Power) damage. Targets struck are Fazed for 10 sec.Fazed enemies take 5% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.This effect may occur once every 20 sec. OutlawSinister Strike and Ambush now also strike with an Unseen Blade dealing (280% of Attack Power) damage. Targets struck are Fazed for 10 sec.Fazed enemies take 5% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.This effect may occur once every 20 sec.

393438.name: Draconic Augmentation
393438.description: Draconic AugmentationLevel 80Item EffectInstantIncreases Agility, Intellect and Strength by 6 for 1 hour. Augment Rune.

223819.name: Divine Purpose
223819.description: Divine Purpose100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinRequires level 1Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.

457273.name: Lingering Darkness
457273.description: Lingering DarknessInstantRequires Rogue AssassinationAfter Deathmark expires, gain 30% increased Nature damage for 30 sec. SubtletyAfter Shadow Blades expires, gain 30% increased Shadow damage for 30 sec.

1222542.name: Ego Check
1222542.description: Ego CheckUnlimited range1 sec castGallywix gives his current target a 4-hit knuckle sandwich, inflicting 80 Physical damage each strike. These blows cannot be dodged or parried.Additionally 75% of unmitigated damage is inflicted as a Checked Ego.

466189.name: Thunder Punch
466189.description: Thunder PunchUnlimited rangeInstantGeezle consumes 10 Electricity to sucker punch the target with a jolting fist, knocking them back and inflicting 52982 Physical damage and 12716 Nature damage every 1 sec for 4 sec.

5672.name: Healing Stream
5672.description: Healing StreamInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 14Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that heals [Rushing Streams: two injured party or raid members / an injured party or raid member] within 40 yards for (67.68% of Spell Power) every 2 sec.If you already know Healing Stream Totem, instead gain 1 additional charge of Healing Stream Totem.

191037.name: Starfall
191037.description: Starfall200 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 29Calls down waves of falling stars upon enemies within 40 yds, dealing [9 * (25.3% of Spell Power)] Astral damage over 8 sec. Multiple uses of this ability may overlap. [Aetherial Kindling: Extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by 3 sec]

420418.name: Deepdweller's Earthen Hearthstone
420418.description: Deepdweller's Earthen HearthstoneItem Effect10 sec cast30 min cooldown1 ChargeReturns you to Hearthstone Location. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

1218149.name: Sacrificial Pyre
1218149.description: Sacrificial Pyre100 yd rangeInstantBraunpyke creates a burning pyre containing 3 charges that last for 30 sec. Each time a player comes into contact with the pyre, a charge is consumed, the player is affected by Sacrificial Flame and causing the pyre to erupt in holy energy, inflicting 5298 damage to all players.While empowered by Vindictive Wrath, Sacrificial Pyre has 5 charges.

209261.name: Uncontained Fel
209261.description: Uncontained FelUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterYou cannot benefit from Last Resort again for 8 min.

1256676.name: Catastrophe
1256676.description: Catastrophe100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterEnemies struck by a Voidfall Meteor take an additional [ Vengeance: 25% / Havoc, Devourer25%] damage over 8 sec.

1277446.name: Chi Warding
1277446.description: Chi WardingInstantRequires MonkYou heal for 3% of all magical damage taken.

5740.name: Rain of Fire
5740.description:
Calls down a rain of hellfire the target location, dealing 1,395 Fire damage over 7.1 sec to enemies in the area.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

104318.name: Fel Firebolt
104318.description: Fel Firebolt20 Energy40 yd range2 sec castRequires WarlockRequires level 1Deals (19.2178% of Spell Power) Fire damage to a target.

466153.name: Bad Belated Boom
466153.description: Bad Belated BoomUnlimited rangeInstantLoaded with out-of-compliance "safety fuse" these bombs scatter detonating late inflicting 41523 Fire damage to players within 7 yards and applies Blast Burns.

453161.name: Impale
453161.description: Impale40 yd range3.5 sec castThe caster slams down with massive claws, tearing a line of spikes up through the earth in front of themselves. Inflicts 42386 Physical damage to all players hit and knocks them back.

1246537.name: Entropic Unity
1246537.description: Entropic Unity100 yd rangeInstantUpon death, the Voidwarden's energy is absorbed by all other Voidwardens within 8 yards, fully restoring their health and reducing all damage they take by 99%.

135029.name: Water Jet
135029.description: Water Jet45 yd range1 sec cast20 sec cooldownRequires MageChannels a jet of icy water at the target, [Crushing Jets: slowing the target by 0% and]dealing (452.8% of Spell Power) Frost damage to the target over 4 sec.

65116.name: Stoneform
65116.description: StoneformInstantRemoves all poison, disease and bleed effects and reduces all physical damage taken by 10% for 8 sec.

1218417.name: FIRE!!!
1218417.description: FIRE!!!Unlimited range5 sec castFires Keeza's B.B.B.F.G., inflicting catastrophic damage to whatever it is locked on to.

212036.name: Mass Resurrection
212036.description: Brings all dead party members back to life with 35% health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.

1232888.name: Phenomenal Cosmic Power
1232888.description: Phenomenal Cosmic PowerInstantDimensius is immune to all attacks and spells.

1224302.name: Burrow
1224302.description: BurrowInstantThe caster burrows into the ground, traveling towards a player to unleash a Toxic Eruption. While burrowed, the caster takes 50% reduced damage.

1233351.name: Frostreaper
1233351.description: Frostreaper100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightObliterate deals 10% increased damage and has a chance to tether the souls of its target and a nearby enemy to yours.Frost Strike severs the tethers, dealing (205.92% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage to both foes.

394354.name: Wrecking Throw
394354.description: Wrecking Throw100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarriorRequires Melee WeaponHurl your weapon at the enemy, causing (600% of Attack Power) Physical damage, ignoring armor. Deals up to 500% increased damage to absorb shields.

1224669.name: Gatling Cannon
1224669.description: Gatling CannonUnlimited range0.5 sec castGallywix's barrels spit hot lead inflicting 43965 Physical damage, increasing by up to 200% as distance to the target increases.

1240002.name: Barrier of the Oathsworn
1240002.description: Barrier of the OathswornItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantBecome Oath-Bound to a nearby ally every 30 sec.Directly healing the ally fulfills the oath to grant you 154 Intellect for 12 sec and shields your ally for 100% of any overhealing done.

463730.name: Coagulating Blood
463730.description: Coagulating BloodInstantRequires Death Knight0 damage taken in the last 5 sec, [floor(0 / Total Health * 100)]% of your maximum health, will empower your next Death Strike.

115804.name: Mortal Wounds
115804.description: Mortal Wounds100 yd rangeInstantGrievously wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing received for 10 sec.

375258.name: Time Spiral
375258.description: Time Spiral100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarriorBend time, allowing you and your allies within 40 yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next 10 sec, even if it is on cooldown.

1226903.name: Harvesting Slice
1226903.description: Harvesting SliceUnlimited range1.5 sec castThe caster deftly slices their current target, inflicting 64262 Physical damage and causing them to bleed for 3780 Physical damage every 1 sec for 10 sec. This effect stacks.

363799.name: Dominated Hearthstone
363799.description: Dominated HearthstoneItem Effect10 sec cast30 min cooldown1 ChargeReturns you to Hearthstone Location. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

119996.name: Transcendence: Transfer

57723.name: Exhaustion
57723.description: ExhaustionUnlimited rangeInstantCannot benefit from Heroism or other similar effects.

97547.name: Solar Beam
97547.description: Solar Beam100 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 16You summon a beam of solar light over the enemy target's location, interrupting the enemy target and silencing all enemy targets under the beam while it is active. Solar Beam lasts for 8 sec.

185313.name: Shadow Dance
185313.description: Allows use of all Stealth abilities and grants all the combat benefits of Stealth for 6 sec. Effect not broken from taking damage or attacking.

203795.name: Soul Fragment
203795.description: Soul Fragment100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterConsume a Soul Fragment, healing you for (435.094% of Attack Power) health.

467454.name: Charred
467454.description: CharredInstantThe goblin is injured from the crash, reducing health to 30%.

1223725.name: Fel Inferno
1223725.description: Fel InfernoUnlimited rangeInstantVelaryn wreathes the arena in flame, inflicting 4536 Fire damage to all players and an additional 983 Fire damage every 0.5 sec for 15 sec when each pillar of the inferno is created. This effect stacks.The flame inflicts 45381 Fire damage every 1 sec to any players who step into the firestorm.

197916.name: Lifecycles
197916.description: LifecyclesInstant45 sec cooldownRequires MonkRequires level 1[Sheilun's Gift / Vivify] has a 20% chance to cause your next Rising Sun Kick or Enveloping Mist to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.Enveloping Mist and Rising Sun Kick have a 20% chance to cause your next [Sheilun's Gift / Vivify] to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

441426.name: Exterminate
441426.description: Exterminate100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death Knight BloodAfter Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Marrowrends cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.The first scythe strikes your target for (715.45% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage and the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for (391% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage[and applies Frost Fever]. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. FrostAfter Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates or Frostscythes summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.The first scythe strikes your target for (530.368% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage and has a 100% chance to grant Killing Machine, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for (214.468% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage[and applies Frost Fever]. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

404551.name: Mana Spring
404551.description: Mana SpringLevel 80100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 10 RestorationYour Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 38 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers. ElementalYour Lava Burst casts restore 25 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers. EnhancementYour Lava BurstStormstrike casts restore 38 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.

86659.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings

195457.name: Grappling Hook

373268.name: Lifebind

1219712.name: Charged Lightning

111759.name: Levitate
