352542.name: Unstable Goods
352542.description: Unstable GoodsItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantYour ranged attacks and abilities have a chance to summon a Mailemental that throws Unstable Goods at your target, dealing (26925 * 1) Arcane damage.

429091.name: Inner Fire
429091.description: Inner Fire10 yd range2 sec castEmpowered by the light, increasing all damage done by 50%.Removal of Inner Fire causes the target to feel Overwhelmed, stunning for 4 sec.

315585.name: Instant Poison
315585.description: Instant Poison100 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueCoats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy which instantly inflicts (7.4% of Attack Power) Nature damage.

457496.name: Tidecaller's Guard
457496.description: Tidecaller's GuardInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 10Imbue your shield with the element of Water for 1 hour. Your healing done is increased by 2.0% and the duration of your Healing Stream Totem is increased by 3.0 sec.

110960.name: Greater Invisibility
110960.description: Greater InvisibilityInstantRequires MageMakes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

379029.name: Glacial Assault
379029.description: Glacial Assault100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageFlurry has a 12% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for (150% of Spell Power) Frost damage.Applies 1 stack of Freezing.

11327.name: Vanish
11327.description: VanishInstantRequires RogueRequires level 15Requires StealthAllows you to vanish from sight, entering stealth while in combat. For the first 3 sec after vanishing, damage and harmful effects received will not break stealth. Also breaks movement impairing effects.

33076.name: Prayer of Mending
33076.description: Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 235 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.

465462.name: Turbo Charge
465462.description: Turbo ChargeUnlimited rangeInstantGeezle siphons power from the generator into his battery pack, gaining 10 Electricity and emitting 4768 Nature damage to all players every 1 sec for 10 sec.

1217607.name: Void Metamorphosis
1217607.description: Void MetamorphosisInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires 50 Soul FragmentsYou ascend to a higher state of being, substantially empowering your abilities.While in Void Metamorphosis, your Consume and Reap are enhanced and your Fury will slowly drain. Additionally, Void Ray reduces your Fury drain, deals increased damage, and no longer consumes Fury.

469822.name: Tempered in Battle
469822.description: Tempered in Battle100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinWhen you or an ally wielding a Holy Bulwark are healed above maximum health, transfer 100% of the overhealing to your ally.When you or an ally wielding a Sacred Weapon drop below 40% health, redistribute your health immediately and every 1 sec for 4 sec. May only occur once per cast.

342246.name: Alter Time
342246.description: Alter TimeInstantRequires MageAlters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 seconds. Effect negated by long distance or death.

204090.name: Bullseye
204090.description: BullseyeInstantRequires HunterWhen your abilities damage a target below 20% health, you gain 1% increased critical strike chance for 6 sec, stacking up to 30 times.

1253836.name: Sanctified Armaments
1253836.description: Sanctified Armaments100 yd rangeInstantRequires Hunter SurvivalAn additional 15% of Raptor Strike's damage is dealt as Arcane damage over 6 sec. MarksmanshipAn additional 25% of Rapid Fire's damage is dealt as Arcane damage over 6 sec.

1242507.name: Dream Simulacrum
1242507.description: Dream SimulacrumUnlimited rangeInstantRequires EvokerRequires level 4Verdant Embrace healing is increased by 0%. In addition, it no longer causes you to leap to your target, instead sending forth a Dream Simulacrum.

218164.name: Detox
218164.description: Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

438471.name: Voracious Bite
438471.description: Voracious Bite30 yd range2 sec castAvanoxx leaps to her primary target and unleashes 3 consecutive bites. Each bite inflicts 26491 Physical damage and the final bite further increases damage taken by 50% for 10 sec.

589.name: Shadow Word: Pain
589.description: A word of darkness that causes 63 Shadow damage instantly, and an additional 424 Shadow damage over 16 sec.

108271.name: Astral Shift
108271.description: Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

78674.name: Starsurge
78674.description: Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 1,209 Astral damage.

15407.name: Mind Flay
15407.description:
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 2,107 Shadow damage over 4.0 sec and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

Generates 18 Insanity over the duration.

198533.name: Soothing Mist
198533.description: Soothing Mist60 yd rangeChanneled (8 sec cast)Requires MonkRequires level 10Heals the target for (1680% of Spell Power) over 8 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist [Surging Mist: Surging Mist] [Zen Pulse: Zen Pulse] and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.MistweaverFollows the target of your Enveloping Mist and Vivify.

2061.name: Flash Heal
2061.description: A fast spell that heals an ally for 2,610.

1277098.name: Lesser Ghoul
1277098.description: Lesser GhoulInstantRequires Death KnightA mindless servant of the Scourge, raised to obey its master's commands for 6 sec.

392061.name: Wailing Arrow
392061.description: Wailing Arrow100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Requires Ranged WeaponFire an enchanted arrow, dealing (1400% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to your target and an additional (700% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds of your target. Non-Player targets struck by a Wailing Arrow have their spellcasting interrupted and are silenced for 1 sec.Grants Deathblow.

1234565.name: Consume
1234565.description: ConsumeUnlimited range2 sec castAdarus drains the essence of players afflicted with Devourer's Ire, inflicting 3591 Cosmic damage and absorbing the next 10945 healing received.This blast applies Unending Hunger.

45242.name: Focused Will
45242.description: Focused WillInstantRequires PriestMelee attacks against you cause you to gain Focused Will, reducing [ Shadow: magic damage you take by 5% and physical damage you take by 15% for 8 sec / Discipline, Holydamage you take by 15% for 8 sec] Discipline, Holy stacking up to 1 times

1245470.name: Reaper's Toll
1245470.description: Reaper's TollInstantRequires Demon HunterViolently slash your scythe around you, dealing (247.5% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage to nearby enemies and generating 10 Fury. Shatters up to 2 soul fragments from nearby enemies.

1237775.name: Cosmic Radiation
1237775.description: Cosmic RadiationUnlimited rangeInstantDimensius radiates intense energy, inflicting 5 Cosmic damage to all players every 2 sec.

1242242.name: Arcane Overload
1242242.description: Arcane OverloadUnlimited rangeInstantArcane energy strikes the ground, inflicting 15 Arcane damage to players within 1.5 yards of impact.

100780.name: Tiger Palm
100780.description: Strike with the palm of your hand, dealing 31 Physical damage.

443614.name: Flight of the Red Crane
443614.description: Flight of the Red Crane100 yd rangeInstantRequires Monk[ Mistweaver: Refreshing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to grant you a stack of Mana Tea and quickly rush to 5 allies, healing each target for (125% of Spell Power)] [ Windwalker: Rushing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to increase your energy regeneration by 20% for 6 sec and quickly rush to 5 enemies, dealing (200% of Attack Power) Physical damage to each target struck]

355941.name: Dream Breath
355941.description: Dream Breath100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerInhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 40 yd cone in front of you for [(153.6% of Spell Power) + (30.72% of Spell Power) * (8 + 0)].I: Heals (153.6% of Spell Power) instantly and [(30.72% of Spell Power) * (8 + 0)] over (16 + 0) sec.II: Heals [(153.6% of Spell Power) + (30.72% of Spell Power) * 2] instantly and [(30.72% of Spell Power) * (6 + 0)] over (12 + 0) sec.III: Heals [(153.6% of Spell Power) + (30.72% of Spell Power) * 4] instantly and [(30.72% of Spell Power) * (4 + 0)] over (8 + 0) sec.

216521.name: Celestial Fortune
216521.description: Celestial FortuneInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1You have a chance equal to your critical strike chance to be healed for an additional 70% of the amount healed.

428169.name: Blinding Light
428169.description: Blinding Light50 yd range4 sec castMurrpray unleashes a dazzling light that inflicts 10596 Holy damage to all players. Players looking in Murrpray's direction suffer an additional 1060 Holy damage and are disoriented by the Blinding Light for 4 sec.

1242006.name: Echoes of Fate
1242006.description: Echoes of Fate100 yd rangeInstantSoul-Scribe's energy radiates 2119 Arcane damage every 2 sec to all players.

45182.name: Cheating Death
45182.description: Cheating DeathInstantFatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.

444347.name: Death Charge
444347.description: Death ChargeInstant45 sec cooldown1 ChargeRequires Death KnightRequires level 1Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.

1277016.name: Putrefy
1277016.description: Putrefy100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightSummon a Lesser Ghoul to strike the enemy for (234.9% of Attack Power) Shadow damage and have them explode for (121.5% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to nearby enemies.

1249791.name: Combo Strikes: Touch of Death
1249791.description: Combo Strikes: Touch of DeathInstantRequires MonkYour last ability to trigger Mastery: Combo Strikes was Touch of Death.

1245654.name: Burning Blades
1245654.description: Burning Blades100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterThrow Glaive causes targets to take an additional 80% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.

316493.name: Elusive Quickhoof

34914.name: Vampiric Touch
34914.description:
A touch of darkness that causes 1,987 Shadow damage over 21 sec, and heals you for 30% of damage dealt. If Vampiric Touch is dispelled, the dispeller flees in Horror for 3 sec.

Generates 4 Insanity.

1214642.name: Bigger Badder Bomb Blast
1214642.description: Bigger Badder Bomb BlastUnlimited rangeInstantGallywix shells his primary target with many explosives inflicting 100 Physical damage and increases Bigger Badder Bomb Blast damage taken by 200% for 1.2 min. This effect stacks and cannot be dodged or parried.Additionally inflicts 100 Fire damage to players within 30 yards of the primary target, applying Blast Burns. These munitions (mostly) detonate on impact.However, some of the fuze within the bunch scatters about the arena.

438618.name: Venomous Spit
438618.description: Venomous Spit40 yd rangeInstantSpits venom at a random player, inflicting 2119 Nature damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.

469719.name: Uncontrolled Burn
469719.description: Uncontrolled Burn300 yd rangeInstantThe chaotic destruction burns, inflicting 1582 Fire damage to all players every 0.5 sec for 10 min. This effect stacks.

1233272.name: Lunar Eclipse
1233272.description: Lunar EclipseInstant32 sec cooldown1 ChargeRequires DruidEnter a Lunar Eclipse, empowering Starfire for 15 sec.Casting Wrath changes this to Solar Eclipse. Eclipse (Lunar)Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and Starfire's damage is increased by 40%.

444296.name: Impale
444296.description: Impale40 yd rangeInstantImpales a random target, inflicting 8 Physical damage and causing the target to bleed for 8 Physical damage every 5.2 sec for until canceled.

1244998.name: Astral Harvest
1244998.description: Astral HarvestUnlimited rangeInstantThe Arcane Collector draws energy from several players, inflicting 15147 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 4 sec. Upon expiration, an Arcane Manifestation forms at each player's location.

211793.name: Remorseless Winter
211793.description: Remorseless WinterInstantRequires Death KnightDrain the warmth of life from all nearby enemies within 8 yards, dealing [9 * (9.033% of Attack Power) * [(Attack Power * 0.98)][((Attack Power + Offhand Attack Power) * 2 / 3)] -- 2H, DW / Attack Power] Frost damage over 8 sec and reducing their movement speed by 20%.

1264676.name: Starfall
1264676.description: Starfall200 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 29Calls down waves of falling stars upon enemies within 40 yds, dealing [(50% of Spell Power) * 9] Astral damage over 8 sec.

1249754.name: Combo Strikes: Spinning Crane Kick
1249754.description: Combo Strikes: Spinning Crane KickInstantRequires MonkYour last ability to trigger Mastery: Combo Strikes was Spinning Crane Kick.

1239229.name: K'areshi Surge
1239229.description: K'areshi SurgeInstantThe siphon explodes with energy of K'aresh, granting players within 15 yards 10% increased haste and 10% increased movement speed for 30 sec.

1257742.name: Exodar Replica
1257742.description: Exodar ReplicaItem EffectInstantSummon a replica of the Exodar to travel alongside you.

115294.name: Mana Tea
115294.description: Mana TeaLevel 80Channeled (3 sec cast)Requires MonkConsumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.5 sec to restore 1080 Mana.Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.

455979.name: Hideshaper's Workbag
455979.description: Hideshaper's WorkbagItem EffectInstantIncreases your Resourcefulness rating by 90 when crafting Leatherworking reagents. [Equip effect requires Khaz Algar Leatherworking 1][Equip effect requires Khaz Algar Leatherworking 1]

1219480.name: Ascendance
1219480.description: AscendanceInstant3 min cooldownRequires ShamanRequires level 50Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 75% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

1228115.name: Netherbreaker
1228115.description: NetherbreakerUnlimited range2 sec castSalhadaar hurls his mace which ricochets between several targets, inflicting 130037 Shadow damage within 30 yards of each impact.

1228100.name: Arcane Siphon

This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

1243694.name: Shattered Space

1256302.name: Voidfall

Damage reduced beyond 8 targets. VengeanceFracture has a 35% chance to grant 1 stack of Voidfall.Upon reaching 3 stacks of Voidfall, Soul Cleave consumes a stack to reach into the Void and call down a meteor strike at your target's location, dealing (540% of Attack Power) Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets. (700ms cooldown)

1246167.name: The Hunt

MarksmanshipTrueshot causes you to surrender to darkness, granting you Withering Fire for the duration of Trueshot and Deathblow. Withering FireCasting Black Arrow fires a barrage of 2 additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at 50% effectiveness, prioritizing enemies that aren't affected by Black Arrow's damage over time effect.

1227276.description: Soulfray Annihilation300 yd rangeInstantThe Soulbinder Naazindhri unleashes an orb in the direction of randomly targeted players, inflicting 60520 Arcane damage to any player struck by the orb and causing them to take 15% increased damage for 20 sec.If a Binding Chamber is hit by the orb, its shield is destroyed and the Unbound Soul within takes 200% increased damage.

1218625.name: Displacement Matrix
1218625.description: Displacement Matrix300 yd rangeInstantThe Displacement Matrix detonates when touched, inflicting 30997 Arcane damage and stunning players within 8 yards, leaving behind Potent Mana Residue.Additionally, the activating player will be teleported to a random nearby location.

1219704.name: Binding Javelin
1219704.description: Binding Javelin100 yd rangeInstantTaah'bat launches arcane javelins at targeted players, inflicting 10596 Arcane damage to players within 8 yards of the targets and tethering all players struck. Each tether inflicts 2649 Arcane damage every 1 sec and reduces their movement speed by 50%, increasing in intensity every 5 seconds until the javelin is destroyed. This effect stacks.

375256.name: Time Spiral
375256.description: Time Spiral100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanBend time, allowing you and your allies within 40 yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next 10 sec, even if it is on cooldown.

1228188.name: Silencing Tempest
1228188.description: Silencing TempestUnlimited rangeInstantAraz rains down arcane energy at players' destinations every 1 sec for 6 sec, inflicting 121253 Arcane damage to players within 3.5 yards of the impact location and silencing them for 6 sec.

1247422.name: Scorching Valor
1247422.description: Scorching Valor1.5 sec castSummons and dismisses this mount."Some cannot be held back or restrained. Scorching Valor will seek greatness and only serve those who can serve their pursuit."In-Game Shop

1242998.name: Lesser Ghoul
1242998.description: Lesser GhoulInstantRequires Death KnightA mindless servant of the Scourge, raised to obey its master's commands for 6 sec.

198793.name: Vengeful Retreat
198793.description: Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 5 Physical damage.

234153.name: Drain Life
234153.description: Drains life from the target, causing 1,140 Shadow damage over 4.5 sec, and healing you for 500% of the damage done.

1224375.name: Shattered Shards
1224375.description: Shattered ShardsUnlimited rangeInstantCrystalline shards inflict 22681 Physical damage to players within range of Shattering Shield's explosion. Additionally, these players bleed for 7560 Physical damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.

472324.name: Howl of the Pack Leader
472324.description: Howl of the Pack LeaderInstantRequires HunterWhile in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast. WyvernA Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 12 sec. BoarA Boar charges through your target 1 time, dealing (1200% of Attack Power) physical damage to the primary target and (1440% of Attack Power) damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. BearA Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing (400% of Attack Power) damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

451447.name: Don't Look Back
451447.description: Don't Look BackInstantRequires HunterConsuming Sentinel's Mark grants you an absorb shield equal to 10.0% of your maximum health.

443616.name: Heart of the Jade Serpent
443616.description: Heart of the Jade Serpent100 yd rangeInstantRequires Monk WindwalkerStrike of the Windlord and Whirling Dragon Punch call upon Yu'lon to increase the cooldown recovery rate of Fists of Fury, Strike of the Windlord, Rising Sun Kick, and Whirling Dragon Punch by 75% for 8 sec. The channel time of Fists of Fury is reduced by 50% while Yu'lon is active. MistweaverThunder Focus Tea calls upon Yu'lon to increase the cooldown recovery rate of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for 8 sec.

171850.name: Llothien Prowler
171850.description: Llothien Prowler1.5 sec castSummons and dismisses your Llothien Prowler."These sleek foxes can prowl amongst newly-fallen leaves without making a sound, even at this size."Quest: Volpin the ElusiveZone: Suramar

1246798.name: Prompt Prognosis
1246798.description: Prompt Prognosis100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestCasting Prayer of Mending heals your target for (940% of Spell Power).

52150.name: Raise Dead
52150.description: Raise Dead30 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightRaises a [Glyph of the Geist: Geist / Ghoul] to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one [Glyph of the Geist: Geist / Ghoul] at a time.

1221150.name: Collapsing Star
1221150.description: Collapsing Star25 yd range3 sec cast5 sec cooldownRequires Demon HunterChannel an immense amount of void energy into a single, cataclysmic blast, dealing (562.5% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage to your target and [(562.5% of Spell Power) * 0.5] Cosmic damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.While casting Collapsing Star, your Fury drain is significantly reduced.

414219.name: Shadowrooted Grippers
414219.description: Shadowrooted GrippersInstantWear a pair of Darkroot Grippers over your armor allowing you to pull Shadowrooted Vines out of the ground.Vines can be found in the Fungal Field and nearby keyflame areas.

1225298.name: Loyal Customer
1225298.description: Loyal CustomerInstantThe Gallagio staff stacks the deck in your favor, increasing your damage dealt & healing done while inside Liberation of Undermine by 0%.

1220511.name: Arcane Overload
1220511.description: Arcane Overload3 sec castTaah'bat unleashes a series of arcane javelins into the air, inflicting 1589 Arcane damage to all players every 1 sec.

1248700.name: Evoke Spirit
1248700.description: Evoke Spirit100 yd rangeInstantCalls forth a spirit and begins to consume it, reducing damage taken by 99% for 9 sec. While consuming, every 3 sec the caster gains a shield absorbing damage equal to 10% of their own maximum health for 30 sec. This effect stacks.

462810.name: Weaver's Prodigy
462810.description: Weaver's ProdigyInstantProfessions Crafting and Gathering speed increased by 30%.

1216039.name: R.P.G.G.
1216039.description: R.P.G.G.Unlimited range2.5 sec castThe caster launches a volley of rockets from their R.P.G.G., inflicting 42386 Fire damage to players within 8 yards of impact.After firing, the R.P.G.G. must be reloaded.

80240.name: Havoc
80240.description: Marks a target with Havoc for 15 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 60% of the damage dealt.

160029.name: Resurrecting
160029.description: Resurrecting100 yd rangeInstantThe player is being resurrected.

697.name: Summon Voidwalker
697.description: Summons a Voidwalker under your command, able to withstand heavy punishment.

1224114.name: Toxic Eruption
1224114.description: Toxic EruptionInstantThe caster erupts with a poisonous explosion, inflicting 41581 Nature damage to players within 15 yards and knocking them away.Additionally, this ability inflicts 6048 Nature damage to players hit every 1 sec for 10 sec.

1246065.name: Abyssal Polearm
1246065.description: Abyssal PolearmInstantWhirl an Abyssal Polearm for 6 sec, dealing 14 Shadow damage to enemies within 5 yards every 0.5 sec.

1225537.name: Time is Money
1225537.description: Time is MoneyInstantMovement Speed inside Liberation of Undermine by 0% while out of combat.

23881.name: Bloodthirst
23881.description:
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 148 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage and has a 30% chance to Enrage you.

1242759.name: Twin Echoes
1242759.description: Twin EchoesInstantRequires EvokerCasting Emerald Blossom causes your next Echo to cast on an additional ally within 25 yards at 100% effectiveness.

1231195.name: Massive Smash
1231195.description: Massive Smash1000 yd rangeInstantDimensius smashes his current target with devastating force, inflicting 199591 Physical damage and 136085 Cosmic damage to players within 20 yards and applying Mortal Fragility.The force of the attack ripples outward through space inflicting 48386 Cosmic damage to all other players, knocking them away from the impact location, and scattering Living Mass.

469480.name: Sludge Claws
469480.description: Sludge ClawsUnlimited rangeInstantSwampface ravages the target with gruesome claws, inflicting 74175 Physical damage and 21193 Nature damage. The muddy gashes absorb 74175 healing.

1218297.name: Noggenfogger Select UP
1218297.description: Noggenfogger Select UPItem EffectInstant0.5 sec cooldownBecome slightly larger. Stacks up to ten times.

1236207.name: Astral Surge
1236207.description: Astral SurgeUnlimited rangeInstantThe Arcane Collector surges with energy if it contacts an Arcane Manifestation, inflicting 121703 Arcane damage to all players and an additional 45362 Arcane damage every 2 sec for 16 sec.

196277.name: Implosion
196277.description: Demonic forces suck 6 of your Wild Imps toward the target, and then cause them to violently explode, dealing 524 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

217200.name: Barbed Shot
217200.description:
Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 101 damage over 12 sec. If Barbed Shot is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Barbed Shot.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.

455366.name: Serrated Bone Spike
455366.description: Serrated Bone SpikeInstantRequires RoguePrepare a Serrated Bone Spike every 30 sec, stacking up to 3. Rupture spends a stack to embed a bone spike in its target. Serrated Bone Spike:Deals (174.24% of Attack Power) Physical damage and (17.424% of Attack Power) Bleed damage every 3 sec until the target dies or leaves combat.Refunds a stack when the target dies.Awards 1 combo point plus 1 additional per active bone spike.

1234817.name: Galactic Smash
1234817.description: Galactic SmashUnlimited rangeInstantImages of Salhadaar emerge alongside him to smash their targets with galactic force, applying Twilight Scar and inflicting 56 Cosmic damage to all players. Players farther from each target take less damage. Salhadaar's primary target is Starshattered. A Dark Star forms at each impact location.

228537.name: Shattered Souls
228537.description: Shattered SoulsUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterKilling an enemy sometimes creates a Soul Fragment that is consumed when you approach it, healing you for 20% of maximum health.If the Soul Fragment came from a Demon, you will deal 20% increased damage for 15 sec.

126664.name: Charge
126664.description: ChargeUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 10Charge to an enemy, dealing (21% of Attack Power) Physical damage, rooting it for 1 sec [Warbringer: and stunning it for until canceled].Generates 20 Rage.

1243105.name: Horrific Vision
1243105.description: Horrific Vision100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestYou create Horrific Visions when casting harmful spells on enemies.At 50 stacks of Horrific Visions, your target sees a nightmare, dealing (140% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and granting you 4.07 Insanity over 3 sec.At 100 stacks, your target witnesses a vision of N'Zoth, dealing (530% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and granting you 12.2 Insanity over 3 sec.

369299.name: Essence Burst
369299.description: Essence BurstInstantRequires EvokerLiving Flame has a 20% chance, and Reversion has a 15% chance to make your next Essence ability free. [Essence Attunement: Stacks 1 times]

466190.name: Thunder Punch
466190.description: Thunder PunchUnlimited range2.5 sec castGeezle consumes 10 Electricity to sucker punch the target with a jolting fist, knocking them back and inflicting 52982 Physical damage and 12716 Nature damage every 1 sec for 4 sec.

466124.name: Turbo Charge
466124.description: Turbo ChargeUnlimited rangeInstantGeezle siphons power from the generator into his battery pack, gaining 10 Electricity and emitting 4768 Nature damage to all players every 1 sec for 10 sec.

1226019.name: Reap
1226019.description:
Cut a hole in the fabric of reality, sending a concentrated bolt of cosmic matter towards your target, dealing 2,558 Cosmic damage.

Reap gathers up to 4 nearby souls.

436132.name: Binding's Boon
436132.description: Binding's BoonLevel 80Item EffectApproximately 2 procs per minuteYour spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants (14 / 4) to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

68530.name: Cologne Immune
68530.description: Cologne ImmuneItem Effect20 yd rangeInstantNegates the harmful effects of Irresistible Cologne. The caster can only be immune to one "scent" at a time.

471595.name: Mobilize Mechadrones
471595.description: Mobilize MechadronesUnlimited rangeInstantBig M.O.M.M.A. summons 4 Darkfuse Mechadrones to assist them in combat.

1218120.name: Incinerate
1218120.description: Incinerate2 sec cast2 sec cooldownThe caster inflicts 29310 Fire damage to all players, and an additional 1954 Fire damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.Balls of flame land nearby, inflicting 17097 Fire damage to players within 4.5 yards of the impact locations.

195975.name: Glacial Advance
195975.description: Glacial Advance100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightSummon glacial spikes from the ground that advance forward, each dealing [(63.4275% of Attack Power) * [(Attack Power * 0.98)][((Attack Power + Offhand Attack Power) * 2 / 3)] -- 2H, DW / Attack Power] Frost damage near their eruption point and applying Razorice.

449840.name: Halo
449840.description: Halo30 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestRequires level 1Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 40 yd radius, healing allies for (161% of Spell Power) and dealing [(144.2% of Spell Power) * 1] Holy damage to enemies.Healing reduced beyond 0 targets.

468037.name: Black Arrow
468037.description: Black Arrow40 yd rangeInstantRequires Hunter Beast MasteryBestial Wrath causes you to surrender to darkness, granting you Withering Fire for 10 sec and Deathblow. Withering FireCasting Black Arrow fires a barrage of 2 additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at 50% effectiveness, prioritizing enemies that aren't affected by Black Arrow's damage over time effect. MarksmanshipTrueshot causes you to surrender to darkness, granting you Withering Fire for the duration of Trueshot and Deathblow. Withering FireCasting Black Arrow fires a barrage of 2 additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at 50% effectiveness, prioritizing enemies that aren't affected by Black Arrow's damage over time effect.

17962.name: Conflagrate
17962.description:
Triggers an explosion on the target, dealing 1,374 Fire damage.

Generates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.

453584.name: Charge
453584.description: Charge40 yd rangeInstantThe caster charges towards an enemy to attack, inflicting 5298 Physical damage.

1217242.name: Enlightened
1217242.description: EnlightenedInstantRequires MageArcane damage dealt is increased based on your current mana, up to 6% at full mana.Mana Regen is increased based on your current mana, up to 20% when out of mana.

1276467.name: Grimoire: Fel Ravager
1276467.description:
Summons a Fel Ravager to assist you in combat for 20 sec and will interrupt their target when summoned.

Turns into Spell Lock while on cooldown.

157331.name: Wind Gust
157331.description: Wind Gust40 yd range2 sec castRequires ShamanRequires level 1Conjures a gust of wind that deals (150% of Spell Power) Nature damage to an enemy.

1220551.name: Unstable Cluster Bomb
1220551.description: Unstable Cluster Bomb300 yd rangeInstantThe mine explodes into a cluster of bombs, inflicting 13189 Fire damage to players within 4 yards of the impact locations.Clusters that fail to hit a player inflict 43965 Fire damage to all players.

1224868.name: Splinters of Fate
1224868.description: Splinters of Fate100 yd rangeInstantSoul-Scribe splinters the soul of every player, summoning multiple echoes of their Fate and causing them to suffer 10596 Arcane damage.

191634.name: Stormkeeper
191634.description: Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.

157228.name: Owlkin Frenzy
157228.description: Owlkin FrenzyInstantRequires DruidRequires level 16Shapeshift into [Glyph of Stars: Astral Form / Moonkin Form], increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.BalanceWhile in this form, single-target attacks against you have a 101% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

25771.name: Forbearance
25771.description: ForbearanceUnlimited rangeInstantRequires PaladinCannot be affected by Divine Shield, Hand of Protection, or Lay on Hands for 30 sec.

1234266.name: Cosmic Fragility
1234266.description: Cosmic Fragility1000 yd rangeInstantIncreases Cosmic damage taken by 150%. This effect stacks.

367902.name: Volatile Satchel
367902.description: Volatile SatchelLevel 80100 yd rangeInstantYour melee attacks and abilities have a high chance to attach a Volatile Satchel onto your target. Upon reaching 3 stacks, or when removed, the Volatile Satchel detonates, inflicting (1 * 34877) Fire damage.

449001.name: Power of Nature
449001.description: Power of NatureInstant15 sec cooldownRequires Druid[ Balance: Your Force of Nature treants no longer taunt and deal 200% increased melee damage / RestorationYour Grove Guardians increase the healing of your Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom by 10% while active]

382024.name: Earthliving Weapon
382024.description: Earthliving Weapon100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 10Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, and Chain Heal healing has a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for (138.915% of Spell Power) over 6 sec.

433550.name: Rite of Sanctification
433550.description: Rite of SanctificationInstantRequires PaladinImbue your weapon with the power of the Light, increasing your armor by 5% and your primary stat by 2%.Lasts 1 hour.

1242654.name: Reaping
1242654.description: ReapingInstantRequires Death KnightScourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.Dark Transformation resets Soul Reaper's cooldown and allows it to be used on any target.

473070.name: Awaken the Swamp
473070.description: Awaken the Swamp4 sec castSwampface repeatedly smashes the ground every 1 sec for 4 sec, inflicting 3656 Nature damage to all players and causing Skewering Roots to erupt from the riverbed.

1219040.name: Soulweave
1219040.description: Soulweave300 yd range1.683 min castThe Unbound Soul is slowly wrapped in silk bindings, transforming into a member of the Shadowguard.

448248.name: Revolting Volley
448248.description: Revolting Volley40 yd range3.5 sec castBloodstained Webmage unleashes a Revolting Volley inflicting 12716 Nature damage to all players within 100 yds and injects all targets with a poison inflicting 3179 Nature damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.

467492.name: Precision Blasting
467492.description: Precision BlastingLevel 80InstantYour spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal (22421 * 1) Physical damage to your target.

390163.name: Sigil of Spite
390163.description:
Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 2 sec.

Detonates to deal 243 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

469297.name: Sabotaged Controls
469297.description: Sabotaged ControlsUnlimited rangeInstantDamaged Giga Controls spark profusely inflicting 6448 Nature damage to targeted players every 6 sec. This effect stacks for each Sabotaged Control, and is definitely against regulation.

1248009.name: Dark Terminus
1248009.description: Dark Terminus300 yd range7 sec castAraz abandons the ritual at 15% health and opens a Dark Singularity, inflicting 52922 Shadow damage to all players.

374251.name: Cauterizing Flame
374251.description: Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 1,330 upon removing any effect.

974.name: Earth Shield
974.description:
Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 332 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.

428439.name: Healing Elixir
428439.description: Healing ElixirInstant30 sec recharge2 ChargesRequires MonkRequires level 1Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 15% of your maximum health.

360995.name: Verdant Embrace
360995.description: Fly to an ally and heal them for 3,496, or heal yourself for the same amount.

212552.name: Wraith Walk
212552.description:
Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by 70% for 4 sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.

While active, your movement speed cannot be reduced below 170%.

459733.name: Summon Fenryr
459733.description: Summon FenryrInstantRequires HunterSummoning a Dire Beast 8 times sounds the Horn of Valor, summoning either Hati or Fenryr to battle.HatiIncreases the damage of all your pets by 4%.FenryrPounces your primary target, inflicting a heavy bleed that deals (800% of Attack Power) damage over 8 sec and grants you 4% Haste.

115399.name: Black Ox Brew
115399.description: Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

1264680.name: Sylvan Beckoning
1264680.description: Sylvan BeckoningInstantRequires Druid[ Balance: Entering an Eclipse summons a Dryad to assist you for 8 sec, casting Starsurge dealing (150% of Spell Power) astral damage and Starfall at 200% effectiveness / RestorationYour periodic heals have a chance to empower your next Swiftmend to summon a Dryad to assist you, casting Tranquility at 10% effectiveness and Regrowth to heal (658.507% of Spell Power) damage onto your lowest health ally]

1256617.name: World Killer
1256617.description: World Killer100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon Hunter Havoc, DevourerConsume has a 35% chance to grant 1 stack of Voidfall.Upon reaching 3 stacks of Voidfall, Reap consumes a stack to reach into the Void and call down a meteor strike at your target's location, dealing (200% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage to all enemies within 8 yards. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets. VengeanceFracture has a 35% chance to grant 1 stack of Voidfall.Upon reaching 3 stacks of Voidfall, Soul Cleave consumes a stack to reach into the Void and call down a meteor strike at your target's location, dealing (540% of Attack Power) Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

61295.name: Riptide
61295.description: Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 1,853 and an additional 1,018 over 18 sec.

1214934.name: Double Trouble
1214934.description: Double TroubleInstantRequires RogueModifies Effect #2's Value +1: Ambush, Sinister StrikeModifies Damage/Healing Done +15%: Ambush, Sinister Strike

1259491.name: Purging Flames
1259491.description: Purging FlamesInstantRequires ShamanVoltaic Blaze unleashes volcanic rage, causing your next Lava Burst to also fire at 5 additional targets with your Flame Shock at 80% effectiveness with reduced Maelstrom generation.Lava Burst damage increased by 10%.

1238765.name: Extinction
1238765.description: Extinction5 sec castDimensius hurls a fragment of a broken world at players, inflicting 272170 Cosmic damage to players caught in its path and stunning them for 4 sec.

1224825.name: Tyranny
1224825.description: TyrannyUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar's imperious presence inflicts 12096 Shadow damage to all players every 2 sec.

406139.name: Chi Cocoon
406139.description: Chi Cocoon40 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkEncases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 10 sec, absorbing [Total Health * 24 / 100 * (1 + Versatility)] damage.

1231328.name: Shattered Core
1231328.description: Shattered CoreChanneled (1.5 sec cast)The protective core shatters, leaving the caster stunned for 1.5 sec.

1064.name: Chain Heal
1064.description: Heals the friendly target for 878, then jumps up to 20 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

431303.name: Night Bolt
431303.description: Night BoltUnlimited range2.5 sec castHurls shadow magic at a player, inflicting 12716 Shadow damage.

1213803.name: Nailed
1213803.description: NailedUnlimited rangeInstantThe architect fires a nailgun at a player, inflicting 8477 Physical damage and causing them to bleed for 2119 Physical damage every 1 sec for 3 sec.

1220497.name: Arcane Overload
1220497.description: Arcane Overload100 yd rangeInstantTaah'bat unleashes a series of arcane javelins into the air, inflicting 1589 Arcane damage to all players every 1 sec.

453112.name: Power Surge
453112.description: Power SurgeInstantRequires PriestRequires level 1Casting Halo also causes you to create a Halo around you at 100% effectiveness every 5 sec for 10 sec.

102560.name: Incarnation: Chosen of Elune
102560.description:
An improved Moonkin Form that grants both Eclipses, any learned Celestial Alignment bonuses, and 10% critical strike chance.

Lasts 20 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

1822.name: Rake
1822.description:
Rake the target for 10 Bleed damage and an additional 57 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.

235450.name: Prismatic Barrier
235450.description:
Shields you with an arcane force, absorbing 7,637 damage and reducing magic damage taken by 15% for 1 min.

The duration of harmful Magic effects against you is reduced by 25%.

1247415.name: Weakened Prey
1247415.description: Weakened PreyUnlimited rangeInstantVelaryn exposes any players struck along the path of The Hunt, increasing their damage taken from standing in the path of The Hunt by 500% for 10 sec.

185311.name: Crimson Vial
185311.description: Drink an alchemical concoction that heals you for 20% of your maximum health over 4 sec.

453239.name: Student of Suffering
453239.description: Student of SufferingInstantRequires Demon Hunter[ Havoc: Eye Beam / DevourerVoid Ray] applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by (8 * $mas)% and granting 5 Fury every 2 sec, for 6 sec.

451091.name: Plant Arathi Bomb
451091.description: Plant Arathi Bomb5 yd range5 sec castPlants an Arathi Bomb on the Order of Night Airship.Arathi BombUnlimited range15 sec castThe Arathi Bomb detonates knocking back and inflicting 900 Fire damage to all players on the airship.

1237769.name: Echoing Invocation
1237769.description: Echoing InvocationUnlimited range2 sec castAraz's echo triggers an Arcane Collector to begin its Prime Sequence.

1227338.name: Impending Apocalypse
1227338.description: Impending ApocalypseInstantRequires Demon HunterEach Collapsing Star you cast increases the damage of your next Collapsing Star by 30%.

1259486.name: Zero In
1259486.description: Zero InInstantRequires RogueYour auto-attack critical strikes increase the damage and critical strike chance of your next Between the Eyes by 3%, stacking up to 20 times.

357212.name: Pyre
357212.description: Pyre100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerLob a ball of flame, dealing (400.277% of Spell Power) Fire damage to your target and all enemies within 8 yds.

6789.name: Mortal Coil
6789.description: Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.

1160.name: Demoralizing Shout
1160.description: Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 20% for 8 sec.

449217.name: Suffocating Darkness
449217.description: Suffocating Darkness100 yd rangeInstantNerubian NoveltiesPermanently enchants a weapon with the Authority of the Depths. Damaging foes may invoke it, applying Suffocating Darkness which periodically inflicts (1 * 242) Shadow damage. The darkness may deepen up to 3 times. Cannot be applied to items lower than level 70.

453407.name: Whirling Water
453407.description: Whirling WaterInstantRequires ShamanYour next Healing Wave also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 50% effectiveness.

375087.name: Dragonrage
375087.description:
Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at 3 enemies within 25 yds.

For 18 sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to 100%.

427469.name: Fireball
427469.description: Fireball40 yd range2.5 sec castInflicts 12716 Fire damage.

1245575.name: Devourer's Ire
1245575.description: Devourer's IreUnlimited range12 sec castAdarus hurls orbs of ravenous void at several locations, inflicting 30241 Cosmic damage to all players if not intercepted.Adarus focuses his gaze upon players who intercepted these orbs, continually assailing them with Consume and increasing their Physical damage taken by 100%.Upon removal, Devourer's Ire transfers to a nearby player and inflicts 11340 Cosmic damage to all players.

262485.name: Power Leech

Hammers then spiral outwards from the impact location, inflicting 31787 Holy damage to players in their path. While empowered by Vindictive Wrath, Hammer of Purity hits 5 players.

ProtectionCooldown of Shield Wall, Intervene, Spell Reflection, Storm Bolt, and Pummel reduced by 10%.Successfully interrupting an enemy increases the damage you deal to them by 5% for 10 sec.

8092.name: Mind Blast

378990.name: Lycara's Teachings

BoarA Boar charges through your target 1 time, dealing (1200% of Attack Power) physical damage to the primary target and (1440% of Attack Power) damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. MistweaverThunder Focus Tea calls upon Yu'lon to increase the cooldown recovery rate of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for 8 sec.

1243373.name: Devour

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.

187827.description: Transform to demon form for 15 sec, increasing current health by 40%, healing for that amount, and increasing Armor by 200%.

101568.name: Dark Succor

212988.name: Painbringer
212988.description: PainbringerInstantRequires Demon HunterConsuming a Soul Fragment reduces all damage you take by 3% for 8 sec.

1242875.name: Screams of a Forgotten Sky: An'xoth
1242875.description: Screams of a Forgotten Sky: An'xothItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantYour harmful spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target with an abyssal comet, dealing (22601 * 1) Cosmic damage and amplifying their gravity to increase the damage of future comets by 5%.Upon death, enemies implode to deal 18049 Cosmic damage per gravity stack split between nearby enemies. Damage increased by 30% per additional enemy, up to 150%.

1229523.name: Dark Infusion
1229523.description: Dark InfusionChanneled (7 days cast)The caster infuses dark magic into the forge's arcane flows.

113942.name: Demonic Gateway
113942.description: Demonic GatewayInstantRequires WarlockFaded into the nether and unable to use another Demonic Gateway.

447244.name: Call of the Ancestors

101033.name: Resurgence
101033.description: ResurgenceInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 1Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.

232698.name: Shadowform
232698.description: Assume a Shadowform, increasing your spell damage dealt by 10%.

460021.name: Hot Wheels
460021.description: Hot Wheels150 yd rangeInstantThe Geargrinder Biker charges towards a player's location, inflicting 43965 Fire damage to players in their path and knocking them back.

1213469.name: Dark Slug
1213469.description: Dark Slug45 yd range1.5 sec castShoots at a random enemy, inflicting 8793 Shadow damage.

385061.name: Odyn's Fury Off-Hand
385061.description: Odyn's Fury Off-HandInstantRequires WarriorRequires Melee WeaponUnleashes your power, dealing [(182.598% of Attack Power)% + (182.598% of Attack Power)% + (182.598% of Attack Power)% + (182.598% of Attack Power)%] Physical damage and an additional (520% of Attack Power) Bleed damage over 4 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.Enrages you and generates 20 Rage.

259495.name: Wildfire Bomb
259495.description:
Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for 54 Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for 44 Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Deals 60% increased damage to your primary target.

202147.name: Second Wind
202147.description: Second WindInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 1Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

1229325.name: Oblivion
1229325.description: OblivionUnlimited rangeInstantDimensius instantly devours any player who enters his body for any reason, killing them horribly.

435203.name: Thunder Clap
435203.description: Thunder Clap100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarriorBlasts all enemies within 8 yards for (235.68% of Attack Power) Physical damage [Thunderstruck: roots them for 4 sec] and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. [Rend: Inflicts Rend on all targets / If you know Rend, inflicts Rend on all targets.][Generates 0 Rage.]

473220.name: Sonic Boom
473220.description: Sonic Boom100 yd range3 sec castBig M.O.M.M.A. blasts a pulse of sonic energy towards a player which inflicts 10596 Sonic damage every 0.5 sec while dragging and silencing players within.The pulse explodes upon colliding with an obstacle, inflicting 26491 Sonic damage to players within 7 yards.

1219450.name: Manifest Matrices
1219450.description: Manifest Matrices300 yd range2 sec castThe Plexus Sentinel fires Arcane energy into players, inflicting 8694 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 6 sec. Upon expiration, a Displacement Matrix is created.

91797.name: Monstrous Blow
91797.description: Monstrous BlowMelee RangeInstant1.5 min cooldownRequires Death KnightRequires level 22Strike an enemy with a smashing attack, dealing (11.1384% of Attack Power) Physical damage and stunning for 2 sec.

1237208.name: Ethereal Empowerment
1237208.description: Ethereal EmpowermentUnlimited rangeInstantOverflowing with ethereal energy.

465660.name: Skyfury
465660.description: Skyfury100 yd rangeInstantGrants 1 extra attack on your next swing.

1223007.name: Burrowing Eruption
1223007.description: Burrowing Eruption50 yd range4 sec castThe caster burrows and then bursts from the ground, inflicting 37087 Nature damage to players within 7 yards of the impact and knocking them back.

449322.name: Mana Cascade
449322.description: Mana CascadeInstantRequires Mage ArcaneCasting Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap. FireConsuming Hot Streak grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

315341.name: Between the Eyes
315341.description:
Finishing move that blasts your target with your pistol, dealing Physical damage and increasing your damage dealt by 4%. Multiple instances of this bonus can overlap.
   1 point : 19 damage, 4 sec
   2 points: 37 damage, 6 sec
   3 points: 56 damage, 8 sec
   4 points: 75 damage, 10 sec
   5 points: 93 damage, 12 sec

34767.name: Summon Thalassian Charger
34767.description: Summons a Thalassian Charger, which serves as a mount.

443106.name: Courage of the White Tiger
443106.description: Courage of the White Tiger100 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1 WindwalkerTiger Palm has a chance to cause Xuen to claw your target for (337.5% of Attack Power) Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger guarantees your next cast activates this effect. MistweaverTiger Palm, Vivify, and Sheilun's Gift have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for (337.5% of Attack Power) Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.

1265968.name: Boiling Point
1265968.description: Boiling PointInstantRequires Death KnightHeart Strike has a chance to make your next Blood Boil empowered, dealing 50% increased damage and echoing after 3 sec.

468487.name: Incendiary Fire
468487.description: Incendiary Fire3 sec castThe Geargrinder focuses fire at several players for 6 sec, launching blazing shells at their location every 0.5 sec. Each shell inflicts 14655 Fire damage to players within 3 yards and burns away any Oil Slicks in the area.

428565.name: Summon Mother of Chaos
428565.description: Summon Mother of ChaosInstantRequires Warlock DestructionCasting Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. If Diabolic Ritual is already active, its duration is reduced by 1 sec instead.When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies. DemonologySpending a Soul Shard on a damaging spell grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. While Diabolic Ritual is active, each Soul Shard spent on a damaging spell reduces its duration by 1 sec.When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Hand of Gul'dan to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.

427359.name: Defend
427359.description: Defend10 yd rangeInstantThe caster raises their shield and focuses on protecting allies within 0 yards, reducing their damage taken by 50% for up to 5 sec.Interrupting this effect shatters the caster's defenses, increasing their damage taken by 25% for 10 sec.

388498.name: Secret Infusion
388498.description: Secret InfusionInstantRequires MonkAfter using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 4% of a stat. Only one stat increase may be active at once:Enveloping Mist: Critical strikeRenewing Mist: HasteRising Sun Kick: Versatility

460156.name: Jumpstart
460156.description: Jumpstart1.5 sec castOnce all Darkfuse Mechadrones are defeated, Big M.O.M.M.A. attempts to jumpstart their depleted battery. This process causes it to take 200% increased damage and release jolts of energy every 1.5 sec for 12 sec. Each jolt of energy inflicts 7629 Nature damage to all players.Once their reserves are fully recharged, Big M.O.M.M.A. leaves behind Excessive Electrification.

1856.name: Vanish
1856.description: Allows you to vanish from sight, entering stealth while in combat. For the first 3 sec after vanishing, damage and harmful effects received will not break stealth. Also breaks movement impairing effects.

361227.name: Return
361227.description: Brings a dead party member back to life with 35% health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.

1229328.name: Tick-Tock Canisters
1229328.description: Tick-Tock CanistersUnlimited rangeInstantAfter 6 sec these detonate inflicting 30 Fire damage to players within 4 yards. This damage splits evenly among effected players.

447433.name: Chain Heal
447433.description: Chain Heal100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanHeals the friendly target for (164.934% of Spell Power), then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 2 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

8690.name: Hearthstone
8690.description: HearthstoneItem Effect10 sec cast30 min cooldown1 ChargeReturns you to Hearthstone Location. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

210041.name: Demonic Appetite
210041.description: Demonic AppetiteInstantRequires Demon HunterChaos Strike has a chance to spawn a Lesser Soul Fragment. Consuming any Soul Fragment grants 20 Fury.

372245.name: Terror of the Skies
372245.description: Terror of the Skies100 yd rangeInstantRequires Evoker[Breath of Eons / Deep Breath] stuns enemies for 3 sec.

1227549.name: Banishment
1227549.description: BanishmentUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar exiles several players, inflicting 10887 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 8 sec. Upon expiration, each target bursts with torturous void inflicting 24495 Shadow damage.

191587.name: Virulent Plague

132157.name: Holy Nova
132157.description: An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 154 Holy damage to enemies and up to 118 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.

1238369.name: Arcane Overload

279910.name: Wild Imp
279910.description: Wild Imp100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockCalls down a demonic meteor full of Wild Imps which burst forth to attack the target.Deals up to [3 * (50.1188% of Spell Power)] Shadowflame damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target [Hand of Doom: applies Doom to each target] and summons 3 Wild Imps.

190446.name: Brain Freeze
190446.description: Brain Freeze100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageRequires level 10[Frostfire Bolt / Frostbolt] has a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal 50% increased damage.

1228284.name: Royal Ward
1228284.description: Royal WardInstantEnshrouded in regal shadows, reducing damage taken by 99%.

440836.name: Essence of Yu'lon

Damage reduced above 5 targets / RestorationWhen Grove Guardians are summoned, they grow Dream Petals on your target, healing up to 3 nearby allies for (146.4% of Spell Power)]

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.

1239221.name: Diamantine Voidcore

1231059.name: Essence Implosion

285452.name: Lava Burst

1238964.name: Bonemelt

247454.name: Spirit Bomb

1228502.name: Overwhelming Power

271971.name: Dreadbite

184364.name: Enraged Regeneration
184364.description: Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.

446403.name: Sacrificial Flame

148135.name: Chi Burst
148135.description: Chi Burst100 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing (280% of Attack Power) Nature damage to all enemies, and (220% of Attack Power) healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets. [ Brewmaster: Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks]

1229387.name: Eradicating Salvo
1229387.description: Eradicating Salvo300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel targets a player to be purged, firing two missiles in quick succession. Each missile inflicts 461176 Arcane damage split evenly between players within 6 yards and knocking players away from the primary target.If a missile fails to hit at least 5 players, it instead inflicts 90723 Arcane damage to all players. []

461191.name: Elemental Focusing Lens
461191.description: Elemental Focusing Lens60 yd rangeInstantYour damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal (1 * 2466) damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

1219417.name: Beastmaster's Bond
1219417.description: Beastmaster's Bond100 yd rangeInstantTaah'bat and A'wazj are bonded, causing them to share all damage taken.

336135.name: Adaptation

1261125.name: Cascading Calamity
1261125.description: Cascading CalamityInstantCasting Unstable Affliction on a target affected by your Unstable Affliction increases your Haste by 5% for 15 sec.

212106.name: Fel Devastation
212106.description: Fel DevastationInstantRequires Demon HunterUnleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for [(41.1% of Attack Power) * 10] Fire damage over 2 sec. [Fel Devastation: Causing damage also heals you for up to [(360% of Attack Power) * 10] health]

1258528.name: Mastery of Timeways
1258528.description: Mastery of TimewaysInstantIncreases experience gained from killing monsters and completing quests by 30%.Completing Timewalking dungeons refreshes the duration.

445444.name: Path of the Light's Reverence
445444.description: Path of the Light's Reverence10 sec cast8 hrs cooldownTeleport to the entrance to Priory of the Sacred Flame.

383978.name: Cold Steel, Hot Blood
383978.description: Cold Steel, Hot BloodInstantRequires WarriorBloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that deals 9 Bleed damage over 6 sec and heals you for the damage dealt.

186403.name: Sign of Battle
186403.description: Sign of BattleInstantHonor gains from Battleground objectives and wins increased by 50%.

1254762.name: Frailty
1254762.description: FrailtyUnlimited rangeInstantThe fragment draws upon the target's soul, reducing their healing received by 33%. This effect stacks.Players other than the target can collect the fragment, suffering 4536 Chaos damage every 0.5 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.

453461.name: Caltrops
453461.description: Caltrops100 yd rangeInstantLeaps nearby a random player and spreads Caltrops on the ground, causing any targets caught in the Caltrops to bleed for 3709 Physical damage every 0.5 sec and preventing movement.

472878.name: Sludge Claws

55090.name: Scourge Strike
55090.description:
An unholy strike that deals 38 Shadow damage and causing your plagues on the target to erupt, dealing their damage an additional time at 35% effectiveness.

Spreads Virulent Plague on the target to a nearby enemy.

57994.name: Wind Shear
57994.description: Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.

472325.name: Howl of the Pack Leader
472325.description: Howl of the Pack LeaderInstantRequires HunterWhile in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast. WyvernA Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 12 sec. BoarA Boar charges through your target 1 time, dealing (1200% of Attack Power) physical damage to the primary target and (1440% of Attack Power) damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. BearA Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing (400% of Attack Power) damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

6544.name: Heroic Leap
6544.description: Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 8 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

1237767.name: Adarus' Soul
1237767.description: Adarus' SoulInstantAdarus' soul pulses with power, inflicting 28 Cosmic damage to all players every 4 sec. This effect increases in strength by 2% each pulse.

1265751.name: Felfire Fist

1259101.name: Voltaic Blaze
1259101.description: Voltaic Blaze40 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanInstantly shocks the target and 5 enemies within 10 yds with blazing thunder, applying Flame Shock and dealing (400% of Spell Power) Nature damage. Always critically strikes.Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.ElementalGenerates 6 Maelstrom.

1236691.name: All-Devouring Nucleus
1236691.description: All-Devouring NucleusItem EffectInstantTaking damage has a high chance to cause you to devour the essence of nearby enemies, dealing 11120 Shadow damage split between them and healing you for 150% of the damage dealt.Fatal damage not exceeding 30388 instead restores you to 20% health and reconstitutes you as unstable void for 6 sec. Exceed 50% health to stabilize and avoid death. This effect may occur once per 8 min. The Nucleus is unable to deal damage while recharging.

31687.name: Summon Water Elemental
31687.description: Summons a Water Elemental to follow and fight for you.

189112.name: Infernal Strike

111771.description: Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.

1246053.name: Omega Fueled

1220669.name: Sabotaged Controls
1220669.description: Sabotaged ControlsUnlimited rangeInstantDamaged Giga Controls spark profusely inflicting 6448 Nature damage to targeted players every 6 sec. This effect stacks for each Sabotaged Control, and is definitely against regulation.

439200.name: Voracious Bite

386208.name: Defensive Stance

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

221886.name: Divine Steed
