1228206.name: Excess Mass
1228206.description: Excess Mass300 yd rangeInstantUpon defeat, Living Mass decays into Excess Mass that players can pick up.During Devour, players with Excess Mass can gather to project a zone of Collective Gravity.

73325.name: Leap of Faith
73325.description: Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

53600.name: Shield of the Righteous
53600.description: Slams enemies in front of you with your shield, causing 33 Holy damage, and increasing your Armor by 608 for 4.5 sec.

450756.name: Abyssal Howl
450756.description: Abyssal Howl3.5 sec castRallies allies absorbing 65569 damage and increasing all damage done by 10% while the absorb remains.

449336.name: Merely a Setback
449336.description: Merely a SetbackInstantRequires Mage ArcaneThe bonuses provided by your Barrier spells persist an additional 8 sec after your Barrier is removed. FireThe bonuses provided by your Barrier spells persist an additional 8 sec after your Barrier is removed.Additionally, Cauterize no longer deals damage to you.

459997.name: Hot Wheels
459997.description: Hot Wheels150 yd rangeInstantThe Geargrinder Biker charges towards a player's location, inflicting 43965 Fire damage to players in their path and knocking them back.

271881.name: Blade Rush
271881.description: Blade Rush20 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueCharge to your target with your blades out, dealing [(375.3% of Attack Power)% * 230 / 100] Physical damage to the target and (375.3% of Attack Power)% to all other nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8% targets.While Blade Flurry is active, damage to non-primary targets is increased by 100%.Generates 25 Energy over 5 sec.

281265.name: Holy Nova
281265.description: Holy NovaInstantRequires PriestRequires level 17An explosion of holy light around you deals up to (40.95% of Spell Power) Holy damage to enemies and up to (31.5% of Spell Power) healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.

1229050.name: Mastery of Timeways
1229050.description: Mastery of TimewaysInstantIncreases experience gained from killing monsters and completing quests by 30%.Completing Timewalking dungeons refreshes the duration.

1239424.name: Blighted Arrow
1239424.description: Blighted ArrowInstantRequires Death KnightAn unholy arrow that deals (34% of Attack Power) Shadow damage. When consuming Sudden Doom, your Death Coil commands your archer to fire an additional Blighted Arrow at 80% effectiveness. Epidemic will instead cause Blighted Arrow to ricochet and hit up to 5 additional targets.

292361.name: Embrace of Pa'ku
292361.description: Embrace of Pa'kuInstantApproximately 1 procs per minuteYour abilities have a chance to grant you 4% Critical Strike for 12 sec.

1242897.name: Screams of a Forgotten Sky: An'shuul
1242897.description: Screams of a Forgotten Sky: An'shuulItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantYour harmful spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target with an abyssal comet, dealing (22601 * 1) Cosmic damage and amplifying their gravity to increase the damage of future comets by 5%.Upon death, enemies implode to deal 18049 Cosmic damage per gravity stack split between nearby enemies. Damage increased by 30% per additional enemy, up to 150%.

207778.name: Downpour
207778.description: A burst of water at your Healing Rain's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 1,224.

375257.name: Time Spiral
375257.description: Time Spiral100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockBend time, allowing you and your allies within 40 yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next 10 sec, even if it is on cooldown.

1231252.name: Unstable Core
1231252.description: Unstable Core100 yd rangeInstantThe Unstable Core releases a burst of arcane energy every 1.5 sec, inflicting 10596 Arcane damage to a random player and leaving an Unstable Rift at their location.

257284.name: Hunter's Mark
257284.description:
Apply Hunter's Mark to the target, causing the target to always be seen and tracked by the Hunter.

Hunter's Mark increases the target's damage taken by 3%. Can only be applied to a target at a time.

1226788.name: Entropic Terror
1226788.description: Entropic TerrorInstantAfflicted players flee in terror for 3 sec.

450538.name: Soul Anathema
450538.description: Soul Anathema100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockUnleashing your demonic soul bestows a fiendish entity unto the soul of its targets, dealing (114.712% of Spell Power) Shadow damage over 10 sec.If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Soul Anathema.

91800.name: Gnaw
91800.description: GnawMelee RangeInstant1.5 min cooldownRequires Death KnightRequires level 22Bite and tear at a target's limbs, stunning it for 1 sec and dealing damage.

1236692.name: Void Reconstitution
1236692.description: Void ReconstitutionItem EffectInstantTaking damage has a high chance to cause you to devour the essence of nearby enemies, dealing 11120 Shadow damage split between them and healing you for 150% of the damage dealt.Fatal damage not exceeding 30388 instead restores you to 20% health and reconstitutes you as unstable void for 6 sec. Exceed 50% health to stabilize and avoid death. This effect may occur once per 8 min. The Nucleus is unable to deal damage while recharging.

45470.name: Death Strike
45470.description: Death StrikeInstantRequires Death KnightFocuses dark power into a strike [ Frost: with both weapons, that deals a total of [(153.12% of Attack Power) + (29.835% of Attack Power)] / Blood, Unholythat deals (153.12% of Attack Power)] Physical damage and heals you for 20.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 7.0% of maximum health.

382912.name: Well-Honed Instincts
382912.description: Well-Honed InstinctsInstantRequires DruidRequires level 60When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.

394754.name: Brief Outing
394754.description: Brief OutingInstantLindormi must return home before her absence is noticed.

231390.name: Trailblazer
231390.description: TrailblazerInstantRequires HunterYour movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.

1264949.name: Moonlight Chakram
1264949.description: Moonlight Chakram40 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Throw a chakram blessed with moonlight at your current target that will rapidly deal (284.4% of Attack Power) Physical damage 7 times, bouncing to other targets if they are nearby.

1234269.name: Cosmic Collapse
1234269.description: Cosmic Collapse1000 yd rangeInstantDimensius collapses space itself in an attempt to crush his target, inflicting 136085 Cosmic damage and 199591 Physical damage to players within 12 yards and applying Cosmic Fragility.

450599.name: Astral Communion
450599.description: Astral CommunionInstantRequires DruidIncreases maximum Astral Power by 20. Entering Eclipse reduces the Astral Power cost of your next Starsurge or Starfall by 15.

1218103.name: Eye Beam
1218103.description: Eye BeamUnlimited range2 sec castVelaryn channels a torrent of Fel energy towards her current target for 4 sec, inflicting 30241 Chaos damage and applying Fel-Singed every (1 / 2) sec to players within the beam and blasting them away.After the blast concludes, Velaryn will Felblade towards her current target.

212739.name: Epidemic
212739.description: Epidemic40 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightCauses each of your Virulent Plagues to flare up, dealing (56.8656% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to the infected enemy and (22.7465% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to foes nearby.Extends the duration of Dread Plague and Virulent Plague by 1.5 sec.

473836.name: Electrocrush
473836.description: ElectrocrushUnlimited rangeInstantBig M.O.M.M.A. crushes their target with an electrified claw, inflicting 38147 Nature damage and an additional 7417 Nature damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.

116670.name: Vivify
116670.description: Causes a surge of invigorating mists, healing the target for 967.

1277104.name: Javelineer
1277104.description: JavelineerUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarriorRange of your thrown abilities is increased by 5 yards.Damage dealt by Champion's Spear, Shattering Throw, and Wrecking Throw increased by 20%.Shattering Throw and Wrecking Throw silence non-players for 3 sec.

1215904.name: Volatile Mana
1215904.description: Volatile ManaUnlimited rangeInstantThe volatile energy explodes upon contact with a player, inflicting 50 Arcane damage and an additional 7 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 8 sec. The impact also knocks players upwards.

101643.name: Transcendence
101643.description: Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.

258921.name: Immolation Aura
258921.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon Hunter HavocEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec.

1263438.name: Empty the Cellar
1263438.description: Empty the Cellar40 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkExploding Keg can be reactivated within 20 sec to throw 5 additional kegs at nearby targets, each dealing (200% of Attack Power) Physical damage and reducing the cooldown of your Brews by 3.0 sec.

198013.name: Eye Beam
198013.description: Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 283 Chaos damage over 1.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

259388.name: Mongoose Fury
259388.description: Mongoose FuryInstantRequires HunterRaptor Strike increases the damage of Raptor Strike by 10% for 8 sec. Multiple applications may overlap.

434793.name: Resonant Barrage
434793.description: Resonant BarrageChanneled (8 sec cast)Unleashes loud trills inflicting 7417 Nature damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 8 sec.

468694.name: Uncontrolled Destruction
468694.description: Uncontrolled DestructionChanneled (6 sec cast)Zee takes charge by calling in bombs, rockets, and drones, inflicting 2470 Fire damage to all players every 0.5 sec for 6 sec. Players are then afflicted with Uncontrolled Burn.

17941.name: Agony
17941.description: AgonyInstantRequires WarlockInflicts increasing agony on the target, causing up to [(7.05528% of Spell Power) * 18 / 2 * 8] Shadow damage over 18 sec. Damage starts low and increases over the duration. Refreshing Agony maintains its current damage level.Agony damage sometimes generates 1 Soul Shard.

204255.name: Soul Fragment
204255.description: Soul Fragment100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterShear shatters the target's soul, leaving a Lesser Soul Fragment behind for 25 sec.Consuming a Lesser Soul Fragment heals you for 6% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 1% of maximum health.

33110.name: Prayer of Mending
33110.description: Prayer of MendingUnlimited rangeInstantRequires PriestRequires level 1Places a ward on an ally that heals them for (61% of Spell Power) the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.

446285.name: Malevolence
446285.description: Malevolence100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockDark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take (1265.51% of Spell Power) Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.

448405.name: Collapsing Void
448405.description: Collapsing Void100 yd rangeInstantRequires Priest DisciplineEach time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 10%.After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing (440% of Spell Power) Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds. ShadowEach time you cast Shadow Word: Madness, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 20%.After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing (440% of Spell Power) Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.

438494.name: Alerting Shrill
438494.description: Alerting ShrillInstantAvanoxx releases a loud screech, calling forth Starved Crawlers from their eggs and inflicting 3709 Physical damage every 0.5 sec to all players for 3 sec.

1217456.name: Jettison Kelp
1217456.description: Jettison KelpUnlimited rangeInstantFlings globs of rancid kelp from the caster's body every 0.5 sec for 5 sec, inflicting 4239 Nature damage to players struck.

1218593.name: Energy Cutter
1218593.description: Energy Cutter300 yd rangeInstantA rotating beam of arcane energy that inflicts 41581 Arcane damage to players in the area.

1269336.name: Shadowstrike
1269336.description: Shadowstrike100 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueRequires level 10Strike the target, dealing (486% of Attack Power) Physical damage.While Stealthed, you strike through the shadows and appear behind your target up to 25 yds away, dealing 25% additional damage.Awards 2 combo points.

438825.name: Poisonous Cloud
438825.description: Poisonous Cloud200 yd rangeInstantInflicts 12716 Nature damage to an enemy every 1 sec for until canceled.

1227734.name: Coalesce Voidwing
1227734.description: Coalesce VoidwingUnlimited range6.2 sec castThe coalesced Royal Voidwing pierces up from below, inflicting 362893 Cosmic damage to any player hit and knocking all players back.

198487.name: Zen Pulse
198487.description: Zen Pulse40 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next [Sheilun's Gift / Vivify] to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for (160% of Spell Power) increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.

195182.name: Marrowrend
195182.description:
Smash the target, dealing 52 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 92. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

1243113.name: Horrific Vision
1243113.description: Horrific VisionInstantRequires PriestYou create Horrific Visions when casting harmful spells on enemies.At 50 stacks of Horrific Visions, your target sees a nightmare, dealing (140% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and granting you 4.07 Insanity over 3 sec.At 100 stacks, your target witnesses a vision of N'Zoth, dealing (530% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and granting you 12.2 Insanity over 3 sec.

1224865.name: Fatebound
1224865.description: Fatebound100 yd rangeInstantConverged with Fate, increasing damage and healing done by 10% for 10 sec. This effect stacks.

212051.name: Reawaken
212051.description: Returns all dead party members to life with 35% of maximum health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.

1282710.name: Serpentine Strikes
1282710.description: Serpentine Strikes100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterCobra Shot critical damage dealt increased by 50%.When Cobra Shot critically strikes, it refunds 10 Focus.

44425.name: Arcane Barrage
44425.description:
Launches bolts of arcane energy at the enemy target, causing 294 Arcane damage. 

For each Arcane Charge, deals 107% additional damage.

Consumes all Arcane Charges.

1246531.name: Arcane Sigils
1246531.description: Arcane SigilsUnlimited rangeInstantThe Soulbinder Naazindhri enchants the Binding Chambers with dark sigils, protecting them from Soulfray Annihilation.A sigil is destroyed when struck by Soulfire Convergence and triggers Shatterpulse.

1244621.name: Void Tear
1244621.description: Void TearItem EffectMelee RangeInstantYour spells have a chance to bring the candle to life, summoning a waxen ally to light up your enemies.

1223671.name: Void Glare
1223671.description: Void GlareUnlimited rangeInstantThe caster unleashes a shadowy beam of energy into its current target, pushing them away and inflicting 11340 Shadow damage every 0.3 for 6 sec.Glare Splatter forms underneath the target.

339588.name: Sinrunner Blanchy
339588.description: Sinrunner Blanchy1.5 sec castSummons and dismisses this mount."In life, Blanchy appeared to be an affectionate, well-behaved horse of excellent disposition and appetite. What evils must she have committed in secret to have earned her place among the condemned souls of Revendreth?"NPC: Dead Blanchy Location: Revendreth

81340.name: Sudden Doom
81340.description: Sudden DoomInstantRequires Death KnightDread Plague has a 35% chance to exhilarate you, making your next Death Coil or Epidemic cost 15 less Runic Power and deal 35% increased damage. (100ms cooldown)

434424.name: Cloven Soul
434424.description: Cloven Soul100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockEnemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.

1219535.name: Rift Claws
1219535.description: Rift Claws100 yd rangeInstantA'wazj slashes their current target with its Arcane-charged claws, inflicting 31789 Arcane damage and causing them to bleed for 4239 Physical damage every 1 sec for 8 sec.

79206.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
79206.description: Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

1231501.name: Metamorphosis
1231501.description: Metamorphosis4 sec castVelaryn transforms into a demonic form.

35546.name: Fatal Flourish
35546.description: Fatal FlourishInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1Your off-hand attacks and Pistol Shots have a 25% chance to generate 8 Energy.

426401.name: Focused Will
426401.description: Focused WillInstantRequires PriestMelee attacks against you cause you to gain Focused Will, reducing [ Shadow: magic damage you take by 5% and physical damage you take by 15% for 8 sec / Discipline, Holydamage you take by 15% for 8 sec] Discipline, Holy stacking up to 1 times

460158.name: Jumpstart
460158.description: JumpstartInstantOnce all Darkfuse Mechadrones are defeated, Big M.O.M.M.A. attempts to jumpstart their depleted battery. This process causes it to take 200% increased damage and release jolts of energy every 1.5 sec for 12 sec. Each jolt of energy inflicts 7629 Nature damage to all players.Once their reserves are fully recharged, Big M.O.M.M.A. leaves behind Excessive Electrification.

1249065.name: Soulfire Convergence
1249065.description: Soulfire Convergence300 yd rangeInstantThe Soulbinder Naazindhri courses arcane energy through the bodies of several players, inflicting 11340 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 5 sec. Upon expiration, Soulrend Orbs explode from the target's body.

1217096.name: Ethereal Protection
1217096.description: Ethereal ProtectionLevel 80InstantApproximately 2 procs per minuteYour spells and abilities have a high chance to coalesce the energy around you, granting you a shield that reduces damage taken by 20% up to 20844 total damage.Upon falling below 40% health, gain this effect at 500% effectiveness. This effect may only occur once every 6 min. (100ms cooldown)

225119.name: Arcane Assault
225119.description: Arcane Assault40 yd rangeInstantRequires MageLaunches bolts of arcane energy at the enemy target, causing (17.25% of Spell Power) Arcane damage.

1263408.name: Vital Flame
1263408.description: Vital FlameInstantRequires MonkHeal for 50% of all Fire or Nature damage dealt by your spells and abilities.

1223417.name: Ethereal Reaping
1223417.description: Ethereal Reaping100 yd rangeInstantYour harmful spells and abilities have a chance to focus latent energies around you to inflict 10422 Arcane damage split between your target and nearby enemies. Enemies below 35% health take 20% additional damage.

469421.name: Lightbearer
469421.description: Lightbearer100 yd rangeInstantRequires Paladin10% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to 4 nearby allies, divided evenly among them.

1231720.name: Invoke Collector
1231720.description: Invoke CollectorUnlimited range2 sec castAraz triggers one of his Arcane Collectors to begin its Prime Sequence.

1236193.name: Siphon Power
1236193.description: Siphon Power20 yd rangeChanneled (5 sec cast)The caster siphons power from a nearby crystal, periodically launching Siphon Discharge at players within 60 yards.After channeling, the caster's damage done increases by 50%.

77472.name: Healing Wave
77472.description: An efficient wave of healing energy that restores 5,272 of a friendly targets health.

1260279.name: Nightfall
1260279.description: NightfallInstantRequires WarlockCorruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Malefic Grasp to deal 25% increased damage. Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Malefic Grasp channels 50% faster when affected.

1226277.name: Entropic Howl
1226277.description: Entropic Howl4 sec castThe caster releases a bone-rattling howl, inflicting 30241 Shadow damage to players within 60 yards and an additional 4536 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 12 sec.Additionally, this howl afflicts players with Entropic Terror.

453.name: Mind Soothe
453.description: Soothes enemies in the target area, reducing the range at which they will detect you by 10 yards. Only affects Humanoid and Dragonkin targets. Does not cause threat. Lasts 20 sec.

263725.name: Clearcasting
263725.description: ClearcastingInstantRequires MageCasting Arcane spells has a 10% chance to grant access to Arcane Missiles or make your next Arcane Explosion free.

455537.name: Symbiosis
455537.description: SymbiosisInstantEvery 10 in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 39 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

1259493.name: Flickering Steel
1259493.description: Flickering SteelInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1Sinister Strike and Ambush deal 20% increased damage. They also generate 5 Energy when they grant you Opportunity.

1214229.name: Armageddon-class Plating
1214229.description: Armageddon-class PlatingUnlimited rangeInstantDarkfuse agents hardened this metal as much as they could (then they rubbed some solvent on it - don't know what that's for), granting immunity to interrupt effects and absorbing 8930000 damage.

396092.name: Well Fed
396092.description: Well FedLevel 80InstantIncreases your primary stat by 5 for 1 hour.

77762.name: Lava Surge
77762.description: Lava SurgeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 19The Shaman's next Lava Burst casts instantly.Modifies Cast Time -100%: Lava BurstModifies Effect #2's Value 0%: Lava Burst

212653.name: Shimmer
212653.description: Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.

383104.name: Fueled by Violence
383104.description: Fueled by ViolenceInstantRequires WarriorYou are healed for 85% of the Bleed damage dealt by Rend and Deep Wounds.

469293.name: Giga Coils
469293.description: Giga CoilsUnlimited rangeInstantGallywix charges and activates The House of Chrome's Giga Coils inflicting 3664 Nature damage to all players every 1 sec. This effect stacks.Giga Bomb Detonation damages the Giga Controls interrupting Gallywix's Giga Coils, and Giga Coils become Sabotaged Coils upon losing both Giga Controls. This creates Sabotage Zone.

191034.name: Starfall
191034.description: Calls down waves of falling stars upon enemies within 40 yds, dealing 852 Astral damage over 8 sec. Multiple uses of this ability may overlap.

459669.name: Spew Oil
459669.description: Spew Oil300 yd rangeInstantThe Geargrinder launches oil at targeted players, forming an Oil Slick at their location and dousing players within 7 yards of the impact with oil, inflicting 4885 Nature damage every 1.5 sec for 12 sec.

45181.name: Cheated Death
45181.description: Cheated DeathUnlimited rangeInstantYou have a 0% chance to completely avoid any damaging attack that would otherwise kill you and reduce all damage taken by 85% for 3 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once per minute.

388615.name: Restoral
388615.description:
Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 23,169 and clears them of all harmful Poison and Disease effects. 

Castable while stunned.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

423015.name: Castigator's Shield
423015.description: Castigator's Shield300 yd range1 sec castBraunpyke hurls a holy shield at several players, inflicting 15417 Holy damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 5 sec upon impact. While empowered by Vindictive Wrath, Castigator's Shield hits 5 players.

424432.name: Holy Radiance
424432.description: Holy Radiance100 yd rangeInstantElaena Emberlanz channels the wrath of the light, inflicting 3974 Holy damage to all players every 1 sec for 8 sec.

430191.name: Warband Mentored Leveling
430191.description: Warband Mentored LevelingInstantIncreases all Experience by 5% up to level 0.

1223612.name: Ethereal Barrier
1223612.description: Ethereal Barrier100 yd rangeInstantYour spells and abilities have a high chance to coalesce the energy around you, granting you a shield that reduces damage taken by 20% up to 20844 total damage.Upon falling below 40% health, gain this effect at 500% effectiveness. This effect may only occur once every 6 min.

31117.name: Unstable Affliction
31117.description: Unstable AfflictionUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarlockRequires level 1Afflicts the target with (72.5% of Spell Power) Shadow damage over 8 sec. You may afflict a target with up to 5 Unstable Afflictions at once.You deal 10% increased damage to targets affected by your Unstable Affliction.If dispelled, deals [(18.125% of Spell Power) * 400 / 100] damage to the dispeller and silences them for 4 sec.

89751.name: Felstorm
89751.description: Felstorm60 EnergyInstant30 sec cooldownRequires WarlockThe Felguard recklessly swings its weapon, striking all nearby enemies within 8 yards for [0.33 * (Spell Power * 0.5) * 1 * (1 + Versatility)] Physical damage every 1 sec for 5 sec. The Felguard cannot take any other action during Felstorm. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

288613.name: Trueshot
288613.description:
Increases your critical strike chance by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 15 sec.

 Aimed Shot
Reduces its cooldown rate by 40%.

 Rapid Fire
Reduces its cooldown by 60%.

1236600.name: Arcane Restoration
1236600.description: Arcane RestorationItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantWeave an arcane cocoon around yourself and four nearby allies for 10 sec, reducing their damage taken by 75% until 57364 damage has been prevented.If a cocoon expires, it bursts to heal an injured ally for 50% of its remaining power.

468223.name: Incendiary Fire
468223.description: Incendiary Fire150 yd rangeInstantThe Geargrinder focuses fire at several players for 6 sec, launching blazing shells at their location every 0.5 sec. Each shell inflicts 14655 Fire damage to players within 3 yards and burns away any Oil Slicks in the area.

434561.name: Infernal Bulwark
434561.description: Infernal BulwarkInstantRequires WarlockUnending Resolve grants Soul Leech equal to 10% of your maximum health and increases the maximum amount Soul Leech can absorb by 10% for 8 sec.

1224840.name: Behead
1224840.description: BeheadUnlimited rangeInstantThe Voidwing shreds through a player with its claws, inflicting 48991 Cosmic damage and dragging any player caught within their path.

59638.name: Frostbolt
59638.description: Frostbolt0.1% of base mana40 yd range2 sec castRequires MageRequires level 1Inflicts Frost damage to an enemy and reduces its movement speed for 4 sec.

392990.name: Divine Image
392990.description: Divine Image100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestYour Holy Words summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.

1224719.name: Purging Smash
1224719.description: Purging Smash60 yd range2 sec castThe caster inflicts 113404 Physical damage to its current target and 30241 Arcane damage to players within 60 yards.

458128.name: Festering Scythe
458128.description: Festering ScytheInstantRequires Death KnightSlashes through all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, dealing (75% of Attack Power) Shadow damage and hastening all of your Plagues on targets hit to deal damage 35% faster for 25 sec.

456366.name: Healing Rain
456366.description: Healing Rain40 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 34Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring [(62.0802% of Spell Power) * 6 * 2 / 2] health to up to 5 allies over 24 sec.

196728.name: Ox Charge
196728.description: Ox Charge40 yd rangeInstant5 sec cooldownRequires MonkRequires level 1Charge to the enemy.

466974.name: Goblin Gun
466974.description: Goblin Gun15 yd rangeInstantZee's ranged attacks inflict Physical damage.

264571.name: Nightfall
264571.description: NightfallInstantRequires WarlockCorruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Malefic Grasp to deal 25% increased damage. Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Malefic Grasp channels 50% faster when affected.

213405.name: Master of the Glaive
213405.description: Master of the Glaive100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterThrow Glaive has 2 charges and snares all enemies hit by 50% for 6 sec.

461958.name: Well Fed
461958.description: Well FedInstantIncreases Versatility by 0 for 1 hour.

465408.name: Rapid Construction
465408.description: Rapid ConstructionUnlimited range2.5 sec castThe caster rapidly constructs a tower and leaps to the top, gaining High Ground.

1222307.name: Consume
1222307.description: ConsumeUnlimited rangeInstantAdarus drains the essence of any players currently bearing , inflicting 3 Cosmic damage and absorbing the next 10945 healing received.This blast applies Unending Hunger.

1217101.name: Ethereal Reaping
1217101.description: Ethereal ReapingLevel 80InstantApproximately 2 procs per minuteYour harmful spells and abilities have a chance to focus latent energies around you to inflict 10422 Arcane damage split between your target and nearby enemies. Enemies below 35% health take 20% additional damage. (100ms cooldown)

1259431.name: Predator's Wake
1259431.description: Predator's Wake50 yd range1 sec cast1.5 min cooldownRequires Demon HunterRequires level 48Charge to your target, striking them for (600% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting (382.5% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path.

42650.name: Army of the Dead
42650.description:
Summons a legion of 8 empowered Lesser Ghouls that last for 15 sec to swarm your enemies.

Generates 40 Runic Power.

411288.name: Feed the Flames
411288.description: Feed the FlamesInstantRequires EvokerAfter casting 6 Pyres, your next Pyre will explode into a Firestorm. FirestormAn explosion bombards the target area with white-hot embers, dealing [(239.4% of Spell Power) * 6] Fire damage to enemies over 10 sec.

85692.name: Doom Bolt
85692.description: Doom Bolt35 Energy30 yd range3 sec castRequires WarlockRequires level 1Sends a shadowy bolt at the enemy, causing (68.75% of Attack Power) Shadow damage. Deals 20% additional damage to targets below 20% health.

449793.name: Succulent Soul
449793.description: Succulent SoulInstantRequires WarlockA demonic entity now inhabits your soul, allowing you to detect if a Soul Shard has a Succulent Soul when it's generated.Consuming a Succulent Soul unleashes your demonic soul, dealing (353.236% of Spell Power) Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of the target. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

1215488.name: Disintegration Beam
1215488.description: Disintegration Beam300 yd rangeInstantThe goblin fires a disintigration beam at a random player, inflicting 830 Fire damage every 1 sec for 12 sec. Every 1 sec, damage is increased by 100%.

585.name: Smite
585.description: Smites an enemy for 372 Holy damage.

459443.name: Broken Down
459443.description: Broken DownInstantThe bike is broken down and abandoned by its rider.

153596.name: Comet Storm
153596.description: Comet Storm100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageCalls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to [7 * (86% of Spell Power)] Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.

114050.name: Ascendance
114050.description:
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 75% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

1231608.name: Alacrity
1231608.description: AlacrityInstantIncreases the caster's attack speed by 30% and movement speed by 30% for 10 sec.

461796.name: Reload
461796.description: Reload7 sec castThe caster reloads their R.P.G.G., preparing to fire another salvo.

24394.name: Intimidation
24394.description: Intimidation100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterCommand your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.

1253750.name: Stargazer
1253750.description: StargazerInstantRequires Hunter[ Marksmanship: Consuming Precise Shots / SurvivalConsuming Tip of the Spear] grants 2% increased critical strike damage for 10 sec. Multiple applications may overlap.

368512.name: So'leah's Secret Technique
368512.description: So'leah's Secret TechniqueItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantSelect a player in your party or raid, granting them 12 of their highest secondary stat, and granting you 69 of that same stat, for 1 hour.

390677.name: Inspiration
390677.description: Inspiration100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestReduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with [ Discipline: Flash Heal or Penance] [ Holy: Flash Heal or Holy Word: Serenity / ShadowFlash Heal]

436401.name: AUGH!
436401.description: AUGH!13 yd rangeInstantInfant Crawlers pounce on their next meal, inflicting 2 Physical damage every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect stacks.

444728.name: Templar's Wrath
444728.description: Templar's WrathInstantCall upon the Sacred Flame and become an avatar of wrath, increasing all damage done by 30% for 10 sec.

119910.name: Spell Lock
119910.description: Spell LockUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarlockCounters the enemy's spellcast, preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 7 sec.

1260269.name: Shard Instability
1260269.description: Shard InstabilityInstantRequires WarlockDamage dealt by [Drain Soul / Shadow Bolt] has a [Drain Soul: 10 / 20]% chance to make your next Unstable Affliction cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.

1221389.name: Freezing
1221389.description: Freezing100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageDamage from Frostbolt and Flurry applies Freezing to their targets. Stacks up to 20 times.Damage from Ice Lance shatters your enemies, consuming 4 stacks of Freezing and dealing (97.38% of Spell Power) Frost damage for each stack removed.

111685.name: Summon Infernal
111685.description: Summon InfernalUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarlockSummons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for (60% of Spell Power) Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing [(55% of Spell Power) * 100 / 100] damage to all nearby enemies every 2 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.

381752.name: Blessing of the Bronze
381752.description: Blessing of the Bronze100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerRequires level 60Weave the threads of time, reducing the cooldown of a major movement ability for all party and raid members by 15% for 1 hour.

1236935.name: Critical Overload
1236935.description: Critical OverloadInstantYour spells and abilities have a chance to trigger Critical Overload, increasing your Critical Strike by 42 every 2 sec for 20 sec.

232752.name: Glacial Advance
232752.description: Glacial Advance100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightSummon glacial spikes from the ground that advance forward, each dealing [(63.4275% of Attack Power) * [(Attack Power * 0.98)][((Attack Power + Offhand Attack Power) * 2 / 3)] -- 2H, DW / Attack Power] Frost damage near their eruption point and applying Razorice.

373276.name: Idol of Yogg-Saron
373276.description: Idol of Yogg-SaronInstantRequires PriestAfter conjuring Shadowy Apparitions, gain a stack of Idol of Yogg-Saron. At 20 stacks, you summon a Thing from Beyond that casts Void Spike at nearby enemies for 20 sec. Void SpikeHurls a bolt of dark magic, dealing (93.8961% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and [(93.8961% of Spell Power) * 21 / 100] Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

1223628.name: Consume Soul
1223628.description: Consume Soul100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterA fragment of your enemy's soul. Walking into the soul or casting Reap will collect it, granting you 4 Fury and healing you for 1% of your maximum health.

1235879.name: Infuriated
1235879.description: InfuriatedItem EffectInstantTaking damage infuriates you, causing you to absorb 1060 damage and deal 2424 Shadow damage per infuriation split between nearby enemies. Damage increased by 30% per additional enemy, up to 150%.You may be further infuriated every 15 sec, stacking up to 15 times, but calm quickly upon leaving combat. Valid only for tank specializations.

8676.name: Ambush
8676.description:
Ambush the target, causing 96 Physical damage.

Awards 2 combo points.

1238197.name: Infusion Tether
1238197.description: Infusion TetherUnlimited rangeInstantLoom'ithar pulls several players to its location, binding them with silken strands that inflict 2434 Arcane damage each second, growing in intensity over time.Each strand snaps when drawn to 40 yards, creating a splotch of Living Silk at the player's location.

1243055.name: Fists of the Voidlord
1243055.description: Fists of the Voidlord300 yd rangeInstantDimensius' melee attacks disrupt the very fabric of space, forcing his target into melee range if they can't be reached and inflicting 45362 Shadow damage to players within 8 yards of his target.The force of the impact knocks away other players within 8 yards of his target.

55342.name: Mirror Image
55342.description:
Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 15 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies. While active, you generate significantly reduced threat.

Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate

45284.name: Lightning Bolt Overload
45284.description: Lightning Bolt Overload100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 1Casts a bolt of lightning at the target for [(131.1% of Spell Power) * 25 / 100] Nature damage.

158756.name: Skinning
158756.description: Skinning5 yd range1.5 sec castAble to skin beasts of Draenor for use in Leatherworking.

429099.name: Overwhelmed
429099.description: OverwhelmedInstantStunned for 4 sec after losing the power of the light.

1240000.name: Boon of the Oathsworn
1240000.description: Boon of the OathswornItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantBecome Oath-Bound to a nearby ally every 30 sec.Directly healing the ally fulfills the oath to grant you 154 Intellect for 12 sec and shields your ally for 100% of any overhealing done.

423536.name: Holy Smite
423536.description: Holy Smite40 yd range1.5 sec castMurrpray smites her current target, inflicting 18014 Holy damage.

359816.name: Dream Flight
359816.description:
Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, healing all allies in your path for 1,900 immediately, and 4,175 over 15 sec, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects.

Damage taken while you are flying is absorbed, up to 100% of your maximum health.

1214607.name: Bigger Badder Bomb Blast
1214607.description: Bigger Badder Bomb BlastUnlimited range4 sec castGallywix shells his primary target with many explosives inflicting 73275 Physical damage and increases Bigger Badder Bomb Blast damage taken by 200% for 1.2 min. This effect stacks and cannot be dodged or parried.Additionally inflicts 73275 Fire damage to players within 30 yards of the primary target, applying Blast Burns. These munitions (mostly) detonate on impact.However, some of the fuze within the bunch scatters about the arena.

52174.name: Heroic Leap
52174.description: Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 8 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

192063.name: Gust of Wind
192063.description: A gust of wind hurls you forward.

365350.name: Arcane Surge
365350.description:
Expend all of your current mana to annihilate your enemy target and nearby enemies for up to 3,463 Arcane damage based on Mana spent. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

For the next 15 sec, your Mana regeneration is increased by 425% and spell damage is increased by 35%.

Generates Clearcasting.

1122.name: Summon Infernal
1122.description:
Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 227 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 206 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.8 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.

1226915.name: Sticky Silk
1226915.description: Sticky SilkUnlimited rangeInstantSticky silk inflicts 18 Nature damage every 1 sec to players within it and slows their movement speed by 30%.

1269800.name: Eye Explosion
1269800.description: Eye ExplosionUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarlockYou summon a Diabolic Oculus, up to 3, each time the duration of Diabolic Ritual is reduced by one of your spells.Diabolic Oculi explode when consuming Demonic Art, dealing (234.62% of Spell Power) Fire damage to all enemies within 10 yds of the target. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

1223667.name: Void Glare
1223667.description: Void GlareUnlimited rangeChanneled (6 sec cast)The caster unleashes a shadowy beam of energy into its current target, pushing them away and inflicting 11340 Shadow damage every 0.3 for 6 sec.Glare Splatter forms underneath the target.

1237584.name: Etheric Victory
1237584.description: Etheric VictoryItem EffectUnlimited rangeInstant1 hour cooldownEmanate an aura of victory.

200183.name: Apotheosis
200183.description: Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 50%.

1220610.name: Protocol: Purge
1220610.description: Protocol: Purge300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel relocates, pushing players away and activating the Arcanomatrix Atomizer. The Atomizer slowly passes over the chamber, Atomizing any players and Volatile Manifestation it contacts.After relocating, The Plexus Sentinel begins channelling Protocol: Purge and gains a shield that absorbs damage. Breaking this shield interrupts Protocol: Purge.

1258571.name: Takedown
1258571.description: TakedownInstantRequires HunterWhen [ Survival: Muzzle / Beast Mastery, MarksmanshipCounter Shot] interrupts a cast, gain 30 Focus.

319190.name: Black Powder
319190.description: Black PowderInstantRequires RogueFinishing move that launches explosive Black Powder at all nearby enemies dealing Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. [Shadowed Finishers: All nearby targets with your Find Weakness suffer an additional 30% damage as Shadow] 1 point : [(21% of Attack Power)] damage 2 points: [(21% of Attack Power) * 2] damage 3 points: [(21% of Attack Power) * 3] damage 4 points: [(21% of Attack Power) * 4] damage 5 points: [(21% of Attack Power) * 5] damage[ 6 points: [(21% of Attack Power) * 6] damage][ 7 points: [(21% of Attack Power) * 7] damage]

51714.name: Razorice
51714.description: RazoriceUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Death KnightRequires level 1Engrave your weapon with a rune that causes [Max((0.01127 * Attack Power), 1)]% extra weapon damage as Frost damage and increases enemies' vulnerability to your Frost attacks by 3%, stacking up to 5 times. Modifying your rune requires a Runeforge in Ebon Hold.

1219471.name: Expulsion Zone
1219471.description: Expulsion Zone300 yd rangeInstantA purging orb of arcane energy that expulses players in the area, knocking them away, and inflicting 15121 Arcane damage.

77505.name: Earthquake
77505.description: Earthquake100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 1Knocks down the target, stunning them for 1.5 sec.

89808.name: Singe Magic
89808.description: Singe Magic30 yd rangeInstant15 sec cooldownRequires level 27Burns harmful spells, removing 1 harmful Magic effect from an ally.Auto-Cast:Cast upon master when he is unable to cast spells due to a Magic effect.(Right - Click to toggle)

31884.name: Avenging Wrath
31884.description: Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.

2645.name: Ghost Wolf
2645.description: Turn into a Ghost Wolf, increasing movement speed by 30% and preventing movement speed from being reduced below 100%.

1253138.name: Sic 'Em
1253138.description: Sic 'Em100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterWhen Kill Command critically strikes, it bleeds its target for an additional (40% of Attack Power) damage over 5 sec.

1225406.name: Phase Warp
1225406.description: Phase WarpUnlimited rangeInstantUse your Reshii Wrap to traverse via arcane flows.

397363.name: Revitalization
397363.description: RevitalizationInstantYou are revitalized and ready for action!

220637.name: Judgment
220637.description: JudgmentInstantRequires PaladinRequires level 1Judges the target, dealing (67.1596% of Spell Power) [Blades of Light: Holystrike / Holy] damage [Greater Judgment: and causing them to take 20% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability / .] [Judgment: Generates 1 Holy Power.]HolyGenerates 21 Holy Power.

1227847.name: The Hunt
1227847.description: The HuntUnlimited rangeInstantVelaryn marks a player as her prey, charging towards them and inflicting 340212 Chaos damage. This effect is reduced for each player standing within the path of The Hunt.Velaryn additionally strikes players along the path, inflicting 51032 Chaos damage to players within 3 yards of each player struck.

8679.name: Wound Poison
8679.description: Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, which instantly inflicts 1 Nature damage and reduces all healing received by 8% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

465420.name: High Ground
465420.description: High GroundUnlimited rangeInstantThe architect has the high ground, reducing damage taken by 90%.

1241059.name: Celestial Infusion
1241059.description: A strong herbal brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 30% of incoming damage, up to 794 total.

155145.name: Arcane Torrent
155145.description: Remove 1 beneficial effect from all enemies within 8 yards and restore 1 Holy Power.

325153.name: Exploding Keg
325153.description:
Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 133 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 10 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.

Resets the cooldown of Keg Smash.

106898.name: Stampeding Roar
106898.description: Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

1282535.name: Lesser Ghoul
1282535.description: Lesser GhoulInstantRequires Death KnightA mindless servant of the Scourge, raised to obey its master's commands for 15 sec.

127801.name: Composting
127801.description: CompostingInstantComposting into the ground, it will disappear after 5 min.

378777.name: Inundate
378777.description: Inundate100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanYour successful Purge, Cleanse Spirit, Healing Stream Totem, Hex, and Wind Shear casts generate 8 Maelstrom during combat.

458524.name: Ascendance
458524.description: AscendanceInstantTaking damage has the chance to grant Beledar's Blessing granting 2001 Versatility for 15 sec. Moving within 3 yards of a friendly party member grants them a portion of Beledar's Blessing, sharing the effect for the remaining duration.

432454.name: Stygian Seed
432454.description: Stygian Seed100 yd rangeInstantIncubates a dark word upon the target inflicting 12716 Shadow damage and an additional 4239 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.Upon removal this mark explodes inflicting 15895 Shadow damage to targets within 8 yards, knocking additional targets away.

124503.name: Gift of the Ox
124503.description: Gift of the Ox100 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.Healing Sphere:Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for (330% of Attack Power).

1244620.name: Decimate!
1244620.description: Decimate!Item Effect40 yd range2 sec castYour spells have a chance to bring the candle to life, summoning a waxen ally to light up your enemies.

431985.name: Black Blood
431985.description: Black BloodInstantStepping within a spilled pool of Black Blood causes it to congeal and root the target in place for 1 min, inflicting 2119 Shadow damage every 1 sec. The Black Blood can be destroyed to free the player.

472458.name: Unstable Crawler Mines
472458.description: Unstable Crawler Mines1.5 sec castZee scatters mines that fixate on players which detonate when coming into contact with players, Earthshaker Gaols, inflicting 195400 Physical damage and 39080 Fire damage to the target triggering the mine, knocking them away. Triggering a mine unleashes [a Unstable Cluster Bomb and]a barrage of Searing Shrapnel. [On Heroic and Mythic difficulties, the player triggering the Unstable Crawler Mine takes 500% increased damage from Unstable Crawler Mines for 1 min.]

450719.name: Ward of Devotion
450719.description: Ward of DevotionItem EffectInstantAdvance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.Inner Resilience increases your armor by 183 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 17743 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.Valid only for tank specializations.

446005.name: Reap the Storm
446005.description: Reap the StormInstantRequires Warrior FuryBloodthirst has a 30% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for (593.776% of Attack Power) Physical damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. ArmsMortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for (593.776% of Attack Power) Physical damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

204596.name: Sigil of Flame
204596.description:
Place a Sigil of Flame at the target location that activates after 2 sec.

Deals 28 Fire damage, and an additional 70 Fire damage over 8 sec, to all enemies affected by the sigil.

Generates 25 Fury.

390260.name: Commander of the Dead
390260.description: Commander of the DeadInstantRequires Death KnightDark Transformation empowers your [Dark Arbiter / Gargoyle], Abomination, Magus and Lesser Ghouls for 30 sec, increasing their damage by 25%.The duration of Lesser Ghouls are increased by 0% of your Mastery.

1225316.name: Galactic Smash
1225316.description: Galactic SmashUnlimited rangeInstantImages of Salhadaar emerge alongside him to smash their targets with galactic force, applying Twilight Scar and inflicting 65321 Cosmic damage to all players. Players farther from each target take less damage. Salhadaar's primary target is Starshattered. A Dark Star forms at each impact location.

367364.name: Reversion
367364.description: Reversion2% of base mana30 yd rangeInstant9 sec cooldownRequires EvokerReverse an ally's injuries, [Golden Hour: instantly healing them for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec and an additional / healing them for] (205.2% of Spell Power) over 12 sec.When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 12 sec.

433821.name: Dashing Strike
433821.description: Dashing Strike60 yd rangeInstantDash to a target, inflicting 8477 Physical damage.

459671.name: Spew Oil
459671.description: Spew Oil5 sec castThe Geargrinder launches oil at targeted players, forming an Oil Slick at their location and dousing players within 7 yards of the impact with oil, inflicting 4885 Nature damage every 1.5 sec for 12 sec.

1228280.name: King's Hunger
1228280.description: King's HungerUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar drains the energy from the Voidwing, increases its damage taken by 100% and inflicting 16633 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 30 sec.Upon completion, Salhadaar heals himself equal to the Voidwing's remaining health as the drake fades from existence.

388539.name: Rend
388539.description: RendUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 1Lash out with your weapon, striking all targets within 8 yds for (259.248% of Attack Power) Physical damage instantly and wounding them for an additional (190.465% of Attack Power) Bleed damage over 15 sec.

198030.name: Eye Beam
198030.description: Eye BeamUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterBlasts all enemies in front of you, [Looks Can Kill: dealing guaranteed critical strikes] for up to {?a320415[{[(40.26% of Attack Power) * 10 * 2]][{[(40.26% of Attack Power) * 10]] Chaos damage over 2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. [Furious Gaze: When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 8% for 8 sec]

381684.name: Brimming with Life
381684.description: Brimming with LifeInstantRequires ShamanStamina increased by 8%.While you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 50% faster.

457917.name: Courage of the White Tiger
457917.description: Courage of the White Tiger100 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1 WindwalkerTiger Palm has a chance to cause Xuen to claw your target for (337.5% of Attack Power) Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger guarantees your next cast activates this effect. MistweaverTiger Palm, Vivify, and Sheilun's Gift have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for (337.5% of Attack Power) Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.

443039.name: Celestial Conduit
443039.description: Celestial Conduit100 yd rangeInstantRequires Monk[ Mistweaver: The August Celestials empower you, causing you to radiate [(1100% of Spell Power) * 5] healing onto up to 5 injured allies and [(220% of Attack Power) * 5] Nature damage onto enemies within 20 yds over 4 sec, reduced beyond 5 targets]You may move while channeling, but casting other healing or damaging spells cancels this effect.

1241171.name: Dread Plague (Erupt)
1241171.description: Dread Plague (Erupt)100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightA malicious plague that deals (292.74% of Attack Power) Shadow damage over 24 sec. Explodes for (184.5% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to nearby enemies and infects one when the host dies. Can only be applied to 1 host at a time.

61391.name: Typhoon
61391.description: Blasts targets within 15 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

437121.name: Burst of Power
437121.description: Burst of PowerInstantRequires Warrior FuryLightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Bloodthirsts have no cooldown, deal 35% increased damage, and generate 2 additional Rage. ProtectionLightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown. (250ms cooldown)

457481.name: Tidecaller's Guard
457481.description: Tidecaller's GuardInstantRequires ShamanImbue your shield with the element of Water for 1 hour. Your healing done is increased by 2.0% and the duration of your Healing Stream Totem is increased by 3.0 sec.

262232.name: War Machine
262232.description: War MachineInstantRequires WarriorYour auto-attacks generate [ Arms: 10]50% more Rage.Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.

15487.name: Silence
15487.description: Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.

453583.name: Charge
453583.description: Charge40 yd rangeInstantThe caster charges towards an enemy to attack, inflicting 5298 Physical damage.

202166.name: Impending Victory
202166.description: Impending VictoryInstantRequires WarriorInstantly attack the target, causing (59% of Attack Power) damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.

1233416.name: Crystalline Shockwave
1233416.description: Crystalline Shockwave100 yd range1 sec castFractillus pounds the ground, inflicting 37801 Shadow damage to all players and triggering multiple Crystalline Shockwaves.

451508.name: Balanced Stratagem
451508.description: Balanced StratagemInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.

1256081.name: Sign of Azeroth
1256081.description: Sign of AzerothInstantShadowlands reputation gains from combat and quests increased by 50%.

1233557.name: Density
1233557.description: DensityInstantIncreases damage of Cosmic Radiation by 100%. This effect stacks.

1237913.name: Behind Enemy Lines
1237913.description: Behind Enemy LinesInstantThe Vandals infuse your weapons with arcane energy, increasing your damage dealt and healing done while inside Manaforge Omega by 0%.

96312.name: Kalytha's Haunted Locket
96312.description: Kalytha's Haunted LocketItem EffectInstantInvite the spirit of Kalytha to overtake you.

1276960.name: Blighted Maw
1276960.description: Blighted Maw100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockThe fangs of your Dreadstalkers are coated in corrosive bile, causing Dreadbite to deal additional damage equal to 50% of damage dealt as Plague damage.

379.name: Earth Shield
379.description: Earth Shield300 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 1Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for [(73% of Spell Power) * 1.2] when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges. [Elemental Orbit: Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them / Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.]

444834.name: Trollbane's Icy Fury
444834.description: Trollbane's Icy Fury30 yd rangeInstantRequires Death Knight Unholy shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing (105.3% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. FrostObliterate and Frostscythe shatter Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing (105.3% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

32379.name: Shadow Word: Death
32379.description:
A word of dark binding that inflicts 327 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.

431416.name: Algari Healing Potion
431416.description: Algari Healing PotionLevel 80Item EffectInstant5 min cooldownRestores (969855 - 969855%50) health.

460602.name: Quick Shot
460602.description: Quick Shot100 yd range1.5 sec castKeeza fires a quick shot at a random player, inflicting 17484 Physical damage.

1214498.name: Not on Fire
1214498.description: Not on FireInstantSparking after using a goblin teleporter.

392778.name: Wild Strikes
392778.description: Wild StrikesInstantRequires WarriorHaste increased by 1% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 10% for 10 sec.

1216731.name: Oil Canister
1216731.description: Oil CanisterInstantUpon defeat, the bike explodes and sends canisters of oil flying through the air. A player can catch the oil canister, suffering 7327 Nature damage and becoming Soaked in Oil for 1 min.Each canister that fails to hit a player explodes, leaving an Oil Slick behind.

441776.name: Coup de Grace
441776.description: Coup de Grace35 Energy / 1 to 5 Combo PointsMelee RangeInstantRequires RogueRequires One-Handed Melee WeaponAfter 4 strikes with Unseen Blade, your next [ Outlaw: Dispatch / SubtletyEviscerate] will be performed as a Coup de Grace, functioning as if it had consumed 5 additional combo points, and granting you 5 stacks of Flawless Form.

472452.name: Doom Storm
472452.description: Doom Storm100 yd range2.5 sec castThe mechadrone unleashes a strafing run towards a player, bombarding in a straight line and inflicting 26491 Nature damage to players within 3 yards of each impact.

28730.name: Arcane Torrent
28730.description: Remove 1 beneficial effect from all enemies within 8 yards and restore 3% of your Mana.

431971.name: Flask of Tempered Aggression
431971.description: Flask of Tempered AggressionLevel 80Item EffectInstantDrink to increase your Critical Strike by 173.Lasts 1 hour and through death. Consuming an identical flask will add another 1 hour.

130654.name: Chi Burst
130654.description:
Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 98 Nature damage to all enemies, and 75 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.

361469.name: Living Flame
361469.description: Send a flickering flame towards your target, dealing 871 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 2,301.

381750.name: Blessing of the Bronze
381750.description: Blessing of the Bronze100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerRequires level 60Weave the threads of time, reducing the cooldown of a major movement ability for all party and raid members by 15% for 1 hour.

449091.name: Keen Prowess
449091.description: Keen ProwessInstantEarthen Enhancements - Wondrous WeaponsPermanently enchants a weapon to sometimes grant you Keen Prowess, bestowing 24 Critical Strike to you for 12 sec. Cannot be applied to items lower than level 70.

51490.name: Thunderstorm
51490.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 57 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

528.name: Dispel Magic
528.description: Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

454863.name: Lesser Anti-Magic Shell
454863.description: Lesser Anti-Magic ShellInstantRequires Death KnightRequires level 14Casting Anti-Magic Shell grants 2 nearby allies a Lesser Anti-Magic Shell that Absorbs up to 0 magic damage and reduces the duration of harmful Magic effects against them by 50%.

1264355.name: Wild Thrash
1264355.description: Wild Thrash100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterCommand your pet to thrash all enemies within 10 yds, dealing (191% of Attack Power) Physical damage to them. Damage is increased by 200% if Wild Thrash hits 2 or more enemies.Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

1258345.name: Stampede
1258345.description: Stampede40 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterSummon a herd of stampeding animals from the wilds around you that deal [(150% of Attack Power) * 3] Physical damage to your enemies over 4 sec.

453406.name: Whirling Earth
453406.description: Whirling EarthInstantRequires Shaman[ Enhancement: Your next Sundering deals 100% increased damage and summons a Searing Totem / Elemental, RestorationYour next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit]

386353.name: Iridescence: Red
386353.description: Iridescence: RedInstantRequires EvokerCasting an empower spell increases the damage of your next 2 spells of the same color by 20% within 10 sec.

377192.name: Enduring Strength
377192.description: Enduring StrengthInstantRequires Death KnightWhen Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 8% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer, up to 20 sec, for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost. (500ms cooldown)

442726.name: Malevolence
442726.description:
Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take 4,808 Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.

1218388.name: Mysterious Celerity
1218388.description: Mysterious CelerityItem EffectInstantReagents:Potion of Mysterious CelerityOn Looted: Increases your movement speed by 10%.Lasts 30 min and persists through death.This item is consumed immediately.

165961.name: Travel Form
165961.description: Travel FormInstantRequires DruidRequires level 13Shapeshift into travel form, increasing movement speed by 40%. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects. Only usable outdoors.The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of movement impairing effects.

435992.name: Prismatic Null Stone
435992.description: Prismatic Null StoneIncreases effectiveness of Blasphemite secondary effects by 25%.

1224814.name: Vanquish
1224814.description: VanquishUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar cleaves his current target, inflicting 120964 Physical damage and an additional 190519 Shadow damage to all players in front of him, knocking them away. Increases damage taken from Vanquish by 500% for 20 sec.

1278150.name: Sweeping Claws
1278150.description: Sweeping ClawsMelee RangeInstantRequires Death KnightRakes an enemy with deformed claws, dealing [0.85 * (Attack Power * 0.1656) * (1 + Versatility) * 1] Shadow damage to the target and [0.85 * (Attack Power * 0.1143675) * (1 + Versatility) * 1] Shadow damage to nearby enemies.

190456.name: Ignore Pain
190456.description: Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken for 12 sec sec or until 418 damage has been prevented.

1263786.name: Sanguinary Burst
1263786.description: Sanguinary BurstInstantRequires Death KnightWhen Blood Mist ends it deals (276% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to 8 nearby enemies, healing you for 15% of the damage dealt. The damage is increased by 2% for every 1 Runic Power spent while Blood Mist was active.

469311.name: Eye for an Eye
469311.description: Eye for an Eye100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinMelee and ranged attackers receive (35% of Spell Power) Holy damage each time they strike you during [ Protection: Ardent Defender / Holy, RetributionDivine Protection] and Divine Shield.

108280.name: Healing Tide Totem
108280.description:
Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.8 sec, healing all party or raid members within 40 yards for 1,978.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

1244102.name: Disease Cloud
1244102.description: Disease Cloud100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightArmy of the Dead now raises an Abomination that attacks enemies while emitting a disease cloud that lasts for 30 sec.Enemies within the disease cloud take 10% increased damage from your minions.

455966.name: Shadowed Essence
455966.description: Shadowed EssenceItem Effect40 yd rangeInstantEntering combat summons an orb of dark power to assist you.

1219248.name: Arcane Radiation
1219248.description: Arcane Radiation300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel sections off portions of The Influx with Arcane Radiation, inflicting 22681 Arcane damage every 1 sec to players in the area.

22812.name: Barkskin
22812.description:
Your skin becomes as tough as bark, reducing all damage you take by 20% and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts. Lasts 8 sec.

Usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared, or asleep, and in all shapeshift forms.

1242086.name: Arcane Energy
1242086.description: Arcane Energy200 yd rangeInstantResidual energy inflicts 18145 Arcane damage every 1 sec to players within the area.

1217281.name: Redeployment Module
1217281.description: Redeployment ModuleItem Effect10 sec cast30 min cooldown1 ChargeReturns you to Hearthstone Location. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

118905.name: Capacitor Totem
118905.description: Capacitor Totem2 sec castRequires ShamanStuns enemies within 8 yards for 3 sec.

431418.name: Algari Mana Potion

387621.name: Dragonfire Brew
387621.description: Dragonfire BrewInstantRequires MonkBreath of Fire deals 100% increased damage, and after using Breath of Fire, you breathe fire 2 additional times, each dealing (20% of Attack Power) Fire damage.

432031.name: Grasping Blood
432031.description: Grasping Blood20 yd rangeChanneled (1 min cast)Stepping within a spilled pool of Black Blood causes it to congeal and root the target in place for 1 min, inflicting 2119 Shadow damage every 1 sec. The Black Blood can be destroyed to free the player.

406789.name: Spatial Paradox
406789.description: Spatial Paradox100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerEvoke a paradox for you and a friendly healer, allowing casting while moving and increasing the range of most spells by 100% for 10 sec.Affects the nearest healer within 60 yds, if you do not have a healer targeted.

457674.name: Duskthread Lining
457674.description: Duskthread LiningInstantYour gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 4 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

274738.name: Ancestral Call
274738.description: Invoke the spirits of your ancestors, granting you 51 of one of your two highest secondary stat for 15 sec.

1228317.name: King's Hunger
1228317.description: King's HungerUnlimited range6 sec castSalhadaar drains the energy from the Voidwing, increases its damage taken by 100% and inflicting 16633 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 30 sec.Upon completion, Salhadaar heals himself equal to the Voidwing's remaining health as the drake fades from existence.

1242974.name: Arcane Salvo
1242974.description: Arcane SalvoInstantRequires MageEach wave of Arcane Missiles increases the damage of Arcane Barrage by 3%, up to 60%.

444608.name: Inner Fire

466904.name: Harrier's Cry

Your Eagle descends from the skies with a screech, giving the signal to attack.

Increases haste by 30% for all party and raid members for 40 sec.

Allies receiving this effect will become Sated and unable to benefit from Harrier's Cry or similar effects again for 10 min.

313015.name: Recently Failed

1231497.name: Overgorged

425554.name: Purify

334934.name: Ravager
334934.description: RavagerInstantRequires WarriorThrows a whirling weapon at your target that chases nearby enemies, inflicting [6 * (119.517% of Attack Power)] Physical damage to all enemies over 12 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. [ Arms: Cleave and Whirlwind deal 50% increased damage while Ravager is active] [ Protection: Revenge and Thunder Clap deal 50% increased damage while Ravager is active.Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.]

264735.name: Survival of the Fittest
264735.description: Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 6 sec.

178173.name: Gift of the Ox
178173.description: Gift of the OxUnlimited rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.Healing Sphere:Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for (330% of Attack Power).

462239.name: Dispatch (Coup de Grace)

1233292.name: Accretion Disk

1239419.name: Overloading Siphon...

Dimensius can only Devour players with less Collective Gravity than his Growing Hunger.

186254.name: Bestial Wrath
186254.description: Bestial Wrath100 yd rangeInstant1.5 min cooldownRequires HunterRequires level 34Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing (800% of Attack Power) Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 20% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet. [Scent of Blood: Activating Bestial Wrath grants 0 charges of Barbed Shot]

1220489.name: Protocol: Purge

Breaking this shield interrupts Protocol: Purge.

199547.name: Chaos Strike
199547.description: Chaos Strike15 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterSlice your target for [(69.432% of Attack Power) + (109.12% of Attack Power)] Chaos damage. Chaos Strike has a [Min(20, 100)]% chance to refund 20 Fury.

427342.name: Defend
427342.description: DefendChanneled (5 sec cast)The caster raises their shield and focuses on protecting allies within 0 yards, reducing their damage taken by 50% for up to 5 sec.Interrupting this effect shatters the caster's defenses, increasing their damage taken by 25% for 10 sec.

1224765.name: Arcane Flurries
1224765.description: Arcane FlurriesUnlimited rangeInstantFlurries of exposed energy strike the ground, inflicting 70 Arcane damage to players within 5 yards of impact.

1219536.name: Binding Javelin

Each tether inflicts 2649 Arcane damage every 1 sec and reduces their movement speed by 50%, increasing in intensity every 5 seconds until the javelin is destroyed. This effect stacks.

1237172.name: Epidemic
1237172.description: Epidemic40 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightCauses each of your Virulent Plagues to flare up, dealing (65.9312% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to the infected enemy, and an additional (26.3727% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to all other enemies near them.

You can activate this ability with the jump key while falling.

207062.name: Murderous Efficiency
207062.description: Murderous EfficiencyUnlimited rangeInstantRequires level 1Grants the Death Knight 1 rune.

1243106.name: Vision of N'Zoth
1243106.description: Vision of N'Zoth100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestYou create Horrific Visions when casting harmful spells on enemies.At 50 stacks of Horrific Visions, your target sees a nightmare, dealing (140% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and granting you 4.07 Insanity over 3 sec.At 100 stacks, your target witnesses a vision of N'Zoth, dealing (530% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and granting you 12.2 Insanity over 3 sec.

370666.name: Rescue
370666.description: Rescue100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerSwoop to an ally and fly with them for up to 3 sec.

116841.name: Tiger's Lust
116841.description: Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.

1244918.name: Lake of Fire
1244918.description: Lake of Fire100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockCataclysm now leaves behind a lake of fire that deals [(60% of Spell Power) * 10] Fire damage to enemies within it over 10 sec.Immolate deals 20% increased damage to enemies within the lake of fire.

114052.name: Ascendance

Immediately heals for 4,868 split between allies within 20 yds and transforms into a Water Ascendant for 15 sec.

While ascended, Chain Heal jumps to 3 additional allies with 10% healing reduced for all jumps, Healing Wave always critical heals and heals 1 additional ally at 50% effectiveness, and the mana cost of Chain Heal and Healing Wave is reduced by 25%.

439594.name: Reaper's Mark
439594.description: Reaper's Mark100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightWhen Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals [ Blood: 10 / Frost20]% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies.

1219039.name: Ionization
