468147.description: Exhaust FumesInstantThe Geargrinder releases smog that suffocates all players for 6 sec, inflicting 2931 Shadow damage every 1 sec. This increases in intensity by 25% with every cast.

1214937.name: Jackpot
1214937.description: JackpotInstantRequires RogueModifies Effect #2's Value +1: Ambush, Sinister StrikeModifies Damage/Healing Done +15%: Ambush, Sinister StrikeModifies Effect #1's Value +30%: Restless Blades

456323.name: Abyssal Dominion
456323.description: Abyssal Dominion100 yd rangeInstantRequires Warlock[ Demonology: Summon Demonic Tyrant is empowered, dealing 70% increased damage and increasing the damage of your demons by 20% while active / DestructionSummon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec]

381664.name: Amplifying Poison
381664.description: Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, dealing 2 Nature damage and applying Amplifying Poison for 12 sec. Envenom can consume 10 stacks of Amplifying Poison to deal 35% increased damage. Max 20 stacks.

1264618.name: Sylvan Beckoning
1264618.description: Sylvan Beckoning100 yd rangeInstantRequires Druid[ Balance: Entering an Eclipse summons a Dryad to assist you for 8 sec, casting Starsurge dealing (150% of Spell Power) astral damage and Starfall at 200% effectiveness / RestorationYour periodic heals have a chance to empower your next Swiftmend to summon a Dryad to assist you, casting Tranquility at 10% effectiveness and Regrowth to heal (658.507% of Spell Power) damage onto your lowest health ally]

1228032.name: Venting Heat
1228032.description: Venting HeatUnlimited rangeInstantGallywix's machines dump excessive heat over 4 sec inflicting 27 Fire damage to all players plus an additional 5 Fire damage every 1 sec.

423682.name: Embrace the Light
423682.description: Embrace the Light100 yd rangeInstantMurrpray channels the power of the Sacred Flame, inflicting 1060 Holy damage to all players every 1 sec. This effect grows in intensity over time.

467307.name: Rushing Wind Kick
467307.description: Kick up a powerful gust of wind, dealing 62 Nature damage in a 25 yd cone to enemies in front of you, split evenly among them. Damage is increased by 6% for each target hit, up to 30%.

362877.name: Temporal Compression
362877.description: Temporal CompressionInstantRequires EvokerEach cast of a Bronze spell causes your next empower spell to reach maximum level in 10% less time, stacking up to 4 times.

391459.name: Sanguine Ground
391459.description: Sanguine GroundInstantRequires Death KnightYou deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.

265187.name: Summon Demonic Tyrant
265187.description:
Summon a Demonic Tyrant that damages your target for 15 sec. 

Damage dealt by Demonic Tyrant is increased by 10% for each Wild Imp and Dreadstalker active.

1261166.name: Agony
1261166.description: Agony100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockInflicts increasing agony on the target, causing up to [(7.05528% of Spell Power) * 18 / 2 * 8] Shadow damage over 18 sec. Damage starts low and increases over the duration. Refreshing Agony maintains its current damage level.Agony damage sometimes generates 1 Soul Shard.

1231100.name: Empower Rune Weapon
1231100.description: Empower Rune WeaponUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Death KnightDrain the will of your enemy to empower your rune weapon, dealing (200% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage and reduced damage to enemies nearby, gaining 40 Runic Power, and grants you Killing Machine.

446334.name: Zen Pulse
446334.description: Zen PulseInstantRequires MonkRenewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next [Sheilun's Gift / Vivify] to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for (160% of Spell Power) increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.

1253734.name: Lunar Storm
1253734.description: Lunar Storm100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterWhen Sentinel's Mark is consumed, it summons a barrage of 4 lunar missiles, each dealing (200% of Attack Power) Arcane damage to enemies within 10 yds.

1221532.name: Erratic Ritual

377195.name: Enduring Strength
377195.description: Enduring StrengthInstantRequires Death KnightWhen Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 8% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer, up to 20 sec, for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.

434404.name: Felseeker
434404.description: Felseeker25 EnergyUnlimited rangeInstantRequires WarlockUnleashes a powerful beam of fel magic that sears the enemy target's soul, dealing (320.679% of Spell Power) Chaos damage.

256374.name: Entropic Embrace
256374.description: Entropic EmbraceInstantYour abilities have a chance to empower you with the essence of the Void, causing your damage and healing effects to deal an additional 5% as Shadowfrost for 12 sec.

1231719.name: Invoke Collector
1231719.description: Invoke CollectorUnlimited rangeChanneled (5 sec cast)The caster activates a collector so it can begin the Astral Harvest.

386399.name: Iridescence: Blue
386399.description: Iridescence: BlueInstantRequires EvokerCasting an empower spell increases the damage of your next 2 spells of the same color by 20% within 10 sec.

191877.name: Power of the Maelstrom
191877.description: Power of the MaelstromInstantRequires ShamanCasting Lava Burst has a 15% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.

1227810.name: Shadowalker's Aegis
1227810.description: Shadowalker's AegisItem Effect50 yd rangeInstantWhen an ally falls below 20% health you shield them in darkness absorbing the next 3482 damage taken.This effect can trigger once every 30 sec and does not target devout allies.

48265.name: Death's Advance
48265.description:
For 10 sec, your movement speed is increased by 35%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.

Passive: You cannot be slowed below 70% of normal speed.

93402.name: Sunfire
93402.description: A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 80 Nature damage and then an additional 705 Nature damage over 18 sec.

32182.name: Heroism
32182.description:
Increases haste by 30% for all party and raid members for 40 sec.

Allies receiving this effect will become Exhausted and unable to benefit from Heroism or Time Warp again for 10 min.

382311.name: Ancestral Awakening
382311.description: Ancestral Awakening40 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanWhen you heal with your Healing Wave or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 15% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.

357170.name: Time Dilation
357170.description: Stretch time around an ally for the next 8 sec, causing 50% of damage they would take to instead be dealt over 8 sec.

460781.name: Big Bada BOOM!
460781.description: Big Bada BOOM!Unlimited rangeInstantKeeza calls down a delivery of multiple Ticking Time Bombs. Ticking Time Bombs last for 30 sec and cause Deflagration when they expire.

35079.name: Misdirection
35079.description: Misdirection100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterMisdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.

441144.name: Unseen Blade
441144.description: Unseen Blade100 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1 Subtlety and Shadowstrike now also strike with an Unseen Blade dealing (280% of Attack Power) damage. Targets struck are Fazed for 10 sec.Fazed enemies take 5% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.This effect may occur once every 20 sec. OutlawSinister Strike and Ambush now also strike with an Unseen Blade dealing (280% of Attack Power) damage. Targets struck are Fazed for 10 sec.Fazed enemies take 5% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.This effect may occur once every 20 sec.

335149.name: Sign of the Scourge
335149.description: Sign of the ScourgeInstantWrath of the Lich King reputation gains from combat and quests increased by 50%.

469295.name: Giga Coils
469295.description: Giga CoilsUnlimited rangeInstantGallywix charges and activates The House of Chrome's Giga Coils inflicting 3664 Nature damage to all players every 1 sec. This effect stacks.Giga Bomb Detonation damages the Giga Controls interrupting Gallywix's Giga Coils, and Giga Coils become Sabotaged Coils upon losing both Giga Controls. This creates Sabotage Zone.

1247424.name: Null Consumption
1247424.description: Null ConsumptionUnlimited rangeInstantDark energy infuses multiple players with void, inflicting 11340 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 4 sec.Null Explosion is triggered upon expiration.

202719.name: Arcane Torrent
202719.description: Remove 1 beneficial effect from all enemies within 8 yards and generate 15 Fury.

105174.name: Hand of Gul'dan
105174.description:
Calls down a demonic meteor full of Wild Imps which burst forth to attack the target.

Deals up to 566 Shadowflame damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summons 3 Wild Imps.

381753.name: Blessing of the Bronze

3600.name: Earthbind

31224.name: Cloak of Shadows
31224.description: Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.

375230.name: Time Spiral
375230.description: Time Spiral100 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidBend time, allowing you and your allies within 40 yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next 10 sec, even if it is on cooldown.

1230668.name: Triumphant Satchel of Carved Ethereal Crests
1230668.description: Triumphant Satchel of Carved Ethereal CrestsItem Effect1.5 sec cast1.5 sec cooldownCollect 15 Carved Ethereal Crests.

1239123.name: Hungering Slash
1239123.description: Hungering SlashInstantRequires Demon HunterViolently slash your scythe around you, dealing (247.5% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage to nearby enemies and generating 10 Fury. Shatters up to 2 Soul Fragments from nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

282449.name: Secret Technique

 Doom Bolt Volley

444251.name: Summon Whitemane

Each time Undeath deals damage it gains a stack. Cannot be refreshed.TrollbaneCasts Chains of Ice on your target slowing their movement speed by 40% and increasing the damage they take from you by 5% for 8 sec.NazgrimWhile Nazgrim is active you gain Apocalyptic Conquest, increasing your Strength by 5%.

Increases damage taken from Conquer by 500% for 20 sec.

381755.name: Primordial Bond

1227621.description: Tentacle Slam100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestRequires level 1Summons a massive shadowy appendage to slam the ground, dealing (68.7926% of Spell Power) Shadow damage in front of you and 8 yds around your target.Applies Vampiric Touch to up to 6 enemies, prioritizing ones without Vampiric Touch.Generates 6 Insanity.

If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

77575.description:
Inflicts the target with Dread Plague and Virulent Plague.

Dread Plague
A malicious plague that deals 102 Shadow damage over 24 sec. Explodes for 64 Shadow damage to nearby enemies and infects one when the host dies. Can only be applied to 1 host at a time.

Virulent Plague
An infectious plague that spreads to all nearby enemies, dealing 60 Shadow damage over 24 sec.

1264397.name: Lashe Macabre

Upon removal, it erupts forth in waves and inflicts 15895 Nature damage and an additional 4239 Nature damage every 0.5 sec for 5 sec to players struck.

Generates 25 Fury.

Maximum 4 stacks.

119611.name: Renewing Mist

Sometimes you fail to make a compelling case.Castable in combat. Item quality affects cast time. Cannot be used by players higher than level 80.

393944.name: Starweaver's Weft

1271383.name: Masterwork: Bulwark

453177.name: Burning Blades

13750.name: Adrenaline Rush

1269209.name: Backstab

Damage increased by 20% when you are behind your target [Improved Backstab: and critical strikes apply Find Weakness for 10 sec].Awards 1 combo point.

391378.description: Blade Dance100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterStrike nearby enemies for [3 * (23.35% of Attack Power)% + (70% of Attack Power)%] Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

455489.name: Gloom Slash

1250646.name: Takedown
1250646.description:
You and your pet leap to your target and strike as one, dealing 630 Physical damage.

For the next 8 sec, the damage dealt by you and your pet is increased by 20%.

Generates 50 Focus.

470057.name: Voltaic Blaze

Instantly shocks the target and 5 enemies within 10 yds with blazing thunder, applying Flame Shock and dealing 1,486 Nature damage. Always critically strikes.

199579.name: Hallucinations
199579.description: Hallucinations100 yd rangeInstant1 sec cooldownRequires PriestYour successful Dispel Magic, Mass Dispel, Purify Disease, and Power Word: Shield casts generate 4 Insanity during combat.

32375.name: Mass Dispel
32375.description: Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

1224795.name: Conquer
1224795.description: ConquerUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar smashes his current target, inflicting 544339 Physical damage and an additional 408254 Shadow damage split among all players within 8 yards, knocking them upwards.Players struck lose a stack of Oath-Bound. Increases damage taken from Conquer by 500% for 20 sec.

231504.name: Town Portal
231504.description: Town PortalItem Effect10 sec cast30 min cooldown1 ChargeReturns you to Hearthstone Location. Speak to an Innkeeper in a different place to change your home location.

1272464.name: Extra Kick

257045.name: Rapid Fire

29722.description:
Draws fire toward the enemy, dealing 1,667 Fire damage.

116705.name: Spear Hand Strike
116705.description: Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 5 sec.

471936.name: Boar Charge
471936.description: Boar Charge100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterWhile in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast. WyvernA Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 12 sec. BoarA Boar charges through your target 1 time, dealing (1200% of Attack Power) physical damage to the primary target and (1440% of Attack Power) damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. BearA Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing (400% of Attack Power) damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

385062.name: Odyn's Fury
385062.description: Odyn's FuryInstantRequires WarriorRequires Melee WeaponUnleashes your power, dealing [(182.598% of Attack Power)% + (182.598% of Attack Power)% + (182.598% of Attack Power)% + (182.598% of Attack Power)%] Physical damage and an additional (520% of Attack Power) Bleed damage over 4 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.Enrages you and generates 20 Rage.

1251779.name: Strike As One
1251779.description: Strike As One100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Consuming Tip of the Spear provokes your pet to attack your target, dealing (180% of Attack Power) Physical damage.All damage dealt by your pet is increased by 30%.

375234.name: Time Spiral

1217610.name: Devour

356995.name: Disintegrate

1271986.name: Ren'dorei Projection

1227562.name: Banishment
1227562.description: BanishmentUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar exiles several players, inflicting 10887 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 8 sec. Upon expiration, each target bursts with torturous void inflicting 24495 Shadow damage.

98008.name: Spirit Link Totem
98008.description: Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 10 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

118459.name: Beast Cleave

1265560.name: Surge of Adrenaline
1265560.description: Surge of AdrenalineInstantRequires WarriorWhen Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your auto-attack damage and speed is increased by 30% for 6 sec.

1216314.name: Divinity
1216314.description: DivinityInstantRequires PriestYour healing is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.Casting Apotheosis causes your next 3 Prayer of Healing casts to be instant and heal for 25% more.

381725.name: Earth Shock Overload
381725.description: Earth Shock Overload40 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanRequires level 10Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing [50 / 100 * (686.961% of Spell Power) * 25 / 100] Nature damage.

1249467.name: Deal: Cartel Om
1249467.description: Deal: Cartel OmItem EffectInstantMake a deal with Cartel Om that earns you the right to call yourself one of them (for one week). Warband ContractYou may only make a deal with one Cartel per week. This effect is shared across your Warband.

442419.name: Dark Hound
442419.description: Dark Hound100 yd rangeInstantRequires Hunter[ Beast Mastery: When summoning a Dire Beast, you have a 10% chance to instead summon a Dark Hound that deals significantly increased damage / MarksmanshipBlack Arrow's periodic damage has a small chance to rouse the dead, summoning a Dark Minion to fight alongside you for 20 sec]

427906.name: Immolation Aura
427906.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon Hunter HavocEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec.

426605.name: Slice and Dice
426605.description: Slice and DiceInstantRequires RogueSlice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.

449275.name: Nascent Empowerment
449275.description: Nascent EmpowermentLevel 80Item EffectInstantYour spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 178 for 20 sec.

1249248.name: Boundless
1249248.description: BoundlessInstantAfter 18 sec, the Nullbinder becomes immune to all forms of crowd control.

276111.name: Divine Steed
276111.description: Divine SteedInstantRequires PaladinRequires level 1Leap atop your Charger for 3 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

188196.name: Lightning Bolt
188196.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 499 Nature damage.

212743.name: Shuriken Storm
212743.description: Shuriken Storm100 yd rangeInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1Grants 1 combo point.

1230306.name: Frostreaper
1230306.description: FrostreaperInstantRequires Death KnightFrost Strike and Glacial Advance now cause your next Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to deal 15% increased damage and cost 5 more Runic Power. This effect stacks until the next Runic Empowerment.

34477.name: Misdirection
34477.description: Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.

394047.name: Goldrinn's Fang
394047.description: Goldrinn's Fang60 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidStarsurge has a chance to summon the Spirit of Goldrinn, which immediately deals [(192.7% of Spell Power) * 1.1236] Astral damage to the target.

Harness the fury of the Windlord to grant a target ally 2% Mastery and empower their auto attacks to have a 20% chance to instantly strike again for 1 hour.

If the target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

446108.name: Adrenal Surge
446108.description: Adrenal SurgeLevel 80Item EffectInstantTaking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 39 Primary Stat and lose 2 Mastery for 12 sec.This is a Nerubian embellishment.

1223611.name: Ethereal Exhaustion
1223611.description: Ethereal ExhaustionInstantYou've recently consumed a large amount of ethereal energy.

5246.name: Intimidating Shout

Damage may cancel the effect.

205523.name: Blackout Kick
205523.description: Blackout KickMelee RangeInstant4 sec cooldown1 ChargeRequires MonkRequires level 10Strike with a blast of Chi energy, dealing (106.56% of Attack Power) Physical damage [Mastery: Elusive Brawler: and granting Shuffle for 3 sec].

207203.name: Frost Shield
207203.description: Frost ShieldInstantRequires Death KnightRequires level 1Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 40% of the damage dealt.

444995.name: Surging Totem

257044.name: Rapid Fire

Each shot generates 3 Focus.

445624.name: Call of the Ancestors

466154.name: Blast Burns

1235045.name: Encroaching Oblivion
1235045.description: Encroaching OblivionUnlimited rangeInstantA growing expanse of void opens, inflicting 6048 Cosmic damage every 1 sec to players within and increasing their damage taken by 30%.The void spreads over time, but players afflicted with Devourer's Ire can greedily consume the essence and reduce its size.

448604.name: Spellfire Sphere

Arcane, FrostIncreases your spell damage by [ Arcane: Fire (Fire Mage)14.0 Arcane, Frost1.0 / Fire, Frost Fire (Fire Mage)1.0 Arcane, Frost1.0]%. Stacks up to 3 times.

1214756.name: Overloaded Rockets
1214756.description: Overloaded RocketsUnlimited rangeInstantThe blast lights the good stuff attaching some OL rockets to unsuspecting fools for 6 sec.Upon removal these rockets blast out in indicated directions inflicting 17097 Fire damage every second for 9 sec to impacted players, knocking them back.

1225319.description: Galactic SmashUnlimited range8 sec castImages of Salhadaar emerge alongside him to smash their targets with galactic force, applying Twilight Scar and inflicting 65321 Cosmic damage to all players. Players farther from each target take less damage. Salhadaar's primary target is Starshattered. A Dark Star forms at each impact location.

2050.name: Holy Word: Serenity
2050.description:
Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 6,809.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Flash Heal.

365585.name: Expunge

184367.name: Rampage

Unleash a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 104 Physical damage.

Enrages you.

188499.description: Strike nearby enemies for 50 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

1249206.name: Massive Smash

470678.name: The First Dance
470678.description: The First DanceInstantRequires RogueRemaining out of combat for 6 sec increases the duration of your next Shadow Dance by 3 sec.

440645.name: Fire Flies
440645.description: Fire FliesLevel 80Item Effect50 yd rangeInstantYour harmful ranged spells and abilities have a high chance to rouse the lantern's flame, granting a stack of Lamp Light up to 15 times.After 30 sec of collecting stacks, Lamp Light is consumed to attract an equal amount of Fireflies to charge the next target you attack exploding for (1 * 637) Fire damage per Firefly.

1270443.name: Putrefy

1219223.name: Atomize

450752.name: Feast of Souls

390220.name: Putrefy
390220.description: Putrefy100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightSummon a Lesser Ghoul to strike the enemy for (234.9% of Attack Power) Shadow damage and have them explode for (121.5% of Attack Power) Shadow damage to nearby enemies.

155158.name: Meteor Burn
155158.description: Meteor Burn100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageCalls down a meteor which lands at the target location after 3 sec, dealing (900% of Spell Power) Fire damage to all enemies, and burns the ground, dealing [8 * (52% of Spell Power)] Fire damage over 4 sec to all enemies in the area.Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

1228103.name: Arcane Siphon
1228103.description: Arcane SiphonUnlimited rangeInstantThe Arcane Collector thrums with power, inflicting 18927 Arcane damage to all players every 2 sec.

435222.name: Thunder Blast
435222.description: Thunder BlastInstant6 sec cooldownRequires WarriorBlasts all enemies within 8 yards for (152.139% of Attack Power) Stormstrike damage [Thunderstruck: roots them for 4 sec] and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.[Generates 2 Rage.]

203720.name: Demon Spikes

425804.name: Invigorating Mists
425804.description: Invigorating Mists40 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkVivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for (248.6% of Spell Power).Sheilun's Gift's healing is increased by 500% on its primary target.

The threat caused by your next attack and all actions taken for 6 sec afterwards will be transferred to the target.

1271748.name: Blight of Weakness

1277117.name: Abyssal Bite

1253859.name: Takedown
1253859.description: Takedown100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterYou and your pet leap to your target and strike as one, dealing [(600% of Attack Power) + (1200% of Attack Power)] Physical damage.For the next 8 sec, the damage dealt by you and your pet is increased by 20%.Generates 50 Focus.

1266720.name: Silent Sanctuary
1266720.description: Silent SanctuaryInstantRequires MonkWhile no enemies are within 15 yds, you heal for (300% of Spell Power) every 3 sec.

1223391.name: Healing Wave

473531.name: Empty Tank

1242284.name: Soulcrush
1242284.description: SoulcrushUnlimited rangeInstantSpirit Bomb causes players to absorb the next 55818 healing received.

204019.name: Blessed Hammer

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 8 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 11.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

1232543.name: Energy Overload
1232543.description: Energy OverloadChanneled (2 min cast)Overloading Attendant channels energy into itself, preparing an explosion if the Arcanomatrix Sieve passes over them.

427912.name: Immolation Aura
427912.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires level 14 Havoc, DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec. (500ms cooldown)

1239525.name: Hungering Slash
1239525.description: Hungering Slash25 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon Hunter

8004.name: Healing Surge
8004.description: A quick surge of healing energy that restores 4,195 of a friendly target's health.

1251989.name: Doom Bolt Volley
1251989.description: Doom Bolt Volley40 yd range2 sec castRequires WarlockRequires level 1Sends a volley of malefic bolts at 5 enemies within 40 yds, inflicting (413.929% of Spell Power) Shadow damage to each target.

450721.name: Ire of Devotion
450721.description: Ire of DevotionItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantAdvance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.Inner Resilience increases your armor by 183 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 17743 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.Valid only for tank specializations.

446534.name: Portal: Dornogal
446534.description: Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Dornogal.

390386.name: Fury of the Aspects
390386.description:
Increases haste by 30% for all party and raid members for 40 sec.

Allies receiving this effect will become Exhausted and unable to benefit from Fury of the Aspects or similar effects again for 10 min.

378213.name: Golden Hour
378213.description: Golden Hour100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerReversion instantly heals the target for 15% of damage taken in the last 5 sec.

47632.name: Death Coil

375226.name: Time Spiral

1224822.name: Tyranny
1224822.description: TyrannyUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar's imperious presence inflicts 12096 Shadow damage to all players every 2 sec.

1260013.name: Grim Focus
1260013.description: Grim Focus40 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon Hunter

1243828.name: Azhiccaran Mite
1243828.description: Azhiccaran MiteItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantYour damaging spells have a chance to attract mites to feast on your target, inflicting up to (832 * 5) Shadow damage over 5 sec. Well-fed mites share their meal with you, each increasing your Intellect by 72 for 30 sec.

642.name: Divine Shield
642.description:
Grants immunity to all damage, harmful effects, knockbacks and forced movement effects for 8 sec. 

Cannot be used if you have Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

200685.name: Blade Dance
200685.description: Blade DanceInstantRequires Demon HunterStrike nearby enemies for [3 * (23.35% of Attack Power)% + (70% of Attack Power)%] Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

381748.name: Blessing of the Bronze
381748.description: Blessing of the Bronze100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerRequires level 60Weave the threads of time, reducing the cooldown of a major movement ability for all party and raid members by 15% for 1 hour.

70235.name: "Forever" Perfume
70235.description: "Forever" PerfumeLevel 80Item EffectInstantIncreases Versatility by 11 and attracts those wearing cologne. Lasts 1 hour.Only usable outdoors.

448730.name: Authority of Radiant Power
448730.description: Authority of Radiant PowerInstantArathor Alterations - Fortified FlamesPermanently enchants a weapon with the Authority of Radiant Power. Cannot be applied to items lower than level 70.

222031.name: Chaos Strike
222031.description: Chaos Strike15 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterSlice your target for [(69.432% of Attack Power) + (109.12% of Attack Power)] Chaos damage. Chaos Strike has a [Min(20, 100)]% chance to refund 20 Fury.

1245726.name: Eradicate

1214780.description: Maximum Distortion4 sec castThe mechadrone overloads its communications array, inflicting 10596 Sonic damage to players within 60 yards and pushing them away every 2 sec for 12 sec.

1228265.name: King's Hunger
1228265.description: King's HungerUnlimited range6 sec castSalhadaar drains the energy from the Voidwing, increases its damage taken by 100% and inflicting 16633 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 30 sec.Upon completion, Salhadaar heals himself equal to the Voidwing's remaining health as the drake fades from existence.

154796.name: Touch of Elune - Day
154796.description: Touch of Elune - DayInstantIncreases your Critical Strike by 1% during the day.

1226951.name: Arcane Infusion
1226951.description: Arcane InfusionInstantThe caster infuses players within 60 yards with arcane energy, inflicting 26461 Arcane damage and an additional 6426 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.Additionally, Budding Silkworms within 60 yards receive Arcane Bites.

423321.name: Khaz Algar Alchemy
423321.description: Khaz Algar AlchemyInstantAllows an alchemist to brew mighty concoctions from herbs found in Khaz Algar.

1264084.name: Obliterate
1264084.description: Obliterate100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightA brutal attack [that deals [(105.751% of Attack Power)] Physical and [(105.751% of Attack Power)] Frost damage.][with both weapons that deals a total of [((71.4357% of Attack Power) + (71.4357% of Attack Power))] Physical and [((71.4357% of Attack Power) + (71.4357% of Attack Power))] Frost damage.]

1239988.name: Soulweave
1239988.description: Soulweave300 yd range1.683 min castThe Unbound Soul is slowly wrapped in silk bindings, transforming into a member of the Shadowguard.

335150.name: Sign of the Destroyer
335150.description: Sign of the DestroyerInstantCataclysm reputation gains from combat and quests increased by 50%.

357210.name: Deep Breath
357210.description:
Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, spewing molten cinders dealing 2,464 Volcanic damage to enemies in your path.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.

202430.name: Nature's Balance
202430.description:
While in combat you generate 1 Astral Power every 2 sec.

While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to 50 instead of depleting to empty.

1222232.name: Devourer's Ire
1222232.description: Devourer's IreUnlimited rangeInstantAdarus hurls orbs of ravenous void at several locations, inflicting 30241 Cosmic damage to all players if not intercepted.Adarus focuses his gaze upon players who intercepted these orbs, continually assailing them with Consume and increasing their Physical damage taken by 100%.Upon removal, Devourer's Ire transfers to a nearby player and inflicts 11340 Cosmic damage to all players.

466188.name: Thunder Punch
466188.description: Thunder PunchUnlimited rangeInstantGeezle consumes 10 Electricity to sucker punch the target with a jolting fist, knocking them back and inflicting 52982 Physical damage and 12716 Nature damage every 1 sec for 4 sec.

1222408.name: Head Honcho: Mug'Zee

462488.name: Downpour
462488.description: DownpourInstantRequires ShamanCasting Healing Rain grants a use of Downpour for 16 sec. DownpourA burst of water at your Healing Rain's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for (323.4% of Spell Power).

1224794.name: Conquer
1224794.description: ConquerUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar smashes his current target, inflicting 544339 Physical damage and an additional 408254 Shadow damage split among all players within 8 yards, knocking them upwards.Players struck lose a stack of Oath-Bound. Increases damage taken from Conquer by 500% for 20 sec.

698.name: Ritual of Summoning
698.description: Begins a ritual to create a summoning portal, requiring the caster and 2 allies to complete. This portal can be used to summon party and raid members.

1234898.name: Event Horizon
1234898.description: Event Horizon4 sec castAs his health is depleted, Dimensius begins to collapse in on himself.

451038.name: Arcane Soul
451038.description: Arcane SoulInstantRequires MageArcane Barrage grants Clearcasting and generates 4 Arcane Charges.Each cast of Arcane Barrage grants 5 stacks of Arcane Salvo and casting Arcane Barrage does not consume Arcane Salvo.

335100.name: Crushing Blow
335100.description: Crushing Blow100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 14Requires Melee WeaponStrike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of [(206.997% of Attack Power) + (206.997% of Attack Power)] Physical damage. Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.Generates 12 Rage.

1213649.name: Void Ray
1213649.description: Void Ray5 FuryUnlimited rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires 100 FuryUnleash a beam of concentrated void energy, dealing (20.25% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage and consuming 5 Fury every 0.2 sec.Effect ends after 3 sec or upon reaching 0 Fury.

1227641.name: Static Lightning
1227641.description: Static Lightning300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel rains lightning down after activating The Influx, inflicting 52166 Arcane damage to players in a 3 yard radius.

13877.name: Blade Flurry
13877.description: Strikes up to 5 nearby targets for 53 Physical damage, and causes your single target attacks to also strike up to 4 additional nearby enemies for 30% of normal damage for 10 sec.

1231101.name: King's Hunger
1231101.description: King's HungerUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar drains the energy from the Voidwing, increases its damage taken by 100% and inflicting 16633 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 30 sec.Upon completion, Salhadaar heals himself equal to the Voidwing's remaining health as the drake fades from existence.

198590.name: Drain Soul
198590.description:
Replaces Shadow Bolt.

Drains the target's soul, causing 2,117 Shadow damage over 4.5 sec.

Damage is increased by 100% against enemies below 20% health.

Generates 1 Soul Shard if the target dies during this effect.

1235303.name: Harbinger's Embrace
1235303.description: Harbinger's EmbraceInstantXal'atath saved you, for the moment.

392054.name: Piercing Fangs
392054.description: Piercing Fangs100 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterWhile Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.

53563.name: Beacon of Light
53563.description: Wrap a single ally in holy energy, causing your direct healing on other party or raid members to also heal that ally for 10% of the amount healed.

387846.name: Fel Armor
387846.description: Fel ArmorInstantRequires WarlockWhen Soul Leech absorbs damage, 5% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.Reduces damage taken by 1.5%.

185763.name: Pistol Shot
185763.description:
Draw a concealed pistol and fire a quick shot at an enemy, dealing 29 Physical damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 30% for 6 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.

772.name: Rend
772.description: Lash out with your weapon, striking all targets within 8 yds for 91 Physical damage instantly and wounding them for an additional 74 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

465463.name: Turbo Charge
465463.description: Turbo ChargeUnlimited range4 sec castGeezle siphons power from the generator into his battery pack, gaining 10 Electricity and emitting 4768 Nature damage to all players every 1 sec for 10 sec.

1250581.name: Ultimate Serenity
1250581.description: Ultimate Serenity100 yd rangeInstantRequires PriestIncreases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity by 10% and causes it to heal 4 nearby injured allies within 40 yards for 15% of its healing done.Talents that affect Holy Word: Sanctify instead affect Holy Word: Serenity.

1224864.name: Behead
1224864.description: BeheadUnlimited rangeInstantThe Voidwing shreds through a player with its claws, inflicting 48991 Cosmic damage and dragging any player caught within their path.

444546.name: Purify
444546.description: Purify100 yd range3 sec castMurrpray calls down a ray of searing fire from the Sacred Flame that inflicts 14835 Holy damage every 1 sec to players caught in its path, and leaves behind a pool of Sanctified Ground.

1218497.name: Mysterious Tenacity
1218497.description: Mysterious TenacityItem EffectInstantReagents:Potion of Mysterious TenacityOn Looted: Increases your maximum health by 10%.Lasts 30 min and persists through death. This item is consumed immediately.

1279200.name: Eradicate

1044.description: Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.

445509.name: Scourge Strike
445509.description: Scourge StrikeMelee RangeInstantInstantly strike the target, causing (160% of Attack Power) Physical damage and (40% of Attack Power) Shadow damage.

450720.name: Inner Radiance
450720.description: Inner RadianceItem EffectInstantApproximately 5 procs per minuteAdvance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.Inner Resilience increases your armor by 183 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 17743 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.Valid only for tank specializations.

1243843.name: Mite-y Feast
1243843.description: Mite-y FeastInstantYour damaging spells have a chance to attract mites to feast on your target, inflicting up to (0 * 5) Shadow damage over 5 sec. Well-fed mites share their meal with you, each increasing your Intellect by 0 for 30 sec.

52128.name: Water Shield
52128.description: Water ShieldInstantRequires ShamanThe caster is surrounded by globes of water, granting 18 mana per 5 sec. When a melee attack hits the caster, the caster regains [Surging Shields: 3 / 2]% of their mana. This effect can only occur once every 3 sec. [Elemental Orbit: The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them / Only one of your Elemental Shields can be active on you at once.]

185245.name: Torment
185245.description: Taunts the target to attack you, and increases the threat you generate against them by 800% for 6 sec.

447419.name: Lava Burst

1269879.name: Mind's Eyes
1269879.description: Mind's EyesInstantRequires WarlockYour Diabolic Oculi observe the battlefield and collect information that is imparted to you upon being exploded, each Diabolic Oculi increasing your Intellect by 2% for 10 sec.

1233702.name: Vanquish
1233702.description: VanquishUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar cleaves his current target, inflicting 120964 Physical damage and an additional 190519 Shadow damage to all players in front of him, knocking them away. Increases damage taken from Vanquish by 500% for 20 sec.

83245.name: Call Pet 5

119381.name: Leg Sweep
119381.description: Knocks down all enemies within 6 yards, stunning them for 3 sec.

228598.name: Ice Lance

228563.name: Blackout Combo
228563.description: Blackout ComboInstantRequires MonkBlackout Kick also empowers your next ability: Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%. Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.

Multiple stacks of Executioner may overlap.

435012.name: Impale

444726.name: Pact of the Apocalypse

ProtectionDamaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Revenge, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing (155.1% of Attack Power) Nature damage.Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

383733.name: Training of Niuzao

The shattered ground inflicts 8477 Sonic damage every 0.5 sec to players in the area.

431365.name: Tormenting Ray

1276767.name: Tyrant's Oblation

91807.name: Shambling Rush

1242373.name: Stomp

459943.name: Call Bikers
459943.description: Call Bikers1 sec castThe Geargrinder calls in Geargrinder Bikers to aid it in battle.

456820.name: Ride Along

Charge to your target with your blades out, dealing 304 Physical damage to the target and 130 to all other nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Generates 25 Energy over 5 sec.

21169.name: Reincarnation

228354.name: Flurry

Shapeshift into Bear Form, increasing armor by 220% and Stamina by 25%, granting protection from Polymorph effects, and increasing threat generation.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.

Hammers then spiral outwards from the impact location, inflicting 31787 Holy damage to players in their path. While empowered by Vindictive Wrath, Hammer of Purity hits 5 players.

124506.description: Gift of the Ox100 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.Healing Sphere:Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for (330% of Attack Power).

462182.name: Hearty Well Fed

64712.name: Living Flame

30153.name: Pursuit
30153.description: PursuitUnlimited rangeInstantCharge an enemy, instantly causing (13.26% of Attack Power)% weapon damage and increasing the Felguard's movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.Auto-Cast:Use anytime the Felguard's target is further than 8 yards away.(Right - Click to toggle)

427913.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon HunterRequires level 14 Havoc, DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec. (500ms cooldown)

451107.name: Bursting Cocoon

1214226.name: Cratering

RuinationCall down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing (2537.91% of Spell Power) Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target [ Destruction: and summoning 1 Diabolic Imp.Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance and is reduced beyond 8 targets / Affliction, Demonologyand summoning 3 Wild Imps.Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets]

1243704.name: Antimatter
1243704.description: Antimatter1000 yd rangeInstantSpheres of Antimatter form at the location of Shattered Space and remain stable for 10 sec, then trigger an annihilation reaction that inflicts 725785 Cosmic damage to all players.Every (5 / 10) sec, Antimatter reacts with players within 0 yards inflicting 7560 Cosmic damage and reducing the damage of its final reaction by the same amount.

382551.name: Pain and Gain
382551.description: Pain and GainInstantRequires WarriorWhen you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. This can only occur once every 10 sec.

347901.name: Veiled Augmentation

1228510.name: Overwhelming Power

446794.name: Insatiable

1264677.name: Starsurge

320334.name: Infernal Armor

280735.name: Execute

Only usable on enemies that have less than 35% health.Generates 0 Rage.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

1256305.description: Voidfall Meteor100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon Hunter Havoc, DevourerConsume has a 35% chance to grant 1 stack of Voidfall.Upon reaching 3 stacks of Voidfall, Reap consumes a stack to reach into the Void and call down a meteor strike at your target's location, dealing (200% of Spell Power) Cosmic damage to all enemies within 8 yards. 361195.name: Verdant Embrace

1245923.name: Solace

DeathblowThe cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next can be used on any target, regardless of their current health. SurvivalAimed Shot now has a 15% chance and Rapid Fire now has a 25% chance to grant Deathblow.Kill Shot critical strike damage is increased by 25%. DeathblowThe cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Beast MasteryAimed Shot now has a 15% chance and Rapid Fire now has a 25% chance to grant Deathblow.Kill Shot critical strike damage is increased by 25%. DeathblowThe cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Number of strikes increased per combo point.Restores 1 combo point every 0.50 sec. 1 point : [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 2] over 0.50 sec 2 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 3] over 1.00 sec 3 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 4] over 1.50 sec 4 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 5] over 2.00 sec 5 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 6] over 2.50 sec[ 6 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 7] over 3.00 sec][ 7 points: [((140% of Attack Power) + (140% of Attack Power)) * 8] over 3.50 sec]

427910.description: Immolation AuraInstantRequires Demon Hunter HavocEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] DevourerEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.] VengeanceEngulf yourself in flames, radiating [(12.317% of Attack Power) * 6] Fire damage over 6 sec.[Generates 20 Fury.]Generates 20 Fury over 6 sec.

1224736.description: Protected CoreInstantAn arcane shield protects the caster's energy core, absorbing 0 damage. Upon removal, the caster's Exposed Core vents Arcane Flurries.

385952.name: Shield Charge
385952.description:
Charge to an enemy with your shield, granting you Shield Block and dealing 296 Physical damage to it and 94 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.

1242747.name: Inner Flame
1242747.description: Inner FlameInstantRequires EvokerCasting Dream Flight or Stasis increases your healing over time by 60% and causes Living Flame and Reversion to have a 100% increased chance to grant Essence Burst. Lasts [Dream Flight: 20 / 15] sec.

431364.name: Tormenting Ray
431364.description: Tormenting RayUnlimited range2.5 sec cast3 sec cooldownShunts shadow magic into targets for 5 sec inflicting 2649 Shadow damage every 0.5 sec.

385787.name: Matted Fur
385787.description: Matted FurInstantRequires DruidWhen you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb [1200 / 100 * 1.25 * Attack Power * (1 + Versatility)] damage for 8 sec.

466460.name: Head Honcho: Zee
466460.description: Head Honcho: ZeeInstantZee becomes the Head Honcho, granting him an explosive arsenal.

466248.name: 1500-Pound "Dud"
466248.description: 1500-Pound "Dud"Unlimited rangeInstantDUD-1500 munitions embed into the arena exploding after 15 sec inflicting 80 Fire damage to all players plus an additional 30 Fire damage every 3 sec for 9 sec. This effect stacks.Interacting with the ordnance instead focuses the blast inflicting 160 Physical damage and applying Focused Detonation, additionally knocking back.

114014.name: Shuriken Toss
114014.description:
Throws a shuriken at an enemy target for 8 Physical damage.

Awards 1 combo point.

1216846.name: Holding a Wrench
1216846.description: Holding a WrenchInstantThe hobgoblin is holding a wrench. Doing so he now knows how to strike someone with the wrench.

1228168.name: Silencing Tempest
1228168.description: Silencing TempestUnlimited rangeInstantAraz rains down arcane energy at players' destinations every 1 sec for 6 sec, inflicting 121253 Arcane damage to players within 3.5 yards of the impact location and silencing them for 6 sec.

274739.name: Rictus of the Laughing Skull
274739.description: Rictus of the Laughing SkullLevel 80InstantInvoke the spirits of your ancestors, granting you their power.

389372.name: Fel Synergy
389372.description: Fel Synergy100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockSoul Leech also heals you for 8% and your pet for 25% of the absorption it grants.

31935.name: Avenger's Shield
31935.description: Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 55 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 2 additional nearby enemies.

373279.name: Void Spike
373279.description: Void Spike45 yd range2 sec castRequires PriestRequires level 1Hurls a bolt of dark magic, dealing (93.8961% of Spell Power) Shadow damage and [(93.8961% of Spell Power) * 21 / 100] Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

434635.name: Ruination
434635.description: Ruination40 yd range1.5 sec castRequires WarlockCall down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing (2537.91% of Spell Power) Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target [ Destruction: and summoning 1 Diabolic Imp.Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance and is reduced beyond 8 targets / Affliction, Demonologyand summoning 3 Wild Imps.Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets]

361500.name: Living Flame
361500.description: Living Flame100 yd rangeInstantRequires EvokerSend a flickering flame towards your target, [ Preservation: healing an ally for (600% of Spell Power) or dealing (232.001% of Spell Power) Fire damage to an enemy / Devastation, Augmentationdealing (232.001% of Spell Power) Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for (600% of Spell Power)]

1233346.name: Solar Eclipse
1233346.description: Solar EclipseInstant32 sec cooldown1 ChargeRequires DruidEnter a Solar Eclipse, empowering Wrath for 15 sec.Casting Starfire changes this to Lunar Eclipse. Eclipse (Solar)Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 40%.

1236690.name: Devouring Void
1236690.description: Devouring VoidItem Effect100 yd rangeInstantTaking damage has a high chance to cause you to devour the essence of nearby enemies, dealing 11120 Shadow damage split between them and healing you for 150% of the damage dealt.Fatal damage not exceeding 30388 instead restores you to 20% health and reconstitutes you as unstable void for 6 sec. Exceed 50% health to stabilize and avoid death. This effect may occur once per 8 min. The Nucleus is unable to deal damage while recharging.

473728.name: Void Ray
473728.description:
Requires 100 Fury
Unleash a beam of concentrated void energy, dealing 77 Cosmic damage and consuming 5 Fury every 0.1 sec.

Effect ends after 2.7 sec or upon reaching 0 Fury.

1218494.name: Discharged Giga Bomb
1218494.description: Discharged Giga BombUnlimited rangeInstantUpon death drops a Discharged Giga Bomb.

468207.name: Incendiary Fire
468207.description: Incendiary FireInstantThe Geargrinder focuses fire at several players for 6 sec, launching blazing shells at their location every 0.5 sec. Each shell inflicts 14655 Fire damage to players within 3 yards and burns away any Oil Slicks in the area.

59052.name: Rime
59052.description: RimeInstantRequires Death KnightYour next Howling Blast will consume no Runes, generate no Runic Power, and deal 275% additional damage.

1226311.name: Infusion Tether
1226311.description: Infusion TetherUnlimited rangeInstantLoom'ithar pulls several players to its location, binding them with silken strands that inflict 2434 Arcane damage each second, growing in intensity over time.Each strand snaps when drawn to 40 yards, creating a splotch of Living Silk at the player's location.

378989.name: Lycara's Teachings
378989.description: Lycara's TeachingsInstantRequires DruidYou gain 3% of a stat while in each form:No Form: HasteCat Form: Critical StrikeBear Form: VersatilityMoonkin Form: Mastery

228260.name: Voidform
228260.description:
Bombards your target with a Void Volley and twists your Shadowform with void magic, increasing your spell damage by 20% for 20 sec. 

This spell is replaced with Void Volley while Voidform is active.

 Void Volley
Releases a volley of pure void energy, firing 10 bolts at your target and 1 bolt at all enemies within 10 yards of your target for 402 Shadow damage.

Generates 10 Insanity.

471878.name: Howl of the Pack Leader
471878.description: Howl of the Pack LeaderInstantRequires HunterWhile in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast. WyvernA Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 12 sec. BoarA Boar charges through your target 1 time, dealing (1200% of Attack Power) physical damage to the primary target and (1440% of Attack Power) damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. BearA Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing (400% of Attack Power) damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

227255.name: Frailty
227255.description: Frailty100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterConsume up to 5 Soul Fragments then explode, dealing (200% of Attack Power) Fire damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% per fragment consumed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

1225221.name: Dread of the Unknown
1225221.description: Dread of the Unknown100 yd rangeInstantSoul-Scribe imbues marked players with dread. Upon expiration, the player erupts inflicting 10596 Arcane damage to players within 9 yards of the eruption.Fates struck afflict their bound player with Wounded Fate.

393951.name: Bloodcraze

1261193.name: Boomstick

1248066.name: Translocation Boost

390271.name: Coil of Devastation

56222.name: Dark Command

1232721.name: Loom'ithar's Living Silk
1232721.description: Loom'ithar's Living SilkLevel 80Item Effect100 yd rangeInstant1.5 min cooldownWeave an arcane cocoon around yourself and four nearby allies for 10 sec, reducing their damage taken by 75% until 57364 damage has been prevented.If a cocoon expires, it bursts to heal an injured ally for 50% of its remaining power.

443592.name: Unity Within

434141.name: Dream Bloom
434141.description: Dream Bloom100 yd rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 1Blooms near your heal target, restoring (146.4% of Spell Power) health to 3 injured allies within 20 yds.

1225010.name: Command: Behead
1225010.description: Command: BeheadUnlimited range2 sec castSalhadaar commands the Royal Voidwing's images to Behead players.

458169.name: Hyperpyrexia
458169.description: Hyperpyrexia100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightRequires Melee WeaponYour Runic Power spending abilities have a chance to additionally deal 30% of the damage dealt over 4 sec.

Consumes Killing Machine to have its critical strikes deal 4 times the normal damage.

199852.name: Whirlwind

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. [Improved Whirlwind: Causes your next 4 single-target melee attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 65% damage] [Generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit.]

368970.name: Tail Swipe

260286.name: Tip of the Spear

Entropic RiftMind Blast tears open an Entropic Rift that follows the enemy for 8 sec. Enemies caught in its path suffer (60% of Spell Power) Shadow damage every 1 sec while within its reach.Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.

335098.name: Crushing Blow
335098.description: Crushing Blow100 yd rangeInstantRequires WarriorRequires level 14Requires Melee WeaponStrike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of [(206.997% of Attack Power) + (206.997% of Attack Power)] Physical damage. Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.Generates 12 Rage.

205636.name: Force of Nature

434786.name: Web Bolt

104317.name: Wild Imp

2383.name: Find Herbs
2383.description: Find HerbsInstant1.5 sec cooldownNearby herb bushes appear on the minimap.

434830.name: Vile Webbing
434830.description: Vile Webbing300 yd rangeInstantVile Webbing ensnares players standing within, reducing movement speed by 50% and inflicting 4239 Nature damage every 1 sec. This effect stacks.Upon reaching 5 applications, the webbing develops into a Web Wrap.

1251690.name: Prized Turkey

372234.name: Energy Loop
372234.description: Energy LoopLevel 80InstantRequires EvokerDisintegrate deals 35% more damage and generates (450 * 4) mana over its duration.

1237690.name: Eclipse

199373.name: Claw
199373.description: ClawMelee RangeInstantRequires Death KnightClaw the enemy, dealing [0.85 * (Attack Power * 0.2) * (1 + Versatility) * 1] Physical damage.

194879.name: Icy Talons

280375.name: Redoubt

1233619.name: Frostreaper
1233619.description: Frostreaper100 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightObliterate deals 10% increased damage and has a chance to tether the souls of its target and a nearby enemy to yours.Frost Strike severs the tethers, dealing (205.92% of Attack Power) Shadowfrost damage to both foes.

400370.name: Burning Vehemence
400370.description: Burning Vehemence100 yd rangeInstantIncreases the damage of Holy Fire by 30%.Holy Fire deals 75% of its initial damage to all nearby enemies within 12 yards of your target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

6552.name: Pummel
6552.description: Pummels the target, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 5 sec.

30455.name: Ice Lance
30455.description:
Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 699 Frost damage.

Shatters 4 stacks of Freezing.

264130.name: Power Siphon

433808.name: Divine Guidance
433808.description: Divine GuidanceUnlimited rangeInstantRequires PaladinFor each Holy Power ability cast, your next Consecration deals [ Holy: [(Spell Power * 30 / 10) * (1 + Versatility) * 2.86] / Protection[(Spell Power * 30 / 10) * (1 + Versatility)]] damage or healing immediately, split across all enemies and allies.

274009.name: Voracious
274009.description: VoraciousInstantRequires Death KnightDeath Strike's healing is increased by 5% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec. (500ms cooldown)

265157.name: Wildfire Bomb
265157.description: Wildfire BombUnlimited rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for (157.95% of Attack Power) Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for (125.928% of Attack Power) Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.Deals 60% increased damage to your primary target.

1222183.name: Farstalker's Leap
1222183.description: Farstalker's Leap50 yd rangeInstantThe wastelander leaps to a random player's location, inflicting 8477 Arcane damage to players within 4 yards of the impact.

1218127.name: Junksaws
1218127.description: Junksaws3.5 sec cast2 sec cooldownThe caster flings junksaws in four directions, inflicting 34195 Physical damage and knocking players away.The victim bleeds for an additional 5862 Physical damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.

1238782.name: Earthshattering Spear

The shattered ground inflicts 8477 Sonic damage every 0.5 sec to players in the area.

1242347.name: Soulgorged Augmentation
1242347.description: Soulgorged AugmentationLevel 80Item EffectInstant3 sec cooldownIncreases Primary Stat by 6 for 1 hour. Augment Rune. Persists through death.

1240896.name: Eradicating Arcanocore

At 10 charges, deploy a sentinel to arcanoblast your target for (28092 * 1) Arcane damage split between nearby enemies. Recover 2 charges if only one enemy is struck.Damage increased by 30% per additional enemy, up to 150%.

1224764.name: Oath-Breaker
1224764.description: Oath-BreakerUnlimited rangeInstantAn oath shatters, inflicting 3024 Shadow damage to all players.

279043.name: Shadow Blades

5302.name: Revenge!
5302.description: Revenge!InstantRequires WarriorRequires level 12Swing in a wide arc, dealing (234.72% of Attack Power) Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

1280757.name: Winter's End
1280757.description: Winter's End100 yd rangeInstantRequires MageWhen an enemy affected by Freezing dies, it explodes, dealing (6.25% of Spell Power) Frost damage to nearby enemies for each stack of Freezing it had. Damage reduced beyond 5 enemies.

269747.name: Wildfire Bomb
269747.description: Wildfire BombUnlimited rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for (157.95% of Attack Power) Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for (125.928% of Attack Power) Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.Deals 60% increased damage to your primary target.

19577.name: Intimidation

107574.name: Avatar
107574.description: Transform into a colossus, increasing all damage you deal by 20% and reducing damage you take from area of effect attacks by 5% for 20 sec.

1227702.name: Collapsing Star

Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.While casting Collapsing Star, your Fury drain is significantly reduced.

113746.name: Mystic Touch
113746.description: Mystic TouchUnlimited rangeInstantRequires MonkYour damage weakens the target, increasing Physical damage taken by 5%.

17627.name: Distilled Wisdom

1241413.name: Hammer of Wrath
1241413.description: Hammer of Wrath1.2% of base mana30 yd rangeInstant11 sec cooldown1 ChargeRequires PaladinHurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for [(123.75% of Attack Power) * 1] [Blades of Light: Holystrike / Holy] damage.Generates 1 Holy Power.

267997.name: Bile Spit
267997.description: Bile Spit40 yd range2 sec castRequires WarlockRequires level 1Requires WeaponsThe Vilefiend spits a ball of bile at its target, dealing [(81.6% of Spell Power) * 1] Nature damage and an additional [(24% of Spell Power) * 1] Nature damage every 2 sec for 10 sec.

1224737.name: Oath-Bound
1224737.description: Oath-BoundUnlimited rangeInstantSalhadaar declares a trial of loyalty, inflicting 22681 Shadow damage to all players every 1 sec for 6 sec and granting 3 applications of Oath-Bound.

1214933.name: One of a Kind
1214933.description: One of a KindInstantRequires RogueRequires level 1

80353.name: Time Warp

Warp the flow of time, increasing haste by 30% for all party and raid members for 40 sec.

Allies will be unable to benefit from Bloodlust, Heroism, or Time Warp again for 10 min.

1262765.name: Empty the Cellar
1262765.description: Empty the Cellar40 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkExploding Keg can be reactivated within 20 sec to throw 5 additional kegs at nearby targets, each dealing (200% of Attack Power) Physical damage and reducing the cooldown of your Brews by 3.0 sec.

233364.name: Leywoven Flying Carpet
233364.description: Leywoven Flying Carpet1.5 sec castSummons and dismisses a Leywoven Flying Carpet. This mount changes depending on your Riding skill and location."The threads are so thin and well-stitched, you can't imagine it wasn't made by magic, strand by strand."Drop: Nightfallen Cache

279709.name: Starlord
279709.description: StarlordInstantRequires DruidStarsurge and Starfall grant you 2% Haste for 20 sec or until you enter a new Eclipse.Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.

374776.name: Tightening Grasp

242551.name: Fel Focus

393903.name: Ursine Vigor

384129.name: Neural Silencer Mk3

1246363.name: Delver's Bounty

398458.name: Well Fed

1250772.name: Imp Gang Boss

19483.name: Immolation

1223364.name: Powered Automaton

1247778.name: Comet Storm!

85416.name: Grand Crusader
85416.description: Grand CrusaderInstantRequires PaladinRequires level 1When you avoid a melee attack or use [Hammer of the Righteous] [Blessed Hammer / Crusader Strike], you have a 15% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield [Inspiring Vanguard: and increase your Strength by 2% for 8 sec / .]

111400.description: Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

1227529.description: BanishmentUnlimited range1.35 sec castSalhadaar exiles several players, inflicting 10887 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 8 sec. Upon expiration, each target bursts with torturous void inflicting 24495 Shadow damage.

375240.name: Time Spiral

These munitions (mostly) detonate on impact.However, some of the fuze within the bunch scatters about the arena.

469795.name: Giga Bomb Detonation

228478.name: Soul Cleave

1242212.name: Burning Aftermath

Your Visage emanates magic, significantly increasing out-of-combat health regeneration for your party.

386478.name: Violent Outburst
386478.description: Violent OutburstInstantRequires WarriorEvery 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

468631.name: Harpoon

426595.name: Shadow Techniques

378597.name: Acid Rain
378597.description: Acid Rain100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanDeal [(67.25% of Spell Power)] Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

1234896.name: Galactic Smash

Players farther from each target take less damage. Salhadaar's primary target is Starshattered. A Dark Star forms at each impact location.

431972.name: Flask of Tempered Swiftness
431972.description: Flask of Tempered SwiftnessLevel 80Item EffectInstantDrink to increase your Haste by 173.Lasts 1 hour and through death. Consuming an identical flask will add another 1 hour.

1223658.name: Suppression

474453.name: Mega Blast

1234243.name: Crushing Gravity

412643.name: Ethereal Transmogrifier

466546.name: Spray and Pray

389847.name: Felfire Haste

1242095.name: Massive Smash
1242095.description: Massive SmashUnlimited rangeInstantDimensius smashes his current target with devastating force, inflicting 199591 Physical damage and 136085 Cosmic damage to players within 20 yards and applying Mortal Fragility.The force of the attack ripples outward through space inflicting 48386 Cosmic damage to all other players, knocking them away from the impact location, and scattering Living Mass.

132403.name: Shield of the Righteous
132403.description: Shield of the RighteousMelee RangeInstantRequires PaladinRequires level 1 HolySlams enemies in front of you with your shield, causing (95% of Attack Power) Holy damage, and increasing your Armor by (160 * $INT / 100) for 4.5 sec. ProtectionSlams enemies in front of you with your shield, causing (95% of Attack Power) Holy damage, and increasing your Armor by (160 * Strength / 100) for 4.5 sec. RetributionSlams enemies in front of you with your shield, causing (95% of Attack Power) Holy damage, and increasing your Armor by (160 * Strength / 100) for 4.5 sec.ProtectionArmor granted by Shield of the Righteous is increased by up to 60%, based on your missing health.

453458.name: Caltrops
453458.description: Caltrops30 yd rangeInstantLeaps nearby a random player and spreads Caltrops on the ground, causing any targets caught in the Caltrops to bleed for 3709 Physical damage every 0.5 sec and preventing movement.

456120.name: Opportunist

1214823.name: I Did That!

You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

1235545.name: Energy Overload
1235545.description: Energy Overload300 yd rangeInstantThe creature erupts as it comes into contact with the Arcanomatrix Atomizer, inflicting 0 Arcane damage to all players, and increases their damage taken from Energy Overload by 0% for until canceled.

1234969.name: Ethereal Augmentation

438827.name: Poisonous Cloud

This volunteer 'guides' an explosive payload to a player's location, inflicting 250 Fire damage split evenly among all players within 12 yards of the impact and creating a Hot Mess. The impact also detonates any hit Unstable Crawler Mines.If the rocket fails to hit at least 5 players, it inflicts 100 Fire damage to all players.

288853.description: Raise Abomination40 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightArmy of the Dead now raises an Abomination that attacks enemies while emitting a disease cloud that lasts for 30 sec.Enemies within the disease cloud take 10% increased damage from your minions.

1250671.name: Arcanomatrix Sieve

460965.name: Barreling Charge

1221190.name: Gluttonous Miasma

452226.name: Spiderling

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

1242895.name: Screams of a Forgotten Sky: An'zuq

85288.name: Raging Blow

Finishing move that creates shadow clones of yourself. You and your shadow clones each perform a piercing attack on all enemies near your target, dealing Physical damage to the primary target and reduced damage to other targets.

   2 points: 60 total damage
   3 points: 87 total damage
   4 points: 120 total damage
   5 points: 146 total damage

199851.name: Whirlwind Off-Hand

[Improved Whirlwind: Causes your next 4 single-target melee attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 65% damage] [Generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit.]
