52212.description: Corrupts the ground targeted by the Death Knight, causing Shadow damage every sec that targets remain in the area for 10 sec.

471225.name: Gatling Cannon
471225.description: Gatling CannonUnlimited rangeInstantGallywix's barrels spit hot lead inflicting 43965 Physical damage, increasing by up to 200% as distance to the target increases.

1233093.name: Collapsing Star
1233093.description: Collapsing StarUnlimited rangeChanneled (25 sec cast)Adarus manifests a Collapsing Star which begins to pull players towards its center.Stellar fragments rain down and are pulled towards the center of the star. The fragments explode upon contacting a player, inflicting 9072 Cosmic damage and applying Dark Residue.If the fragments reach the center, they instead inflict 28351 Cosmic damage to all players.

357211.name: Pyre
357211.description: Lob a ball of flame, dealing 1,527 Fire damage to your target and all enemies within 8 yds.

449858.name: Shadow of Death
449858.description: Shadow of DeathInstantRequires WarlockYour [ Affliction: Dark Harvest spell is empowered by the demonic entity within you, causing it to grant 1 Soul Shard that each contain a Succulent Soul every 1 sec while channeled / DemonologySummon Demonic Tyrant spell is empowered by the demonic entity within you, causing it to grant 3 Soul Shards that each contain a Succulent Soul]

11426.name: Ice Barrier
11426.description:
Shields you with ice, absorbing 7,637 damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you reduce the attacker's movement speed by 50%.

456486.name: Dangerous Skies
456486.description: Dangerous SkiesInstantThe nerubians swarm the skies, making it too dangerous to fly.

427621.name: Impale
427621.description: Impale40 yd range2.5 sec castImpales a random target, inflicting 10597 Physical damage and causing the target to bleed for 7947 Physical damage every 3 sec for 12 sec.

1222948.name: Electro-Charged Shield
1222948.description: Electro-Charged ShieldInstantThe MK II Electro Shocker envelopes itself in charged energy, reducing damage taken by 99%.Removed upon being hit with Stormfury Finger Gun.

1238867.name: Echoing Invocation
1238867.description: Echoing InvocationUnlimited rangeChanneled (5 sec cast)Araz's echo triggers an Arcane Collector to begin its Prime Sequence.

1247378.name: Putrefy
1247378.description: Summon a Lesser Ghoul to strike the enemy for 82 Shadow damage and have them explode for 42 Shadow damage to nearby enemies.

450699.name: "The 50 Verses of Radiance"
450699.description: "The 50 Verses of Radiance"Item EffectInstantAdvance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.Inner Resilience increases your armor by 183 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 17743 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.Valid only for tank specializations.

469478.name: Sludge Claws
469478.description: Sludge ClawsUnlimited range2.5 sec castSwampface ravages the target with gruesome claws, inflicting 74175 Physical damage and 21193 Nature damage. The muddy gashes absorb 74175 healing.

444609.name: Stoke the Flame
444609.description: Stoke the Flame300 yd range2 sec castPrioress Murrpray stokes the Sacred Flame.

337819.name: Throw Glaive
337819.description: Throw Glaive30 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterThrow a demonic glaive at the target, dealing (49.2352% of Attack Power) Physical damage. The glaive can ricochet to [Bouncing Glaives: 1 additional enemies / an additional enemy] within 10 yards.

374227.name: Zephyr
374227.description: Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.

467238.name: Riddled Darkness
467238.description: Riddled Darkness45 yd rangeInstant1.5 sec cooldownThe goon unleashes a hail of bullets at random targets in front of it, inflicting 3419 Shadow damage every 0.3 sec and inflicts a 2082 healing absorb for 5 sec.

428150.name: Reflective Shield
428150.description: Reflective Shield100 Energy2 sec castHigh Priest Aemya protects herself with a Reflective Shield which absorbs 273201 damage and inflicts 70% of incoming damage back on attackers as Holy damage.

443113.name: Strength of the Black Ox
443113.description: Strength of the Black Ox40 yd rangeInstantRequires Monk[ Mistweaver: After Xuen assists you, your next Enveloping Mist's cast time is reduced by 50% and causes Niuzao to grant an absorb shield to 5 nearby allies for 0] [ Windwalker: After Xuen assists you, your next Blackout Kick refunds 2 stacks of Teachings of the Monastery and causes Niuzao to stomp at your target's location, dealing (200% of Attack Power) damage to nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets]

458123.name: Festering Scythe
458123.description: Festering ScytheInstantRequires Death KnightFestering Strike now follows up with a Festering Scythe that costs no Runes.Festering ScytheSlashes through all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, dealing (75% of Attack Power) Shadow damage and hastening all of your Plagues on targets hit to deal damage 35% faster for 25 sec.

443531.name: Bolstering Light
443531.description: Bolstering LightLevel 80Item EffectInstant2 min cooldownRaise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 352 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 9 of the same stat for 20 sec.

1218669.name: Energy Cutter
1218669.description: Energy CutterInstantA rotating beam of arcane energy that inflicts 41581 Arcane damage to players in the area.

265189.name: Raptor Strike
265189.description: Raptor Strike30 Focus40 yd rangeInstantRequires HunterRequires level 1A vicious slash dealing (357.5% of Attack Power) Physical damage.

435165.name: Blazing Strike
435165.description: Blazing Strike40 yd range2.5 sec castInflicts 31789 Holy damage and an additional 3179 Holy damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.

280127.name: Demonbolt
280127.description: Demonbolt40 yd rangeInstantRequires WarlockRequires level 1Send the fiery soul of a fallen demon at the enemy, causing (396.778% of Spell Power) Shadowflame damage. [ Demonology: Generates 2 Soul Shards.]

442982.name: General's Phalanx
442982.description: General's PhalanxInstantThe General's Phalanx safeguards you. When an attack would cause you to die, absorb the attack and become immune to all damage for 10 sec.

1241922.name: Voidglare Boon
1241922.description: Voidglare BoonInstantRequires Demon HunterAfter fully channeling Void Ray, gain 10 Fury.

406087.name: Calm the Wolf
406087.description: Activate to control your worgen instincts and automatically assume human form when you leave combat.

20707.name: Soulstone
20707.description: Stores the soul of the target party or raid member, allowing resurrection upon death. Targets resurrect with 60% health and at least 20% mana.

1226783.name: Disembodied Scream
1226783.description: Disembodied ScreamUnlimited range4 sec castThe caster unleashes a scream that inflicts 22681 Sonic damage to players within 60 yards.

1242340.name: Speed Siphoner
1242340.description: Speed SiphonerInstantMovement Speed inside Manaforge Omega increased while out of combat.

1237128.name: Dancing Rune Weapon
1237128.description: Dancing Rune Weapon30 yd rangeInstantRequires Death KnightRequires Melee WeaponSummons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 4 sec.

378412.name: Light of the Titans
378412.description: Light of the Titans100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinWord of Glory heals for an additional 40% over 10 sec.Increased by 100% if cast on yourself while you are afflicted by a harmful damage over time effect.

84714.name: Frozen Orb
84714.description:
Launches an orb of swirling ice in front of you, dealing up to 5,198 Frost damage to all enemies it passes through over 15 sec. After a short delay, Frozen Orb will pursue its target. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by 50% for 8 sec.

1269643.name: Demonic Oculi
1269643.description: Demonic OculiInstantRequires WarlockYou summon a Diabolic Oculus, up to 3, each time the duration of Diabolic Ritual is reduced by one of your spells.Diabolic Oculi explode when consuming Demonic Art, dealing (234.62% of Spell Power) Fire damage to all enemies within 10 yds of the target. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

387792.name: Empyreal Ward
387792.description: Empyreal Ward100 yd rangeInstantRequires PaladinLay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.

391191.name: Burning Wound
391191.description: Burning Wound100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon Hunter[Demon Blades / Demon's Bite] and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing (73.45% of Attack Power) Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.May be applied to up to 3 targets.

1241917.name: Frailty
1241917.description: FrailtyUnlimited rangeInstantThe fragment draws upon the target's soul, reducing their healing received by 33%. This effect stacks.Players other than the target can collect the fragment, suffering 4536 Chaos damage every 0.5 sec for 20 sec. This effect stacks.

361584.name: Whirling Surge
361584.description: Whirling SurgeInstant30 sec cooldownRequires level 10Spiral forward a great distance, increasing speed.Whirling Surge dismounts airborne enemy players.

1219278.name: Gallybux Pest Eliminator
1219278.description: Gallybux Pest EliminatorUnlimited rangeInstantHumane, high-voltage shock. Quickly eliminates pests. Gallywix attaches lightning tethers inflicting 2931 Nature damage every 0.5 sec to targeted players and any additional player between them and Gallywix. This effect increases in damage while tethered targets are further from Gallywix.

447415.name: Healing Surge
447415.description: Healing Surge100 yd rangeInstantRequires ShamanHeals the target for (212.915% of Spell Power).

1264946.name: Moonlight Chakram
1264946.description: Moonlight ChakramInstantRequires HunterSummoning a Dire Beast 8 times sounds the Horn of Valor, summoning either Hati or Fenryr to battle.HatiIncreases the damage of all your pets by 4%.FenryrPounces your primary target, inflicting a heavy bleed that deals (800% of Attack Power) damage over 8 sec and grants you 4% Haste.

23920.name: Spell Reflection
23920.description: Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.

1226363.name: Twilight Scar
1226363.description: Twilight ScarUnlimited rangeInstantMutilated by chaotic magic of another dimension, inflicting 12852 Cosmic damage every 1 sec for 8 sec.

1225626.name: Soulfire Convergence
1225626.description: Soulfire Convergence300 yd rangeInstantThe Soulbinder Naazindhri courses arcane energy through the bodies of several players, inflicting 11340 Arcane damage every 1 sec for 5 sec. Upon expiration, Soulrend Orbs explode from the target's body.

1219545.name: Alter Time
1219545.description: Alter TimeInstantRequires MageRequires level 1Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 seconds. Effect negated by long distance or death.

428362.name: Ragefire
428362.description: RagefireInstantRequires Demon HunterEach time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.

202497.name: Shooting Stars
202497.description: Shooting StarsUnlimited rangeInstantRequires DruidRequires level 1Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing (68% of Spell Power) Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.

1264087.name: Doomsayer
1264087.description: DoomsayerInstantRequires Demon Hunter VengeanceActivating Infernal Strike out of combat or within 5 sec of entering combat calls down 1 Voidfall Meteor. DevourerActivating Void Ray out of combat or within 10 sec of entering combat calls down 3 Voidfall Meteors over its duration. HavocActivating Void Ray out of combat or within 5 sec of entering combat calls down 3 Voidfall Meteors over its duration.

247456.name: Frailty
247456.description: Frailty100 yd rangeInstantRequires Demon HunterConsume up to 5 Soul Fragments then explode, dealing (200% of Attack Power) Fire damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% per fragment consumed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

1220394.name: Shattering Backhand
1220394.description: Shattering Backhand100% of base energyUnlimited range2 sec castFractillus does a sweeping backhand, inflicting 22681 Shadow damage to all players and knocking back players afflicted by Crystal Encasement.

1226111.name: Volatile Ejection
1226111.description: Volatile Ejection150 yd range4 sec castThe caster unleashes energy towards marked targets, inflicting 15895 Shadow damage to players in that direction.

274062.name: Enveloping Mist
274062.description: Enveloping Mist40 yd rangeInstantRequires MonkReceive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for (748.8% of Spell Power) and is instant cast.Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec. [Thunderous Focus Tea: Crackling Jade Lightning: Knockback applied immediately.Roll: Refund a charge and heal yourself for (240% of Attack Power)]

1243702.name: Antimatter
1243702.description: Antimatter1000 yd rangeInstantSpheres of Antimatter form at the location of Shattered Space and remain stable for 10 sec, then trigger an annihilation reaction that inflicts 725785 Cosmic damage to all players.Every (5 / 10) sec, Antimatter reacts with players within 0 yards inflicting 7560 Cosmic damage and reducing the damage of its final reaction by the same amount.

186289.name: Aspect of the Eagle
186289.description: Increases the range of your Raptor Strike and Mastery: Spirit Bond to 40 yds for 15 sec.

123725.name: Breath of Fire
123725.description: Breath of FireUnlimited rangeInstantRequires MonkRequires level 1Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing (100% of Attack Power) Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking (66% of Attack Power) Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.

468149.name: Exhaust Fumes
468149.description: Exhaust FumesInstantThe Geargrinder releases smog that suffocates all players for 6 sec, inflicting 2931 Shadow damage every 1 sec. This increases in intensity by 25% with every cast.

1224305.name: Protocol: Purge
1224305.description: Protocol: Purge300 yd rangeInstantThe Plexus Sentinel relocates, pushing players away and activating the Arcanomatrix Atomizer. The Atomizer slowly passes over the chamber, Atomizing any players and Volatile Manifestation it contacts.After relocating, The Plexus Sentinel begins channelling Protocol: Purge and gains a shield that absorbs damage. Breaking this shield interrupts Protocol: Purge.

394049.name: Balance of All Things
394049.description: Balance of All ThingsInstantRequires DruidEntering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
